name: Nancy Tupper
text: I was greeted with respect . Very curiosity. I got to look and pick what I wanted and no one came trying to sell me something else. So I was able to constraint on what I was looking for. No regrets.

name: Katherine Barrett
text: When they delivered my love seat, they put a hole in my living room wall. I expect this company to repair my wall. Now it has been 2 months and they are giving me the run around  about fixing the damage they caused to my wall. I would not recommend them. Still waiting for a matching couch on back order to be delivered also. Hmmmm.

name: Misty Merilien
text: Bryan did an excellent job explaining discounts, fabric protection, and the functionality of the furniture. This store has great quality furniture with even better prices. My husband and I are well pleased with our experience!

name: jimmy hibbs
text: Great people very helpful. The delivery  guys are great and deserve a raise

name: Damita Ryan
text: The people are very nice there

resp.text: Hi Damita.  Thank you for leaving a 5-Star review!  At Farmers Home Furniture, we continuously strive to serve you better.  We are glad that our team has met your expectations.  We look forward to serving you again in the future!

name: Jennifer Rhodes
text: Just got approved for some new stuff I love it and they whsre helpful

name: Dodge Ram
text: Employees sitting all behind the counters and no one seem to know what was going on. Been doing business there for a few years but wont be buying anything g else there.

name: Danny Ayala
text: Girlfriend paid for the extra coverage/furniture insurance on her couches and dining set. Upon delivery, table was damaged when moving it to the dining room. OK... Then stools last a few weeks before the got wobbly, and the braces that held the seat to the stool broke off and a dowel broke off making the seats totally unstable. This happened to 2 seats. Took the stools back to be replaced or repaired, as stated with the extra coverage, and they said the tools to fix it haven’t came in yet. It’s been over 6 months! And there’s a Marvin’s 3 stores down! Also, we took back a seat cushion that was ruined (zipper broke off) and that hasn’t been replaced yet either. Stores weren’t shut down in March so they can’t blame the delay on that. If you buy from here, don’t waste your money paying for the extras like extra coverage on your furniture. They’re just trying to make some extra money with no real plan on how to honor that promise.

name: Grace Tinajero
text: I bought furniture from them, they were not completely honest with me ... and also lied about the pricing.. i do not recommend this place, they do not take care of their furniture!!!!

name: DIANE COOK
text: Treated me very good

text: Turtle was awesome in helping with my purchases and getting me financed!!! My new favorite furniture store!

name: David Haigler
text: Excellent selection.  Courteous, professional, expert advice and service by store manager and assistant manager.  Pleasant and quiet atmosphere.  Excellent price and value.  Free delivery and 30 day in home trial period included. Overall excellent experience!

resp.text: We are so happy that you had a great experience! Thank you for the 5 star review!

name: Pat Smitherman
text: Called the Homewood store spoke with Leigh Huffman manager she immediately showed interest in helping me find the perfect bed I am disabled with back issue.   Came to store she had already researched the best mattress for my condition. Promptly showed me three and recommended the hybrid posterpedic and encouraged me to lay on mattress. I bought my new mattress that day and so far are very happy.  She is very knowledgeable and sincere .

resp.text: Wow, that's great! We're so glad that you're happy with your new bed!

name: Kathy Copeland
text: Personal attention to what I wanted and how much I could spend. She did not waste my time trying to upgrade into something I did not want. She made sure I also got the right box spring and easily set up ordering process.

resp.text: We're so glad to hear that you had a great experience! Thank you for the review!

name: kim fagan
text: Personalized care. Knowledgeable. No pressure. Perfect shopping experience.

resp.text: That's awesome to hear! Thank you!

name: Shades Creek Dental Patient Centered Care
text: Awesome experience! Staff was very knowledgeable and super nice. Great prices. Glad we started here!

resp.text: That's great to hear! Thank you!

name: Cheryl S now
text: The sales lady was very sweet and knew everything about the mattresses. The mattress speaks for itself. It is the best mattress I have ever seen or bought. I would give the experience five *****.

resp.text: Oh, we're so glad you love your new mattress! Thank you for the great review!

name: Neil White
text: I made a phone order, and the lady I talked to was very kind, courteous, and helpful.  I needed a bed quickly for a new apartment, and was able to order one and have it delivered immediately.  Highly recommended.

resp.text: That's great to hear, Neil! Thank you for the awesome review!

name: Patricia Joseph
text:
Haven’t shopped for mattresses in years.
Product has really changed and improved.
Bill walked us through all the new technology in mattresses and bases without overwhelming us with techno-jargon. And no “sales pressure”.
We are return customers for a reason.

resp.text: We're so glad to hear that, Patricia! Thank you for your great review!

name: Lindsey Giglio
text: Loved my experience here with Dan! He was so friendly and helpful. Can’t recommend this place enough!

resp.text: We're so glad to hear that, Lindsey! Thank you!

name: Myron Hall
text: Was greeted with respect and Leigh was very knowledgeable of the mattresses. She listened to what I was looking for and gave me options to look at. She was not pushy to sell but gave advice on which mattress might fit my situation the best.

resp.text: That's great, Myron! We're so glad you had great service from Leigh!

name: Dian Lipsey
text:
Leigh Huffman was absolutely fabulous! Very honest, knowledgeable, friendly, and helpful. She helped us to choose the perfect bed.... and it wasn’t the most expensive one we looked at!  She wasn’t trying to “sell” any particular bed. She listened to our needs and guided us in the right direction. I highly recommend this store! Leigh will do right by you!! 😊

Dianne L.

resp.text: We're so happy to hear about your great experience with Leigh! Thank you for sharing with us! Please let us know if we can help you with anything else!

name: Lynda Dawson
text: Leigh was a great sales person. She was very knowledgeable, identified our needs/desires, and budget then showed us mattresses that fell within that criteria. She guided us helpfully and patiently, and made our experience positive. We never felt pressured and ultimately purchased a mattress from her happily later that day.

resp.text: Thank you so much for sharing with us about your great experience with Leigh! We are so glad you found a great mattress that fit your needs! Let us know if we can help you with anything else!

name: Elizabeth Maples
text: Very well informed - answered questions thoroughly. Very safe and pleasant experience.

resp.text: We're so glad you had a great experience!

name: Michael Hull
text: Dan at the Homewood location was a pleasure to work with picking out the perfect mattress. Zero pressure and very knowledgeable about his products.  Dan arranged for my Temperpedic mattress and my daughters mattress to be delivered the next day. Paul with the delivery team called at the exact time the following day Dan said he would to set up my 2 hour window. 2 delivery drivers were very professional and called when they were on the way to my house. Overall an outstanding experience with zero complaints. Highly recommend.

resp.text: We're happy to hear about your great experience! Thank you for sharing with us about it! Please let us know if we can help you again!

name: Dionne Edwards
text: Leigh took excellent care of us.  We got exactly what we wanted and need.  We’re more than pleased and super excited about our new bed!

resp.text: We're so glad to hear that! Thank you!

name: Walt Terry
text: My wife and I had a great experience here! Leigh was extremely helpful/knowledgeable and answered all of our questions. We will highly recommend this place to all of our friends and definitely shop here again!

resp.text: We're so happy that you had a great experience with Leigh! Thank you for the great review!

name: Bill Stone
text: Great experience!!  As always, Lee was a great help in picking the right mattress.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Bill!

name: Liz and Mike Cleckler
text: Leigh Hoffman was extremely knowledgeable & professional. She helped us buy a mattress 8 yrs ago & we were happy to see her again to help us buy a mattress for a vacation home.

resp.text: We're happy to hear that and we appreciate your loyalty! We hope you have an amazing time at your vacation home!

name: Jesse
text:
Ms. Leigh was very nice, knowledgeable, and professional. She gave us the details and information we wanted as well as guiding us through the recommendations while not trying to foist the highest priced ones on us.

The store itself is very clean, calm, and had the best prices of the four places in southside we looked at. My friend and I were very happy about buying our mattress here and would certainly recommend this store, even more so when Ms. Leigh is in.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Jesse! We appreciate the great review!

name: Michael Self
text: I had a great experience  at bedz Express.  I went there and a very nice lady named Leigh  listened to what I needed and helped me pick out a nice mattress in my price range. It will be delivered to my apt Sat. I would refer anyone that needed a mattress to Bedz express.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review, Michael! We are glad you had a great experience with Leigh!

name: karyn stalcup
text:
I have needed a new bed for years but dreaded the search. After reading the positive reviews about Bedzz Express I forced myself to go.

The reviews were actually true. I met Leigh, and told her my needs. She narrowed in down to two choices; both of which were outstanding. I was in and out of the store in under 30 minutes. Loved her and the store!!

resp.text: Wow, that's so great to hear! We are thankful that you had a great experience with Leigh. Please let us know if we can help you with anything else!

name: Manish Nevrekar
text: Lisa was excellent. She answered all the questions and was very pleasant to deal with

resp.text: We're so glad your experience was pleasant! Let us know if we can help you again!

name: Kaitlin Bryan
text: Teri was AWESOME! I was so stressed about finding a mattress in time for a last-minute move and she was so helpful. She was very attentive to my needs and insightful on what I needed to know about the delivery. It’s hard when you aren’t given proper notice of a move-in date, and even more so when you realize you have nothing immediately available (like a bed). Thank you so much. I highly recommend this place.

resp.text: Kaitlin, we're thankful that Teri was able to help you find a great bed in time! We hope you will love your bed! Please let us know if we can help you with anything else!

name: Eva Köhn
text: Leigh Huffman the Store Manager took excellent care of us. Great recommendations and service. I originally wanted to buy online but she could offer us a better deal and guarantee.

resp.text: Amazing! We are so glad you got a great deal!

name: Allison Burleson
text: Fantastic service, no pressure, left with exactly what we needed. Great value and very very knowledgeable! Highly recommend!!!!

resp.text: That's awesome! Thank you so much for the great review, Allison!

name: Lisa Wilson
text: We have purchased multiple beds from Leigh Huffman and she is the best! Always a great experience.

resp.text: Thank you so much! That's great to hear!

name: Dan Gainey
text: Ready for a new mattress, We were interested in the new Tempurpedic Breeze we had seen advertised on TV. Our closest dealer was BedZzzpress in Homewood, AL. That's where we met the owner, Leigh. She helped us pick out the best mattress for our needs, the "Breeze", (which was on sale) and we also decided to include the articulating stand instead of our old box springs. We love the ability to use the remote control to lift the head, feet, or both? Also, all the new things available like massage, and even a night light the glows under the bed! The only way we could afford such luxury was to finance it, and fortunately, they had an interest-free plan that fit our pocketbook. We couldn't be happier with the selection, the service, the delivery, and my wife and I are sleeping much better now Thanks to our Tempurpedic mattress, stand, and BedZzzpresss!

resp.text: Wow, that is amazing! We are so glad Leigh was able to find you the perfect bed and financing! We hope you continue to love it!

name: Sugar Pie Paws
text: My family and I had the absolute BEST mattress shopping experience ever in Homewood with Leigh Huffman! It is not easy for my husband and I to find the perfect mattress because I have 3 herniated discs and terrible back pain and my husband likes a super soft mattress. We literally dread having to go mattress shopping. Lol so many times we have gone to different mattress stores and the sales folks just swarm at you and try to push this or that and pressure you to buy buy buy without really taking the time to understand your needs. Leigh was FABULOUS! She was the most upbeat and happy sales person ..always smiling and even though we had a zillion questions,,,nothing was too much for her...I truly felt that she cared about us as people and really wanted us to be happy with our purchase,,,didn’t pressure us,,,she knew how to LISTEN! I wish more sales folks were like this,,,if you don’t listen to customers how can you match up the right mattress for them? Seems like common sense but way too many times the sales people just don’t listen. Leigh was heaven sent. She not only took all the time we needed, answered all our many questions, but she was sincere and genuine. We can’t thank Leigh and Bedzzz Exprwss enough! Our mattress couldn’t be more perfect! Leigh, my two daughters need a mattress for their homes now and I’m sending them directly to YOU! Thank you thank you thank you! You’re one in a million!

resp.text: Wow! That sounds like an amazing experience! Thank you so much for sharing with us about it! We hope you will love your new bed!

name: Sokol Berisha
text: Service was fantastic. Did not feel pushed to buy anything simply was given information to make a good decision. Would definitely go back.

resp.text: That's the best kind of shopping experience! Thank you for sharing with us!

name: Chuck Terrell

name: Samantha Rudolph
text: We have always been satisfied with the service we received from Ashley Home Store. On August 1st they went above their service to help their customer. My husband was on his way to pick up a set of mattresses for our daughter who had recently moved to Andalusia. He encounter a storm when he arrived at the store the lights were off and no one answered the phone. He thought they were closed but the storm caused a power outage. He saw an Ashley Truck pull in so he followed. The sales person and the delivery men were so nice they delivered the mattress to keep them from getting ruined. Our prayers were answered. Thank you!

name: Rachel Jenkins
text: I bought a sectional from Ashley Furniture for an upstairs room.  The day of delivery I had the home builder on site because I was worried the sectional wouldn’t fit.  I was prepared to remove the door casing if needed to get the sectional into the room.  I told the delivery people to let me know if the casing needed to be removed.  They wedged the corner piece into the room without removing the casing.  The sectional is now permenantly stained with paint from the casing.  The wall and door casing in the entryway are also damaged.  I took photos to document and called Ashley furniture customer service department and spoke to Emily.  Emily sent a professional cleaner out, but the paint could not be removed.  I contacted Emily, and she told me she ordered me another wedge.  At this point, I don’t want to do any more damage. I asked her to discount the sectional and repair the damaged door casing, and I would be happy to keep the sectional with paint on it. Emily told me she could knock $75 off of the price.  I don’t consider that a discount after I paid for delivery and will have to take off work 2 days...once for the professional cleaners and once for the wall to be repaired.  I hope customer service can do more for me to make this right.

resp.text: We have looked into all the aspects of this and we can not find any customer in our database that has this issue. We don't have an Emily that works for us anywhere in the company but if you can please reach out to our store manager (JoAnn) so that we can help you get this resolved. Thank you

name: Phillip Morgan
text: I am from Andalusia and purchased several pieces of furniture from the Andalusia store. Shipping was delayed as that seems to be standard business these days, but Joann the store manager found a display couch in the warehouse got it approved and saved me a return trip to Auburn as we are moving our daughter in Saturday. If companies don't start thinking about customers as people many will be going out of business, thank you Joann for dealing in reality, you are the best.

resp.text: Thank you for your review and your business with our store. We will pass on your comments to the store personnel and we look forward to your return for other product you may need.

name: Kelsy Ward
text: I went in this store and purchased a couch and loveseat. I ordered it in a cobblestone color. Well, today my couches arrived and they are brown. I stopped the delivery men immediately and proceeded to call Joann at the store. After waiting 10-15 minutes on the phone while she looked for my order, she admitted she had written down the wrong number for the color I wanted. Mind you, I’ve already moved all my old furniture out of my living room, I have 2 kids, and my couches were to be delivered today. I was not expecting such a big error. So my solution was, I’ll keep the brown couches and you can just issue me a partial refund since it was your mistake. Do you know the only thing that she was willing to refund was the delivery fee? I thought a partial refund was fair to ask for since it was her error. Not pleased at all.

resp.text: We do apologize for this error and there is more options for us to make this right for you. We do pride ourselves on customer service. We will contact the store and speak to the manager and then contact you concerning this situation.

name: Mike W
text:
Wanted to express my thanks for the high level of service we received after our furniture purchase last year.
We purchased the Bladen Living room set from the Andalusia store and have been very pleased with the purchase. A few weeks ago we had a unfortunate incident occur when left 2 of our cushions damaged, and in need of replacement. I contacted Ashley Furniture and spoke with JoAnn. After explaining my situation, she without hesitation listened to my concerns, and made things right ordering 2 new items for our couch, receiving them a few weeks later.
You commonly do not see this level of attentiveness, and heightened customer service in retail, but Ashley furniture in Andalusia, it’s staff and management made the difference.

name: Melissa Copeland
text:
As I was preparing to purchase, a mattress, I stopped in and met Kerri.  She seemed to know, I wanted my experienced made quickly; with that being said, she ask we what type of mattress I wanted, I told her and she directed me to three.  LIKE the child's story of the 3 Bears .....I selected the first one.

I must say, my experience was very rewarding for us all.  Kerri is very knowledgeable and willing to make you happy, she doesn't just sell you something, she actually follows through.  The delivery staff Austin and Anthony were professional and on time.  ON TIME is huge these days, schedule are tight.  These two gentlemen were out of Huntsville, I pray they have safe travel home.
Once again, I want to thank you all for this experience and also allowing me to ourchase something truly made in thr USA
Now we waiting on night fall so, I may go to bed.  I know I will love this bed.

Sincerely
Melissa Copeland

text: Cedric was informative and helpful. We did not have to make a second trip to the store to decide on the bed right for us. A pleasant experience.

name: Ben Baker
text: Cedric (our mattress matching associate) and Phil (the manager) were both excellent to work with in finding our new mattress. Cedric was very attentive through the whole process. Cedric was extremely knowledgeable on not only the mattress but the medical expertise behind its benefits (as he has a medical background). They made us feel comfortable and welcomed during our entire stay (which for finding, discussing and buying a mattress was extremely fast). Would definitely recommend sleep number mattresses to all my friends and family, 10/10 would recommend asking for Cedric when finding your mattress.

name: Roy Edgar
text:
Salesman didn’t tell me I needed brackets to attach headboard. The don’t stock in store and my only way to get is to order them. 3-4 days to get and my bed delivery is next day. His only solution was to transfer me to cooperate which is closed on Sunday and of course didn’t tell me that either.
I’ll call and cancel my order tomorrow. Lost a $7000 sale because according to Cedric (salesman) it’s my fault since I didn’t order them.

resp.text:
We're sorry to hear about your experience, Roy. If you haven't cancelled your order yet, we hope you'll give us a call so we can see how we're best able to assist you.
sleepnumber.com/contact-us

name: Anna Kenkel
text: The staff was fabulous!  Everyone was so helpful and I never felt pressure to buy.  Sarah helped me over 3 visits and knew everything possible about the products.  Cedric was so sweet and helpful. Lexie was a pro at helping me find the right pillow! Thank you!

name: David Adams
text: I already had a bed that lifted your head up, but not the feet, it made a big difference on how my back felt when lifing my feet.The settigs you can change is also a plus to make it feel like you want it to.

name: Austin Bartolo
text: The Sleep Number staff were professional, fun, and knowledgeable.  They answered all of our questions and we were happy and satisfied after the visit.  As we wait for our bed to be made and delivered, we were able to bring home the pillows and mattress pad/cover.  We noticed a huge difference between the Sleep Number pillows and our My Pillow pillows.  We absolutely love our Sleep Number pillows.  I'm already getting better sleep with the pillow.  We can't wait to have our Sleep Number bed delivered.  Looking forward to years of restful sleep.

name: Faye Gurley
text: We have had our sleep number bed for at least 20 years and still love it but was disappointed with Montgomery store when I went in to buy new pillowcases.  I kept saying pillowcases and the sales person kept showing me the ones with the zipper.  Finally bought four and thought that maybe they had made changes since I got mine years ago.  Decided to go online after I got home and they do have regular pillowcases so I went to store the next day to return.  A different sales person was there and he did have enough knowledge to tell me that separate pillowcases were not sold in the store.  I was returning the ones I bought and I was in the store for over 30 minutes while he read the manual to try and figure out how to do a refund.  Then when he finally got it done, he only refunded 3 and I had bought 4.  When he tried to do the other one he messed up something and couldn't get it done.  Asked if he could get his manager to do it when she came in later and I said yes.  I finally get the refund for the 3 but almost a week later, I am still waiting on the refund for the remaining 1.  I will order what I need online and will not go back in that store ever again.

resp.text: We're very sorry for the experience you've had! We appreciate you bringing this to our attention, and we will make sure your concerns are shared with leadership for further review and training purposes. For additional assistance with your return and refund, please give us a call at 1-888-411-2270 from 8AM-8PM CST M-F or from 8:30AM-5PM on Saturdays.

name: Josh Partin
text: Customer service was top priority here , every step of the way . Wonderful buying experience you don't get everywhere . Thanks!

name: Danny G.
text: Employee could not work after 7pm and asked us to leave!

resp.text: We appreciate you sharing this with us, Danny. We've passed along your review to our Leadership as well.

name: Mark Wise
text: Our sales person (Lexie) was great.

name: Terri Adams
text: I purchased a C4 less than two years ago. The worse purchase ever. It has made my back pain worse. The air chambers are not holding, needs repair. Donating to charity. Hate this bed. Waste of money.

resp.text: We'd like to help, Terri! When you have a moment, please give our Customer Service Team a call at 1-888-411-2270 from 8AM-8PM CST M-F or from 8:30AM-5PM on Saturdays so we can explore a solution to resolve your concerns.

name: Janice Jones Sanders
text: I am looking forward to purchasing two to three sleep number mattresses.  The customer service was excellent and I truly appreciated them taking the time with my family and I to demonstrate how great these beds and accessories are.

text: Glorified air mattresses! There is nothing to these beds. Outragesly over priced and will not work with you at all on the price.They state they offer military discount but only 2 days a year. What about the rest of the year people are still in the military? I purchased a nice tempur-pedic from another bed store down the street for almost half the price and got 2 free pillows.

resp.text: Thanks for your thoughts and feedback, Steven. While our beds are a lot more sophisticated and intricate than just a standard air mattress, we understand that they may not be for everyone.

text: Adam is possibly the nicest guy you'll meet. He was beyond patient while my wife and I tried to decide what mattress to buy. We went to the store multiple times over several weeks and he was always friendly and willing to answer our questions. We ultimately settled on a split king set and after  some time we just weren't loving it. Bedzzz Express had us covered with their comfort guarantee though and now we have a standard king size mattress we are very happy with and were able to get accessories and such to use up the difference of our exchange. Couldn't ask for more! Would recommend Adam and Bedzzz Express to anyone!

name: James Brooks
text: I highly recommend purchasing furniture here. The owner is a very kind man who you can tell has been in the business for a very long time. When purchasing something that can cost as much as furniture does now, it is important to purchase from someone who will honor their word. Not only did they offer several ways for us to finance, but delivery quick being recently relocated to this remote area in Alabama and no family to help move furniture was extremely nice. The owner gave us real honest advice not based off purely an income percentage of what he would receive on each piece. Because we were buying a complete living room and bedroom package including a mattress it was a big purchase and he was willing to help with the more that we purchased. I recently have had several back surgeries and the mattress was the most important piece. He personally spent quite a while with us walking through explaining the purpose of each detail on each mattress and again we were first time home buyers so we didn't really know what we were doing with buying a mattress; never had anything besides hand-me-downs. All in all an incredible experience and would recommend anyone who desires longevity with their purchase of something this magnitude to not buy second hand stuff and purchase from Harvey's where they keep their promises!!!!!!!

name: Jeremy
text:
I LOVE MattressFIRM!  Why?  Because not only do they have THE best Sleep Consultants, but they also have 5 Advantages that really show why they are THE #1 Sleep Store in the country:

1)  The Low Price Guarantee (If you find a better price somewhere else, get it written down and they will beat it by 10% or the mattress is free.)

2) Red Carpet Delivery Service (even SAME DAY Delivery in most areas),

3) they have THE Largest Selection of beds (the company's buying power allows them to pass THE best Savings and Selection on to you)

4) they are involved in our Local Community (currently accepting ANY donations for Foster Kids - clothing, toys, monetary, etc.  Even if you don't need a new Sleep System, if you want to help the Birmingham Community by giving to local Foster Kids, then just simply stop by ANY of the 18 greater Birmingham locations and place your donation in the bin located inside the store.)

5) and MOST importantly:  the Sleep Happy Guarantee - this is my favorite.  It allows you to pick a new mattress, try it out for 120 nights, and if you don't sleep happy within those 120 nights, (for a small processing fee) you can do a one time return or exchange!  (Go back into ANY MattressFIRM and pick out another mattress if you think your mattress wasn't perfect the first time!)

name: Tracy Lovelady
text: We went to three different locations in our area and researched online for what we were looking for. My husband and I both have had neck surgeries and we didn't need something being sold to us just bc it had all the bells and whistles.  We needed something that would truly benefit us and our needs. At Bedzzz Express we had assistance from both Dana and Kendall. We immediately felt aheartfelt honesty from Dana because he had similar health issues as my husband and I and could really emphasize.  He was very knowledgeable of his products and was able to explain why certain products worked better for us vs. others. We even left to think about it and went back to another location for, what we thought was a better price, and still went back to Dana. If it meant we had more peace of mind in the product we were buying bc of better advice given, then back to the best it was. And then he assured us he would match any price needed, so we had no worries. If you're in the market for a new mattress, we highly recommend these guys! Thanks again for being so patient with us and allowing us to harass you for multiple visits before making our final decision.

resp.text: That sounds like an amazing experience with Dana and Kendall! We hope you will love your bed and that it will ultimately help with your health! Let us know if we can help you with anything else!

name: Catherine David
text: Would like to thank Michael Gabriel for his professionalism on helping me pick mattresses & his honesty choosing exactly what we needed.  He  accommodated us in every way possible !  Thank you Michael - we will recommend Sleep Center because of you !  What an outstanding employee !

resp.text: Thank you Mrs. David for the recommendation. It was a pleasure helping you with your selection.

name: Keisha Rainey
text: I came in looking at mattresses. Michael  gave a brief overview of them. He checked on me to see how I was doing and explain the differences in the mattresses. He showed excellent customer service to me and others that came in the store as well. I would definitely recommend anyone to come here. You will not be disappointed.

resp.text: Thank you Keisha! We appreciate awesome customers like you!

name: Dayana Boza Molina
text: Very good attention, when I bought the bed they gave me a great discount and the shipping was free, I am very happy with my new bed

resp.text: We always enjoy taking care of people ! We are glad that we were able to take of your needs and that you are happy with your mattress!

name: Felipe Soto
text: excellent service, very good attention, the sellers are very friendly and attentive, the shipping services are very fast, only 1 day after the purchase, my new bed arrived

resp.text: Thanks so much Mr. Soto for your kind words !! We strive to give every customer the best service possible !!

name: B Patrick
text: Chloee is awesome!  She’s very helpful and helped us with the best price for mattresses for my children.  100% would recommend!

name: George Malatinszky
text: Really professional and cordial sales and delivery team.

resp.text: George, we are glad that you are satisfied with our service. Thank you for the review.

name: Mullet Point
text: Michael was very helpful, friendly and knowledgeable. We appreciate him helping us to decide on a mattress and setup. Thank you.

name: Claire MacDonald
text: This is my third purchase from the Sleep Center. Nathan and Michael know their stuff and give great guidance while not being overbearing. The only things they sell are mattresses, unlike furniture stores,  so they are highly knowledgeable about their products.  The owner is active in the store and available to customers. Delivery is quick and professional. Outstanding customer support start to finish.

name: Alissa Sellers
text: My fiance, Peyton, and I recently purchased a California king mattress from The Sleep Center. We had looked several other places prior to going here, but we consistently had the same experience of feeling like they were just trying to make a sale and sell us the most expensive mattress they could. However, at The Sleep Center, it was completely different. I think Michael was the guy that helped us; he was incredibly helpful and patient with us. He showed us our lower priced options, even if they were way below our budget, which I appreciated. We ended up finding one that we both loved but was above our budget, so he was able to lower the price to stay below our budget. Excellent customer service and interpersonal skills!

name: Ben Beard
text:
Due to unfortunate life circumstances, I’ve found myself in need of a new bed a few times in the last few years.

Michael has taken fantastic care of me every time I’ve been to The Sleep Center. The customer service here is phenomenal, the rest of the reviews can attest to that. He is knowledgeable and will go out of his way to ensure you have what you need.

The second time I needed a bed I was in a difficult situation during the holidays and their truck drivers were on vacation. Michael personally helped load the bed on the back of my truck after hours in order to get me what I needed as soon as possible. I am a fan of this company and these guys.

I have recommended them to a few people and even took my girlfriend to get a new bed recently. After feeling how comfortable mine is and what a great nights sleep it offers, she had to have her own. I wouldn’t let her go anywhere else.

Thank you Michael for your great customer service and your knowledge, and thank you Nathan for your great establishment! You have a customer for as long as I am in the Mobile area.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words Ben!

name: Pauline Mckean
text: Michael was extremely helpful and very knowledgeable...we appreciate his honesty and direction on purchasing our sons mattress for his new home! Highly recommend Michael!

name: Shantae Fox
text: If your looking for a great FAMILY run business to make you feel like a valued customer, you cannot go wrong here!!! I loved every moment of the experience here. The minute I stepped in the door Michael greeted us and asked us if we needed anything he wasn’t pushy or (salesperson-ish) lol he was full of useful information when asked. We got the best deal between numerous stores an countless website searches. If your looking for great service and an awesome deal here is the place!!!! Thank y’all so much!!

name: Jeffrey Melson
text: The salesman, Michael, was extremely helpful and informative. My wife and I looked around and then left to talk it over. We called after we decided to buy from Sleep Center and they delivered the mattress and set it up 3 hours later. The delivery men were careful, polite, and set the mattress up quickly. Couldn’t ask for better service.

name: Peyton Lott
text: The Sleep Center had exactly what my fiancée and I were looking for. Great service, affordable prices, and people who care more about helping you in the best way than just making another sale. I’d recommend this place to anyone!

name: Walt McKean
text: Excellent service with honest sales team. Lead me to the right bed at the right price.

resp.text: We are so happy that you are happy with your purchase!

name: Shannon Williams
text: Great customer service Cloee was very helpful in finding the perfect mattress! Thanks!

name: Shakiera Brown
text: More than just a typical mattress store, The Sleep Center really cares about your well-being!! I have back problems, in which I required a quality mattress that fitted my needs. April was very knowledgeable of the type of mattress I required, but what really impressed me was her patience and southern hospitality. When you come to The Sleep Center, they make you feel as if you are family!! I highly recommend this store.

name: Jalal Amle
text: It’s very good service In the shop

name: Kim Borthen
text: I normally don't take time out to write a review, even for great service. Michael and the owner Nathan were accommodating and very professional. I visited other mattress stores in the surrounding area and found them to be too aggressive. Sad to say, but I felt as if the other store PRIOR to my purchase with The Sleep Center had forced me on a bed, ready to swipe my card and ship me to my home. Excellent service, Kim

name: Alphonso Gilmore
text: Top notch customer service!!! I just moved to Mobile, Al and needed a quality mattress. Not only did I receive a quality mattress with a affordable price, Michael (the owner)provided me Southern hospitality in which I now have a extended family. If you desire a patient, caring, and knowledgeable sales team when shopping for a bedroom mattress, I highly recommend The Sleep Center.

name: Murphy Bishop, II
text: Michael was excellent at helping me pick out a mattress.  I actually bought two since I was comfortable, not rushed and not pressured.  I shared my budget and was directed to options in my range.  I appreciate the ease of this transaction. I will be back.

name: MikeandTonya Harold
text: We had a great experience. The customer service was phenomenal. Chloe was courteous and knowledgeable. We purchased a twin bed for our son and I’d be happy to shop here again.

name: Jessica Driskell
text: So glad we stopped in!!!  April was so helpful!!!  She really took our needs and was able to find the perfect fit. Amazing experience!

name: Richard Nameniuk
text: Best place to buy a mattress hands down!  Mike (the manager) provided the best customer service and no-pressure atmosphere.  Delivery team was on time, careful and polite.  We tried a couple other mattress stores and were not impressed.  Will only buy from here in the future.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words Richard!

name: Bryan Newburn
text: Michael was great help in finding the best fit for what we wanted in a mattress. We never felt pressured to buy anything. I highly recommend him if your looking for bedding needs.

name: Marco A Miranda
text: Walked into this store and was very happy I did. All my questions were answered straightforwardly. Michael is not only helpful, but also, honest and transparent. This place is legit.

name: Wanda Prewitt
text: I shopped all over Mobile for a mattress and went to several furniture shops with pushy salespeople and unclean mattresses but that was not my experience at Sleep Center. The place and mattresses were clean and April was helpful/knowledgeable but not pushy. Thanks for a great experience.

resp.text: Thank you Wanda! We take great pride in providing a clean and comfortable atmosphere for our customers.Thank you for noticing!

name: Christian Leman
text: A few weeks ago I went to Sleep Center to purchase a king bed frame to fix a customers bed. While checking out the cashier could not get my receipt to print out. He was able to get my credit card receipt to print. I asked if this would work if I needed to return the bed frame. He said and I left. The bed frame ended up not working. I went to return the bed frame today and I was told they only return mattresses. This would have been great to know when I checked out as I only purchased something the cashier knew was non returnable. I understand stores must have policies for liability reasons etc, they must be up front with these. I purchased this not knowing if I needed to save time and serve my customer I. The best way possible. Now I am eating $75. I would not have purchased this if I knew it was non returnable.

resp.text: Mr. Leman, please contact the store at your earliest convenience to resolve this matter. You are entitled to a refund and I apologize you were told other wise. Thank you and I am very sorry for your inconvenience.

name: Brittany Dueitt
text:
Let me start with the fact that I had my 4 year old son with me! The moment we walked in the door the staffed made us very welcomed.  They have an amazing little play center where I could watch him play and still focus on why I was there in the first place.
I was torn between two types of mattresses both of which were in the store.    The salesman who helped me was very knowledgeable about both.  He wasn't pushy and didn't linger around while I was trying to make my decision, but was close enough to answer any questions I had.  The staff even moved around several mattresses to different bases so that I would know exactly what I was getting.
Delivery was very smooth! Although the poor guys delivering got soaked.  They delivered the same day in the middle of a storm, the were very polite.  They even took my old mattress set away!
Overall I am very pleased and would recommend anyone who is in the market for a new bed/mattress visit the Sleep Center! They have amazing staff and GREAT prices!

resp.text: We are so happy to help. Thanks for your 5-star review, Brittany!

name: brett garrick
text: Great folks and great prices. I bought my second bed from them a few days ago and it was delivered and set up promptly. The service on the sales floor by Michael was above and beyond. Very quick, positive experience and i'm sleeping better because of it.

name: Beth Lyons
text: We were very happy with the Sleep Center!!  We picked them because of their positive reviews!! Our visit was just how the reviews stated. We were welcomed, asked how they could help, and immediately taken to the exact area of the store we needed. We were given the exact information we needed to make our decision and then left alone, (with no pressure) to try out all the mattresses we wanted.  We made our decision, paid and we’re out the door in under 30 mins!!!  Better yet!, the store had our mattress in the store and it was delivered the next day exactly when they said they would be here.  The delivery crew were nice, courteous  and set the mattress and box spring up on our bed frame in minutes!! We will go back to Sleep Center again for sure!!!

resp.text: Thank you Beth!

name: Ericka Blevins
text: The staff was patient and very knowledgeable.  They were genuinely interested in our needs and went out of their way to make sure we were comfortable with our decisions.   They stand by their product and there was no hassle trading out or getting a different product.  Luving these guy and gals.

resp.text: We luv serving our customers! Thank you Ericka!

name: gary merritt
text: Great prices, great customer service and I will do business here again in the future. I appreciate the warranty is handled at the store of the purchase. My wife is happy so I am happy.

resp.text: Thank you Gary!

name: Nick Ousley
text: Michael helped my wife and I select a great bed when we were looking for a new one. We had a basic knowledge of what we were looking for, and upon entering the store, he offered a couple of minutes of direction and information before stepping away to let us browse for ourselves without pressure. He was always near at hand for questions, however there was no pressure to buy.  Any concerns or questions were answered in a very professional, understanding manner.  We received an awesome price on a movable king sized bed along with accessories, delivery was a breeze (the delivery team arrived on time and were done in 30 minutes), and we couldn't be happier with our experience.

resp.text: Thank you for sharing!!

name: Chris Wright
text: Came in just to look and compare prices, ended up leaving with a great mattress that my wife and I both agreed on, along with a new friend. Michael is a great salesman, doesn't hover over you like a vulture waiting on you to die like most other salesmen. Enjoyed the service and the conversation we came back and have already picked out a new mattress for our son as well! Enjoyed our experience so much, we even came back and brought thank you gifts!

resp.text: Thank you for your business, the laugh and the king cake! Great review!

name: Lisa Molyneux
text: My husband and I have bought three mattresses in the last three years and two of those in the last 4  months from the Sleep Center. The staff has been so helpful each visit. When I visited last, they new who I was and that I was a regular customer, and still fantastic service and attention. The staff is helpful, but not pushy nor do they hover. Great experience and will continue to shop with The Sleep Center.

resp.text: Thank you Lisa! Always a pleasure to serve you and your family!

name: Melissa Wright
text: Michael Gabriel is amazing. I absolutely HATE salesmen, but he isn't pushy or obnoxious. We had intended to buy from another very popular Mattress store which I won't name, and changed our mind after dealing with Michael. He's very knowledgeable, helpful and friendly. We are very pleased with our mattress that we purchased plus the extras, and will be customers for life. Thank you for everything Michael.

resp.text: Thank you Melissa!!

name: Krystal Smith
text: This place is great!!! Cloee was so kind and professional. The prices were amazing. Michael was fabulous too. The mattress is incredible and they even threw in some fantastic “freebies”, as well!!!!

resp.text: Thanks Krystal!

name: Rachel Hartley Hester
text: Michael has helped my family with all our mattress and bedding needs. He and the staff there are so helpful and eager to accommodate. He makes the buying process so easy. Thank you!

name: Stefanie Davis
text: I will tell people about this place. Michael was our salesman and I was very happy walking out of this business. He didn't try and sell me the most expensive mattress and answered all my questions. This was my second place I looked. I walked out the 1st mattress place sick to my stomach from the over the top prices. The sleep center is very affordable, and the customer service is top notch. I bought an adjustable split king base with mattress and I can't wait to sleep like an angel. Check them out.....

resp.text: Thank you so much Stefanie!

name: Susan Havard
text: I cannot say enough good things about the Sleep Center and especially Nathan. My mother purchased a mattress from them a few years ago.  Recently, the mattress became soft and not as supportive as she needed. Nathan helped us with the warranty process and went the extra mile to help determine what mattress to swap out for, even though there was absolutely nothing in it for him, as it was all done through the mattress company.  You will not be disappointed if you buy from them. Very knowledgeable about mattresses and stand behind their products.

resp.text: We are happy to help, Susan. Thanks for the 5-star review and for allowing our families to serve yours!

name: Bee A
text: Visited your store just to look on February 8, 2019. Michael was so helpful that we bought a mattress that day. Extremely helpful. He made sure to explain all the differences in what I was looking for. He made sure I was happy with what I was purchasing and it will be delivered this afternoon. I will be going back to this store.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review!!

name: Julia Myers
text: My husband and I purchased a new bed frame, mattress and box springs from Sleep Center last week and had a great experience! The sales associates were very nice, gave us honest opinions about different mattresses, and were very informative. The guys that delivered our bed were very polite and fast.

resp.text: Thank you Julia!

name: Hugo Seda
text: Could not recommend this place highly enough. Truly exceptional sales staff. Mike was a joy to chat with. Don’t look anywhere else in Mobile for your mattress needs.

name: Rick Clayton
text: Wonderful staff super helpful second time I've done business with them and would recommend them to everyone

resp.text: It is always pleasure to take care of our repeat customers! Thank you for coming back to see us!

name: Larry Gill
text: Recently visited the Sleep Center on Airport Blvd., Mobile , Alabama, to inquire on an adjustable bed for our dad, an 86 year-old, Korean War Veteran.  "Mike" was the ultimate sales representative: Welcoming; Courteous; Knowledgeable.  The deal was sealed and purchases made.  Thank you!  We will be repeat customers!

resp.text: Thank you Larry!! It is ALWAYS our honor to serve those that have served us in the military! Your whole family was a pleasure!

name: Mary McGuire
text: I bought a mattress several months ago and have been very happy with the purchase.  Michael Gabriel was wonderful.  I brought my daughter in this pass weekend and  Michael was very patient and informative helping my daughter pick out a mattress.    Wonderful people to work with.  Definitely deserve the 5 star rating.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the wonderful review!

name: Shelli Parker
text: I purchased an adjustable base for my bed a year or so ago from The Sleep Center. The employees were so helpful and informative.  I had to purchase another base and mattress for my mother this time. I drove from Mississippi (for the second time) to purchase my item from The Sleep Center.  Once again, the employee that helped me (Michael) was knowledgeable and eager to make me happy!  I told him my budget and he worked hard to accommodate that amount! The delivery and setup was amazing as well!   Best place to buy a mattress or base!!!

resp.text: Thank you, Shelli!

name: Dakota Crawford
text: Came in looking for a simple mattress in a box that would work for my pockets and as soon as I walked in I felt welcomed. The lady helped find a bed that worked for my body and did it all by how my body reacts when I sleep. Bout time I left I had a honestly get a quality mattress for a great price and with their layaway plans and free delivery I walked out so happy. Hella recommend!!!!!!!! 😍😍😍😍💖💖💖

resp.text: Thanks Dakota! So happy you enjoyed your experience!!

name: Vicki Atchison
text: We spent half a day going around  town trying to find this awesome pillow called "The BedBoss".  We were happy to find it at the Sleep Center at a great price. Super helpful and friendly staff made the shopping experience great.  Highly recommend.

resp.text: Thank you for shopping with us Vicki!! We appreciate your business!!

name: Abigail Schjott
text: These guys are amazing! This was my first mattress hunting experience and the store manager Michael was more than knowledgeable in his answers to my questions and made the process very easy! I purchased two mattresses, one for myself and one for my mother and the two men who delivered them were very helpful, professional, and quick! They also worked with our schedule very well on a day and time for delivery! The free local delivery was amazing being as we are two females with no truck. Thank you again guys!

resp.text: Thank you, Abigail. We appreciate you shopping with us!

name: Tayler Hughes
text: Took no time at all and went home with a wonderful matress!

name: Michelle Lartigue
text: Wonderful experience from start to finish. Michael our sales associate was extremely knowledgeable, professional and friendly. The owner made us feel welcome and truly appreciated our business. Our mattress was delivered the same day we bought it.  The delivery men were very polite, friendly and did a great job setting up our new mattress. Will highly recommend Sleep Center to friends and family.

resp.text: Thank you, Michelle!

name: ALAN LAPENNA
text: Walked in Monday evening after spending the entire day moving into our new house, needed to purchase a full for a crib conversion.  Nathan was supper helpful and very knowledgeable.  He did not try to up sale me, and I was out the door with the new mattress in less than 15 minutes.  This is the second time I have purchased from this store and location and will do so for future purchases.

resp.text: Thanks for sharing and being a great customer!

name: P Bassett
text: This is the place, if you are looking for a new mattress set!  We went to many stores before finding this jewel.  The Sleep Center has quite the selection and very knowledgeable staff.  We found the mattresses that we needed/wanted at a wonderful price (compared to the other places we had visited).  P.S. Our salesman Michael was went the extra mile explaining everything to us.

resp.text: We are so happy to assist and appreciate your business very much!

name: Bryan J.
text: I just want to give a personal shout out to Micheal Gabriel. Thanks for all the help and recommendations. I have honestly had the best sleep in forever. When you're military and need a great deal I recommend Sleep Center.

resp.text: Thank you, Bryan. We really do appreciate you shopping with us!

name: Mark Manning
text: I purchased a Sealy queen mattress and box spring from The Sleep Center and had the absolute best buying experience. Cloee knew anything and everything about each bed in the showroom, and answered all of my questions with a smile. As soon as she greeted me, I knew I had chosen the right store. Michael, the manager, was also extremely professional, and stood by his sales associates. Even the delivery guys were pleasant and very courteous. I will definitely be doing business with them again.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave a great review Mark!

name: David Bailey
text: Shane waited on us and was very knowledgeable of the different profucts they carry. We made our first purchase and went back last week and purchased another mattress set. Michael was also very helpful when Shane was at a different store. Shane had talked with Michael to fill him in on what we were looking for. They worked as a team which I thought was great! The delivery went very smoothly as well. Great place! I've already suggested to others about our great experience! 👍🏻😉

resp.text: Thanks so much, David!

name: Juan hernandez
text: Michael was once again great and helped get us a good deal!!

resp.text: Thank you Juan!

name: Jesse W
text: The Sleep Center is amazing to shop at. Michael was fantastic and did not pressure us to buy anything and in fact tried to help us save money. He understood that buying a mattress is a long term investment and didn't pressure us to buy "right now".  In fact it took us several months of looking and researching to finally buy. And after 6 months of sleeping on the mattress, it was the best decision we made. They also price match and when my sister bought a mattress in TN she used this stores pricing to be matched since the sleep center did not have a store in her area. Overall it was the best store we went to with amazing customer service from start to delivery.

resp.text: Thank you, Jesse! We are thankful for your business and kind words.

name: Tracy Bumpus
text: The customer service was fantastic.  I was a difficult customer and they never lost their patience with me and showed great compassion when trying to find a bed that would be best for sleeping on my stomach.  They gave me credit for a previously purchased bed and made sure I was comfortable with my purchase before I left the store.  Upon delivery, the staff was quick, friendly, and efficient.

resp.text: Thanks for allowing us to care for your sleep needs, Tracy!

name: Collin Smith
text:
With this being our first ever endeavor to go out and find 'The mattress' for me and the wife. We didn't really know what to expect from a mattress store nor from a mattress salesman, but fortunately we stumbled into the right place. We were immediately greeted by David W. Who knew when to give us our space and when to point us to the right mattress from the description we gave concerning how we slept and what we were expecting from a mattress. Not only did this store provide excellent customer service but they provided the best prices compared to some of the other local mattress centers.
I give sleep center 👍👍...

resp.text: We greatly appreciate your business and kind words, Collin. It's our pleasure to assist. Thank you!

name: Katie O'Neill
text: I flew in late one afternoon and was desperate to find a bed to be delivered the next morning. I went straight to The Sleep Center and the guys there were incredibly helpful and kind and were able to deliver me the perfect bed the next morning. I have now had this bed for a couple of weeks and I couldn't be happier with my choice. I  would recommend this business to everyone.

resp.text: So very kind, Katie! Thank you!

name: Mitteer 2005
text: I highly recommend this Sleep Center on Airport. Micheal Gabriel, and Nathan were fantastic. These two went out of their way to help us with a mattress, and we even learned a bit about a Dyson vacuum! If I could give them more than 5 stars I would. This is our second mattress from here, and we couldn't be happier.

resp.text: We love hearing of happy sleepers. And we greatly appreciate your business and 5-star review!

name: Ronnie Tindle
text: Stopped by with my 82 year old mom to get a new mattress with power frame. Michael was very patient with us as we tried what seemed  every mattress in the store. He stayed right with us a explained that the most expensive is not always the best fit. We left and went to eat lunch and he was not pressuring us. Went back after discussing it and made the purchase. He reduced the price and also gave us some free items. We had already checked around and their quality and helpfulness is what brought us back. Also while checking out we were talking with Michael and Cloee and she made sure that all the information about delivery was on mom’s paperwork so she could understand it. Overall this was an excellent shopping experience for me and my mom. Thank you.

resp.text: It is always our pleasure to assist and we greatly appreciate your business, Ronnie. Thank you for taking the time to leave us such a thoughtful 5-star review!

name: Stacey Dotson
text: Sleep Center was awesome! Before them we went to different company’s store to buy a tempur-pedic. Told them I would pay cash but they did not have an interest in keeping our business so we left and went to sleep center. Upon arrival we were able to get helped with what we wanted and got freebies on top of it! I truly appreciate the effort given by Mike to help us get the most out of our purchase. I highly recommend visiting the sleep center on airport blvd!

resp.text: Thank you Stacey!

name: Wayne Boyd
text: This is mattress number 3 I have purchased there.  TMC is a great locally owned business.  They have treated me right over 8 years.  Go there first because they will have the best price and actually sell you what you need at a great price.

resp.text: Thank you, Wayne!

name: Garland Ritchie
text: We stopped by the Airport Blvd store. Johnny greeted us and introduced himself. We told him what type of bed we were looking for and our budget. Johnny took us right to two beds. He did not have to look around to figure out where the beds were located. Johnny answered our questions about the bed and even excused himself while we laid on the bed for a few minutes. He did not stand there and keep talking to us. That allowed us to discuss bed with each other. He showed us a couple of other beds and treated us the same when we tried them out. We purchased a mattress set within our budget. Johnny was great to work with and I recommend asking for him if you visit the Airport Blvd store.

resp.text: Thank you, Garland!

name: Charles Hines
text:
I usually don’t leave reviews, even for exceptional service. I felt that this was something I wanted to share with everyone who is looking to buy a mattress.
When I buy a mattress it’s like buying a car, my wife and I went to 4 stores, one of them had aggressive sales pitch tactics, this may be why they have the word “FIRM” in their name.
Anyways, I was talking with the guys at the fire station and they started to rave about the mattresses they had slept on at another fire station. They said they would do business with The sleep center when it came time to buy for there home. So since this owner took care of my friends I decided I would check them out. When we walked in the door the manager met us with a hello from the back of the store, he saw that we had two kids and asked if we cared if they played in a children’s area (Automatically we were less stressed) so while the kids played he asked the standard questions and then directed us to three types to choose from but then something amazing happened.... he left us alone! Lol, me an my wife were able to lay on each bed and were able to be honest with ourselves  about the comfort and the cost. At one point we were worried because we didn’t hear our kids yelling like usually, well that’s because the manager was keeping them entertained. The whole process took about 1 hour which is mainly because we couldn’t decide which bed to buy. They were able to give us the best offer we have found out of all four stores and then even added some incentives! Do yourself a favor!! GO HERE FIRST, I promise you, you are wasting your time if you go anywhere else.
P.S. Thank you for taking care of first responders, that goes a long way, now I just have to talk my Chief in replacing my mattress at the fire station! Lol
Thanks again- Forever Customer

resp.text: Thank you Charles for the kind review!

name: Austin Johnson
text: Wonderful people! Worked with me and my wife to find the perfect bed for my bad back. Couldn’t be happier with the bed and the price I paid for it. Highly recommend them to anyone shopping for a new bed.

resp.text: It was our pleasure to assist you, Austin!

name: Genevieve Cotton
text: Amazing quality mattresses and Cloee is so sweet and helpful.

resp.text: Thank you so Genevieve! We think you are awesome too!

name: CHARLOTTE WATTS
text: Awesome service

resp.text: Thanks so much for the compliments about our service . We strive to make sure that every customer has a great experience . Thank you for allowing us to serve you.

name: ALEXIS DAVIS
text: Me and my mother went into this store today and immediately was helped by the manager Michael who was amazing and answered every question we had to ask and my mom is really picky lol we originally only went in to get a new queen mattress for my room but my mom fell in love with a king mattress and claimed she needed a new one also! Hands down one of the best costumer service experience we've had

resp.text: We are happy to help and appreciate your visit, and the kind words, too, Alexis!

name: amber roberson
text: This was one of the best shopping experiences I have ever had. I went in completely ignorant when it came to mattress shopping. The store was very clean and orderly. The staff was very nice amd helpful. They took their time in helping me pick the best mattress for me. Gave me plenty of information on each piece. They delivered the same day and with my schedule in mind. Very professional environment and sales team. Highly recommend this store. They have earned a life long customer.

resp.text: Thank you, Amber!

name: Bruno Rivasplata
text: Mike and Shane worked out the perfect deal for me. I was in and out The Sleep Center for 2 months while I made my decision, and they gave me excellent customer service each and every time. I highly recommend this location to everyone.

resp.text: It is our pleasure to serve your mattress needs, Bruno. Thanks for your business and kind words!

name: Kokeshia Foster
text: Cloee was so helpful. She was super friendly and helpful. I got exactly what I was looking for within my budget!

resp.text: We are so happy you enjoyed your experience!!

name: Mayra Ordoñez

name: Ashley Woodruff
text:
My husband & I have experienced three different Sleep center locations: Dothan, Al, Enterprise, Al, & Mobile, Al. All three of these stores have had exceptional customer service and an amazing inventory. Every staff member has been able to answer all of our questions or knows who to ask to get them.

We made our mattress purchase at the Mobile, Al location on Airport Blvd. Our sales reps were Michael & Nathan. Both of these gentlemen were extremely knowledgeable and helpful. We already knew which mattress we wanted from our previous trips to Enterprise/Dothan but they helped us pick out the perfect mattress cover/protector & sheets that would help alleviate my husbands severe allergies. Nathan also went to great lengths to get us the best discounts and price for our purchases.

The delivery of our new king mattress went smoothly. Our apartments are in Saraland, which is free, and our unit is on the 3rd floor. The delivery guys carried it up with no issues and were very friendly and helpful.

Overall I would say that our experience has been amazing with every Sleep Center we have worked with. This is a great place to make a mattress purchase. They have a wide range of brands/prices & several special mattresses for allergy prone clients.

resp.text: Thanks for shopping with us and taking the time to leave us such kind words!

name: Jay Schwartz
text:
This place made my shopping fun and educational.  Everything they carry is nothing but highly quality name brand product.  The store manager, Michael, is one of the friendliest, and probably one of the most honest persons, you will ever meet.

After losing all my belongings in a fire, I decided to replace my Sofa Bed with a Futon, but knew nothing about them except for what I could find on the Internet, and had lots of questions.  I searched the Internet for places to buy, and right away noticed the Sleep Center with 30 Five-Star reviews, so off I went with over a dozen question in my head.

When I entered the store, Michael was speaking with a customer on his cell, and upon seeing me asked the customer if he could greet me.  After we shook hands I told him to go back to his earlier customer, as I often deal with customers.  Once he was finished with his earlier customer I explained my predicament — he even remembered hearing about the fire.

I told him what I had read online about Futons, and told every question I had, one at a time, which he answered, explained, showed and demonstrated one by one.  He never mentioned the word "sell", "buy" or "purchase" once.  The more questions I asked, the more he answered, explained, showed and demonstrated, as cheerful as when we fist said hello.  When I asked about the "anti-slip pad" that all internet articles said was a must for the mattress, he told me that it's true, but that they are nothing more than urethane foam anti-slip drawer liners available anywhere.  When I asked if he was serious, he lifted every Futon mattress they have on display to show me that that is all they use themselves.

Being an avid Geocacher, I asked Michael if he was.  He said he never heard of it, but could I explain it.  I always do one better by showing how the app works (and even the quickie online YouTube video), and point out nearby Geocaches on the app's map.  Mobile may now have new "Cacher" in the game.

Back on track.  I bought my Futon right there on the spot.  When it was the day of delivery, their truck driver called me up exactly when they said he would, told me he was nearly loaded, and would be over in 20 minutes.  18 minutes later they were knocking on my door, two minutes ahead of the promised time from earlier in the week. 15 minutes minutes later, maybe less, I had a fully assembled Futon in my living room., without a scrap of paper or cardboard anywhere.  A perfectly professional and quality operation, from start to finish.

I now need to replace my master bedroom bed, and I will be going straight back here.   I have no need to even visit anyplace else.

The bottom of all this:  if you need to buy a Bed, Futon, Mattress, or the like, or simply have questions about such, this is the place to go first.  You will be patronizing local, and patronizing family owned, and you'll never have to give it a second thought.  (If you're also a Geocacher, ask Michael if he has a game name yet.)

resp.text: We very much appreciate you allowing us to care for you, Jay!

Becky actually gave daddy a wonderful presentation she even moved  a mattress so he could experience and test the comfort and controls. Needless to say he dozed off 3 different times during our conversations.

name: Brad Davis
text:
I visited the Andalusia location and had a great experience. JoAnn was very courteous and helped me find exactly what I was looking for.
Before making a purchase from Mr. Mattress I bought a mattress from a chain wholesale company thinking I would be saving money. The mattress was a top name brand, however in just a couple weeks the mattress I purchased began to sag and cause some morning back issues. I quickly realized that just because I bought a brand name that its not the same quality as a mattress bought from a store that specializes in them.
I went to Mr. Mattress and after talking with JoAnn I found the type of mattress more suitable for my needs. After reading online about the mattress I chose I also did some looking around at prices from other competitors. I was very pleasantly surprised that Mr. Mattress had them all beat! I learned yet again you get what you pay for.
Thank you so much Mr. Mattress and JoAnn for helping me find my best deal on a quality mattress right here at home.

text:
We've been very impressed with Kevin Horne, the owner/operator of Good Morning Mattress. Friendly, courteous and knowledgeable, Kevin was spot on in assisting us in our search for 3 mattresses: a short queen for our travel trailer; a new king bed with dual flexing bases to raise head and/or feet; and a twin bed for my 85 year old mother-in-law with some medical concerns. Kevin worked to find us the right mattress for her medical requirements as well as finding the right ones to meet our needs (construction & firmness) for our travel trailer and home. Delivery and set up went without a hitch by his professional team.
I highly recommend giving Good Morning Mattress a shot at helping you to find the right bed for a good nights sleep.

text: My wife and I had an outstanding experience when we met Kevin and Jeremy. We ended up with a SleepMade which is made-to-order, a disabled veteran owned company, and operated here in the South. Both Jeremy and Kevin were a complete pleasure to work with and I wouldn't hesitate to recommend anyone to this local business. Jeremy even personally made the delivery with the crew to ensure everything was perfect. You can't ask for any more than that!

Here, your comfort comes first, and we know that just because a mattress is more expensive doesn't automatically make it the best fit for you, so we're glad we could find the one that suited you best. text: My wife and I recently moved into the area from Birmingham and needed to purchase a new mattress. name: Bruce Berger
text: SLEEP NUMBER BED WARNING!!! Melissa Triplett Berger and I purchased an expensive Sleep Number Bed with all of the bells and whistles.  It was delivered last Saturday.  There is a $200 delivery and set up charge.  The person who delivered the bed could not get our phone apps to work (we did also order controllers).  I told him I would work on it after he left (and I was successful).  That night when Melissa set her sleep number and then I set mine with the controllers, neither side of the bed seemed to do anything even though we could hear the compressor pumping air and deflating each side separately (and yes, we know that you can only do one side at a time).   In addition, whatever number we were on, the best was just uncomfortable for us. Finally, neither of our individual sides of the bed seemed level.  We decided we just didn't want the bed.  We called customer service on the following Monday (after a poor night's sleep) and after waiting 15 minutes, I told the representative my story.   He reminded me that I needed to keep the bed for 30 days before I could return it.  I asked him if he really wanted me to sleep on a bed that didn't do what it was supposed to do for another 28 days (and yes, we tried resetting the bed)?  He said that it sounded like the bed was defective.  He said, he would waive the 30 day requirement but would still have to charge me the $200 return pickup fee that was in the contract.  I then said, so, you're going to charge me $200 to return a bed that even you think is defective.  He said he could send another bed but it might be "a few days".  I said a) So, you're not going to discount the delivery and setup fee for a bed that is defective, nor the return fee, and b) I don't want the bed anymore.  He said we would then have to pay both the $200 delivery fee and $200 return fee.   I decided to arrange the return and called the store.  The person we bought the mattress from said what customer service is doing is ridiculous.  At the very least they should waive the return fee because it sounded to him like the bed was defective.  He wrote an email to customer service to ask them to waive the return fee.  They called and we missed the call.  After calling back and waiting 19 minutes, they said they will not waive the fee.  So, we are spending $400 for a bed we slept on one night.  Should have stayed at a Ritz!

resp.text: Thanks for sharing your feedback, Bruce and I've made sure to forward your thoughts along to our leadership team for their review. If you have any questions we can help with, please give us a call at 1-888-411-2270 from 8AM-8PM CST M-F.

name: Shaconda Thomas
text: Phil has great customer service skills.   My husband and I felt like family not just customers.  We came in just shopping around and Phil took his time showing us all the different beds and features.   We told him we wanted to look around at some other places and he said he understood.   He gave us a print out of what we wanted and what it could potentially cost.  He said  he would give us a call in a few days.  He called and I was out off town and he said he would call back the follow week.   He did but we still hadn't made up our minds.  I  liked that he continued to check with us but wasn't pushy.  I  will definitely recommend this location.

text: We stopped by this store just by a fluke chance and I am glad I did. I have been shopping for a bed for close to a month now and was very close to spending 4600 for a king size name brand mattress. We ended up getting the split king we were looking for with adjustable bases and a queen size bed for guest room and still saved 1500. The owner was very helpful and honest with us about everything. Overall it was a great experience and I would recommend stopping by to look if you are in the market for a mattress before you buy the name brand and spend thousands more.

name: Thorn J
text: I took my friend here for their Black Friday sale. We entered, an employee was sitting at the table and didn't get up, not even to greet us or read the advertisement - in front of an elderly woman with a cane. We asked to see the Nintendo Switch Lite; she brought us the Switch (the original). We asked to see the gray Nintendo Switch Lite, she brought us the blue. Took a few more tries to get the gray one and she took as much time as possible to bring these to us, even though they were mere steps behind her. She tells us they are $399 - the price of the original Switch. I show her that Nintendo themselves sells the Switch Lite for $199. Her response? "We don't price match here." I'm sorry, you don't price match the manufacturer? You're really going to have the audacity to charge twice the manufacturer's price even when confronted about your dishonesty? If you like being scammed and your intelligence insulted by the employee's inability to do basic elementary-level math, look no further than this predatory hellscape. The store itself reeks of ingenuine intentions and cheap carpeting.

name: Shafi R Baloch
text: This is a great place to buy furniture, yard equipment, and appliances.
