text: We have gotten all or furniture from farmers. Outside of a bit of a wait to deliver the new sectional couch we are buying they been good still i feel like payment day should fall a month after delivery speacily when delivery date is a week after ordering

name: Kristi Rendleman
text: Do NOT buy from Farmers. It is a scam.  Overpriced furniture, extreme interest rates and $4 Charge for a phone payment because they haven’t set up online payments.  Translation: we will charge you an extra almost $50 per year because our extreme interest rates and outrageous markups aren’t enough.  It’s 2020; there is NO good reason to not offer an online payment option.  I don’t believe you “just haven’t set it up yet.”  This is your design to squeeze more money out of your customers.  I am trying to help a friend get out from under your thumb.  She will be wiser next time.  I will tell anyone who will listen not to buy anything from this store.

name: anna irwin
text:
We just purchased new den furniture from Farmers Furniture, and we absolutely LOVE it.  Also, what a wonderful customer service dept they have.  Praises for Portia Chambers!!  Portia is both so friendly and a true professional.  I highly recommend Farmers Furniture of Auburn Alabama, we will be repeat customers!

HAVE A NEW REVIEW:  After the purchase of this beautiful den furniture, our sofa began to "peel."  I called, and Gene Pope the manager can out to my house personally and.....I just got a new sofa!!  All I can say is this Farmers Furniture on Opelika rd. is the absolute BEST!!  What fantastic customer service, and so nice and professional!!  ONCE again, I HIGHLY recommend Farmers!!  They stand behind their product!

name: Lillian B.
text: Farmer offers great customer service at the time of the purchase but after that service is downhill. After two months of having my couch the base board broke. It took 3 months for the manager to come fix it. After that the decorative pillows that came with the sectional began to rip at the corners of the pillow. It took 3 months to get a new pillow. I've have my couch for 9 months now and all of the decorative pillows are coming apart. I was told new ones would be ordered and be there in 5 days, its been three weeks now and records show nothing was ever ordered for me. There is a lack of communication between the manager and the person who orders new products. There is also a lack of concern for the satisfaction of the customer. I paid my furniture off within the first 6 months of owning it. I was going to go back to purchase more, but after this I will not be shopping at that location again. Good luck to those who do.

text: Friendly staff. Would return. Only problem I had was it took a while to fix an appliance. Other than that no problems.

text:
Kind of disappointed in the level of service after my 4th and final purchase 1 month ago from Farmers.  Been doing business with this company and location for about 10 years and something has gone way down in customer appreciation and the level of courtesy to customers.  Bad from the beginning of this transaction to be honest.
And after the product was put together at our home several of the drawers are hanging really bad.
No feeling of appreciation for doing repeat business with this company and absolutely no follow up to see if all was OK after delivery and set up.  It's a sign of the times that this level of "no care" customer service exists but I probably won't do business with Farmers again.  Like I said, really disappointed in the customer service (in store) and the finished installation.

name: Kirkland Brown
text: Since we got our couch. We’ev been missing a piece. Yet we paid full price & they assured us it was going to be here in two months almost 3 months l8r. No other piece & still more excuses. Just go to a REAL furniture place. They can’t even call us & give us updates.

resp.text:
I am very sorry you are unhappy  Mr. Brown
Unfortunately I think you have the wrong furniture store as we do not have you in our system as having made a purchase with us.

However,  I would like to address your complaint about a furniture establishment.

Unfortunately for most businesses selling anything in America we are faced with challenges that are out of our control. For example,   there are shipping delays from overseas of products that are needed here for the assembly of furniture and chips for new cars.  Because of those delays dates change every day. When we do let our customers know a date, it can change the same afternoon which frustrates the customer even more.

Before the Pandemic, we could deliver on 90% of our goods within a 2-4 week time period. Now we cannot promise any date...the only thing we ask is that you hold on to your old furniture until your new furniture  arrives. We have even loaned out new furniture while a customer waits.
We have wholesale prices right now to help with that unfortunate waiting period. Some items come in next week after delivery, but some do not. It varies with every piece.

We value our customers, and if we could change what is going on in America we would . We go above and beyond for all of our customers. I just ask that you try and understand the circumstances that all retail establishments are having to deal with and navigate through. They are difficult, and we are all trying our best to get your items here as quickly as we can.
Factories in America are also understaffed, and those who are working are doing their very best as well. Transportation is trying to find more drivers, so that items can also be delivered in a timely fashion.
We have kept our prices  lower than anyone  to help better ease that frustration of timely delivery dates. So it is a great time to purchase from us, but patience will be needed in case dates change on an item.
Thank you so much for your understanding, and if you did purchase from us under a different name - I am sorry for the delays, and I too wished we had control over dates fluctuating.

name: Catherine Hatter

They greet you with a smile and are willing to answer any questions you have. The prices are also amazing! This is an all around great place to purchase all of your home decor needs. Ask for Brian!

Thanks so much for the kind review!

name: AJ
text: Still haven’t received my furniture and it’s been months. I understand the pandemic has slowed things down but it’s ridiculous. These people don’t even update you on the shipment, you’ll have to keep asking them yourself. Not a good look. If I paid in full for something you should be updating me frequently not the other way around. Won’t be shopping here again.

resp.text:
I am sorry that you feel we have not kept you informed more frequently about shipment dates.
I know we have spoke on several occasions, and emailed each other.
Every retail establishment in the country is having issues with receiving product in a timely manner. It is totally out of our control, and if we could change things we would.
Delivery ETA's change daily and weekly, and that is why we cannot truly set or promise delivery dates.
When we have spoken, I told you what it stated at that present time.
When we spoke later, and that date was different and longer it frustrated you more.
What you used to take 4-6 weeks has been now doubled. Sometimes it comes quicker which is a blessing. We take pride in Customer Service, and it is certainly not my intention to not properly inform you of shipment dates. We did provide you with a loaner while you wait which I do not believe any one else is doing.
My sincere apology if you felt like we have not provided you with the best service possible.

name: Crela Roberts
text: I was really disappointed in my experience with Jerome. A few days after selling a mattress to me he asked me to come back to the store and pick out a more expensive mattress.  He said he had accidentally sold me the mattress I chose at a much lower price than what he was supposed to. Well, in fact, he had strongly encouraged me to buy that particular mattress because it was such a good deal. He had apparently sold that same mattress to several customers at a much lower price than he was supposed to and was now calling all of us back to pay for his mistake. Since I work out of town & was moving & needed that mattress delivered to my new place that weekend I refused to waste my time & money to go back to his store & pay “only a few hundred dollars more” per his exact words so he could recover the money he had lost. According to him he had been on an extended beach vacation and therefore was unknowledgeable of his new product line. Moreover, because I refused to pay for his mistake, he accused me of taking advantage of him! I would never buy a mattress from this company ever again if this is the type of customer service they find acceptable.

resp.text: Wow, we're so thankful that you had a great experience! Thank you for the great review!

resp.text: We are a non profit organization and our mission is to help families in need. Our merchandise is priced according to other non profit organizations. We have to make money to pay our employees, and utilities, as well as raise money for the Habitat homes. I am sorry you feel this way. As far as you feeling like you were being followed, I reassure you that if an employee was following you it was not done on purpose. If you ever feel like someone is following you again please speak with Nicole. We do apologize and hope that you will give us another chance in the future. Thank you.

name: Carroll Hosey6uy vv
text:
Changing my rating to a LESS THAN ONE STAR FOR BOTH LOCATIONS!!! I was so happy to originally give good rating to Alexander City store, I had found the 2 Lazy Boy recliners I had been searching for.... and she checked to make sure they were NOT on back order.. so image my surprise that now, 18 days later than they were promised, I STILL HAVE NOT RECEIVED THEM, they have not been delivered to the store. I should have picked them up on April 2nd. Since then, I have been told "they will be on our next truck, call back Tuesday" "call back Friday"  "I called and verified that they would be in our warehouse the 16th" I'm leaving my original post, so everyone can see the whole story behind trying to get 2 recliners from your store!
I live in Sylacauga and went to our local Badcock store. I found the recliner that I had been searching for and asked if it was available in a different color. The sales lady rushed to answer "No" without checking their website or trying to verify her answer... I left there and went online, found the lady had lied and it WAS available in the color I wanted. So I drove to a neighboring city store and found a sales lady who was more than eager to help me... so I give the Sylacauga location a 1 Star rating, but the Alexander City location gets 5+ stars! Very happy with the lady there! Too bad I couldn't do business in my hometown.....

resp.text:
Hi Carroll,

Our sincerest apologies. Customer service is a priority for us, and we're sorry to see your experience was a disappointing one. Our Corporate Team would like to look into this for you. If there is anything we can do differently that might better serve you as our valued customer, please reach out by calling 1-800-223-2625 or email customer.service@badcock.com. We appreciate your feedback, and are glad to see you had a positive experience during your second visit to our store.

I went into the store and demanded a refund and the salesman told me it would be the next week before they could refund me anything and send me a check. This is a shady business and I will never do business with them again.

name: Dominique Hill
text: This office is so unorganized and full of crooks! I was told that my payments would be due on Sundays, which wasn’t a problem, but suddenly, automatic payments start drafting from my account, which, once, that ain’t no problem, but when I tried to stop them, I was told that they couldn’t, I had to talk to the home office. When I called the home office, they didn’t answer or return my call. I’m paying extremely too much for a refrigerator and it came with an already blown light bulb in it. I had to notify my bank to decline all debits from them until we can get it rectified and I still haven’t heard anything from the main office but — and this — they tried to debit my card AGAIN today, Tuesday. I’m returning this merchandise first thing after finding a better deal and customer service. I would not recommend this company at all.

Dominique,
Thank you for your review. We are truly sorry to hear about your experience. Please email to us your agreement number and name on the agreement at saraland@babers.com, so we can get more details about the the payment and compensate you for your discomfort.
Sincerely,
Baber's

name: Sherrice Richardson
text:
I worked there and people of color should honestly find elsewhere to rent ...

Babers company does NOT care about any employees, they barely care about the stores and I say that because the owners barely to never call or come by unless it’s a problem then you’re getting scolded by 5 people! I worked as an account manager doing allllll the managers responsibility but not being compensated for it. It was my responsibility to call due and past due customer but when I make contact with anyone the manager stands over my shoulder telling me exactly what to say and I can’t stand being micromanaged . I had to use my own personal Facebook for sales and my personal cellphone for advertising. I used my personal cellphone for collection calls . Most customers are extremely rude. And the store manager didn’t make it any better with the things he wanted you to say . The store manager said “I think this job has made me racist” and it shows in his work he will rent quicker to white people than blacks and he is quicker to offer “help” to white customers than blacks. The store manager has adhd or something he can not focus and puts all his task down on me . He is impossible to work for, some days he doesn’t ask you to do anything other days he ask you to everything AND his job! He was never on time and always left early and takes long breaks. A lot of the time I was NOT allotted a lunch break but when I look at my pay stub the time was taken out of my check . You have too many responsibilities that you are not paid for ... Oan the store is really slow but the manager threw away the chairs and doesn’t want you to sit ! And wearing babers uniforms are mandatory and you have to buy them yourself and the cloths are overpriced and cheaply made JUST LIKE THE COMPANY ITSELF !

resp.text: We are sorry to hear about your recent experience with our Saraland location. We strive to provide an excellent experience for everyone who walks through our doors. Thank you for making us aware and will have the District Manager look into this. Please come back soon and try us again! Please contact us by emailing, customerservice@babers.com, if you have any other issues. Have a wonderful day!

text: Great customer service at this location maybe they can train the airport location

name: Juan Puente
text: Complete nightmare trying to order a bedroom suit from these people. 1st week we’re told it could take up to 2weeks. Week 2 the dude ordered the wrong size suit and was told that he would have to order the king size bed by itself or find one new from another store. Week 3 we go in expecting everything to be good to go “wishful thinking” was told the king bed he found at the other store was sold after he told them he needed it so he would find one and go pick it up personally. Week 4 we go in and expect to at least  talk and find out wth is going on and  we get hit with the excuse “only half of our building has power” so we can’t power up the computers to see anything. We eventually gave up and got rid of the flyers they gave to my wife to put into the welcome pamphlet for the new people who moved into our apartment community. This place is a complete joke. I would advise anyone looking for furniture to look elsewhere. These people will give you bs excuse after bs excuse. Supposedly it’s under “new management “ but apparently he’s failing horribly as well.

resp.text:
Juan,
Thank you for your review. We're truly sorry to hear that you've been waiting for your merchandise for almost a month. If you could give us a call to our Corporate office at 228-312-0359, we'd be happy to look into the matter and try to rectify the situation.
Sincerely,
Baber's

name: Angela Lankford (Angela)
text: The new lady managers are complete jackasses. They won't take off one late fee ...they knock on your door every day. I've been a customer for 6 years and I've bought numerous products from this baber's in Saraland. I will not be back after I finish paying off what I owe. I will now be a buywise customer for the rest of my life. The 2 fat ladies that work there now who are supposed to be managers have no compassion for their customers and/or frankly pieces of white trash who lucked out on a job!

resp.text: We want to thank you for your feedback. Baber's in Saraland is now under the new management and would be happy to help you out on any of your furniture, electronics and/or appliances needs.

Was told our payment was due on a certain day paid it a day later and two days after paying our phones were being blown up asking when we would be coming in to make a payment although we had just paid for a week. Very unprofessional and rude. Will be taking business elsewhere in a few months.

Bre,
Thank you for bringing this to our attention—it will help us improve our operations. We are truly sorry that you had received several call even after making you payment. We understand your disappointment, and apologize for any inconvenience that this may have caused you.
Please let us make it up to you by offering you a weekly payment vacation. In order to redeem that, please feel free to call to our District Manager directly at 432-250-4792.
Sincerely,
Baber's

Update 3/26/2019  Since our original purchase of our living room set, we have since bought a mattress as well as a dining room table.  We absolutely love this store and family!

text: If you are at the Madison ALABAMA store stop in and see Danielle. Knowledgeable, helpful and friendly. Store is clean and we'll stocked. Happy Hunting.

name: Jeff Hillman
text:
BUYER BEWARE!  I would give ZERO stars, but that is not an option.  Been waiting 5 weeks for delivery, now they want to reschedule mid-April and the mattress was on the truck in route to my house.  They won't even tell me where my mattress will be stored for the next 3 weeks.

Pay up front and you are at their mercy for delivery.  Customer service is beyond horrible.  Nobody can make a decision.  Can't speak to a manager-they won't even provide a name or a number.  But when you do get to speak to someone, they will say "sleep well."  How in the hell can I sleep well if I can't get the mattress?

resp.text: We'd like to look into this with you further and see what we can do to help with your concerns. Just give us a call at 1-888-411-2270 (8AM-8PM CST M-F, 8:30AM-5PM CST Saturday).

name: Maya McDonald
text: We already had a sleep number bed I purchased 12 years ago. It was such a life changer for me then!!  We recently moved and our pump wasn’t functioning properly so we decided to get a new one. The new ones are even more comfortable. Arielle was extremely helpful. Getting good sleep is personal for her and that makes her great at her job. She’s very knowledgeable about her products and what’s required for a good nights sleep. She was a huge help!  I can’t wait for ours to be delivered!

text: You came so close to a perfect experience, but blew it in the end. Purchase included removal of old bed, but I just found the old base cover and pump in my trash can. I guess we’re not supposed to have room in it for our household trash now

text: About a month ago I came into the Ashley furniture outlet location to look for a chaise sofa for my first apartment since recently graduating college. name: Carrie Hughes
text: Horrible! My husband and I went into the store March 13, 2021, purchased a Recliner, Love Seat and Couch, Mattress and Box Spring. The sales guy told us takes 6-8 weeks for delivery ( He lied .. he was just trying to make  a sale). We paid in Full and also have on our CONTRACT Delivery 5/3/2021!!!! Checked on the status and it was then pushed back to JULY 26, 2021!!! Now July is here and now they are saying  it would be now September/October!!!!! We spoke to the Manager JOSH and he would not do refund!!! We are now with out furniture for our new house that we we paid in full!  They are seriously scamming people.. I will NOT ever buy here again!! Seems like this has happened ALOT to several other customers. They care nothing about their customers and ONLY about making a sale!! We are now in the process of taking legal actions due to them breaking their contract with us 3 different times!! I will not wait around until October for my furniture to only have them tell me AGAIN its been pushed back on delivery!  GO SOMEWHERE ELSE FOR FURNITURE!!!!!!

resp.text: Ms. Hughs. I am sorry to hear that your experience has been this bad at the Ashley Outlet. This is certainly not up to our standards. We would like to reach out to you to resolve this issue. If you will, please send us your Name, Number and email, and potentially your receipt number to Cescalation@ahsmal.com. We would like a member of our management team to help you on this issue and make things right.

name: Glenn Taylor
text: We went in for a couch and love seat.  Met by Mario, who helped us with selection and options.  Everything was clear, pricing made sense, and Mario took the time to explain what comes, for example, with the protection plan.  He wasn't pushy, just helpful, and he knew his stuff.  Strongly recommend this store and especially Mario.

resp.text: Thank you for your review! We are so glad to hear that Mario was able to give you a great furniture buying experience. We hope you will visit us again!

name: Leigh Anne Dagalea
text: I purchased Doorbuster sectional on layaway in March 2021. I completely paid it at the beginning of April 2021. From the time I fully purchased it in April to the end of May. No one had informed me of the status. I would call the store once every other week. When I called the facility they told me that the furniture was not showing delivery date. I showed concern that I have not received any possible delievery date and asked to speak to the store manager about finding another item with tbe same value that is available. Finally the store manager, (after I was concerned) said that it should be here the first week of June. I decided to not find a replacement since the manager seemed to be sure the furniture will be there. I called after the first week of June since I received no contacted in regards to delivery or any issues. Manager than proceeded to say it is now pushed to the first week of July. I received a call last week and the week prior telling me that my furniture was scheduled for first week of July. After first week of July passed, I called them Monday, July 12th, to be informed that it was again pushed to the week of July 26th. I asked the sales associate if I could get a full refund because their poor communication. And customer service makes me uneasy and I do not trust them that they will delivery my item. The manager was not there and the person said he will contact me on Wednesday when he returns. They told me that refund would not be possible because of the 72 hour no cancellation. I proceeded to call cooperate to file a complaint on their store and because it is privately owned they could not help me. They filed a complaint and said they will get in contact with me within 24-48 hours. After I received no response from cooperate and the store, I called cooperate again. During the process of calling cooperate on Friday, July 16th (less than four days since the last conversation with the store) I found out that the corner of my section is in the warehouse but that other pieces will be in august 26th. Again another time pushed and no response. Each time the dates have been undetermined or pushed further. There is no promise of a secure date. They are persistent on telling me cancellations are not possible due to the 72 hours after full purchase but yet this company does not hold themselves accountable to communication and delivery if their items. After long conversation, the sales associate on Friday, July 16th said the manager will issue a request for cancellation to the finance department and I will receive a paper check refund. I called today July 20th to ask about the status. The request was given to the finance department and now waiting for the finance department to contact me about my refund. The sales associate said that it will take up to 14 days. This is ridiculous. I understand that we are in Covid 19 times. But their customer service is lacking and their concern for their customers is lacking.

resp.text: Hello Ms. Dagalea. I would like to apologize on behalf of the Ashley Homestore Outlet. We strive to better ourselves every day. Customer service is no different. We are working hard to become efficient with everything we do in our company, I have showed this review to our General Manager, and he would like to reach out to you. Please send an email to Cescalation@ahsmal.com with your receipt, name and phone number, as well as the email that was used on file. We want to make things right.

name: James Boyer
text:
We have a lot of Ashley Furniture. We ordered nearly $7,000 worth of furniture on April 18/2021 with a estimated delivery date of 5/31/2021. It is now 7/19/2021 and we still have NO furniture. We just got off the phone and the estimate delivery date for some of the furniture is not until DECEMBER!

So, if you want to pay thousands of dollars for furniture that you will not get for 8 months, then this is your place.

We have been living in our home with our kids on mattresses on the floor, no living room furniture, no dining room furniture, incomplete office furniture, etc, etc.

No more excuses for companies operating like this. We are now fighting for our money back that has been wrapped up for many months so we can go somewhere that sells furniture and not just dreams of "someday" furniture.

Absolutely awful.

name: myla harper
text: It’s been three weeks now and I’m still not a happy customer. Please refer to Ashley Homestore’s Facebook page to see my review in detail. The sales clerk ordered the wrong item. The delivery team did not honor their delivery time slot and did not have the decency to inform me in a timely manner that they were coming 2 hours early. They left the wrong dresser. I called Emmitt, the store manager, and requested for them to return to pick up the dresser, needless to say the dresser remained in my home for three weeks. I tried to contact the general manager, Nick on two occasions and, Emmitt was of no assistance and he never returned my phone calls either. After finally getting a scheduled pickup a week and a day later, the delivery team was an hour and 15 minutes late with once again no phone call or text. After posting my experience on their Facebook page, Nick called leaving a message with my phone number as the return contact. Also, someone from their management team left an email address that was not accurate. I say all this to say, my concerns have not been resolved and I did not receive the correct dresser that I paid for. Ashley Homestore will NOT admit their mistakes, correct their mistakes, nor treat their customers with respect. I spent right at $6000 and this is how they treat their customers. I pray that you read this review and reconsider patronizing this establishment.

resp.text: Hello. We have seen your review and want to make things right. If you will, please send us an email at cescalation@ahsmal.com with the name, email, and phone number on your ticket, and a team member will be with you as soon as we can. We appreciate your support and business.

text: Dee Dee was friendly and very helpful from the time I entered the store. Of course, one of the big "dogs" Alex came over to assist her BUT I will say, I didn't purchased anything I didn't want. In addition, the discounts were my stamp of approval. Thanks Dee Dee and Alex for your great customer service.

text: Thank you to Josh for helping and being very thorough with our questions.  If you are looking for new furniture for your home, get Josh to help! He’s the best! Super professional and friendly.

name: william gipson
text: On March 20, 2021 I purchased a complete Leather reclining sofa, love seat and chair set in which I paid for upfront in full. Josh and I agreed on a (out the door) price that he stated would included free delivery and would include the best warranty that I could purchase. Once I got to the register to check out I was charged an additional 199.00 that was supposed to have been already applied to our agreed upon total. I didn't notice until after I left and looked over the receipt of this infraction. They told me that the set wasn't in stock and would take 3 weeks to be delivered. I offered several time to pick the set up myself but they insisted that I let them bring it out and set it up for free so I agreed. They told me that the set would come in a different dates and offered me split delivery. I told them I'd prefer if we just wait an get it all delivered at 1 time when it all arrived and they agreed. Fast forward to Thursday April 8th I called and was told that only 2 pieces were in but they were all scheduled to be there the week of the 8th. Friday the 9th I called bk and was told that the set was there. I asked when would it be delivered and was told that I had to come pick it up and that it wouldn't be delivered. Therefore I (rented) a haul and angrily went to to their store to pick it up. Once I got there I was told that it wasn't there and was at the warehouse which contradicted everything that I was told and wasn't where I originally paid for the set. At this point I was furious and Josh wasn't there so I was told. They then called him/Josh and he magically appeared from the back of the store smiling with mischief all over his face. Once he got close enough to see the anger in my eyes he detoured behind me and finally stood behind the counter accompanying the other 2 young ladies. He lied and tried to tell me that I wasn't given or offered free delivery but one of the assistants who also helped me select the set( she in particular was great and very helpful and even apologized) agreed that I was supposed to have free delivery. I then told him about the split delivery in which I knew nothing about until they offered and he dropped his head knowing that I was being honest. At this point I was furious but still needed my set. They then told me that it was at the warehouse and that the warehouse was closed. This is after they told me that it was at their location and I had to come pick it up. So now I'm standing there with a rented uhaul, being double charged for a warranty, furious and still not able to get my furniture. Long story short I still have to go pick it up again today. I would've canceled it all together but your charged a  25% restocking fee and can't return it over 3 days after the original purchase date. Josh continued to try and lie and say he told me this or that and I made him out to be a lie everytime. Josh is a lier so don't let those fb commercials fool you. My set was over 4k and paid upfront. Read over your receips as soon as you get it and make sure everything you agreed upon is stated and accurate. This is my personal experience, hopefully this will detour you from having a disastrous nightmare just as I did. Please shop else where. Hopefully everything goes smooth today once I go to pick it up.

resp.text: Hello Mr. Gipson. Firstly, I would like to apologize for any miscommunications or any tribulations experienced with the Ashley Homestore Outlet. From my understanding of the matter, there were many miscommunications on the team's behalf. I am not sure why there was so much confusion with the Customer Service on this particular order, and this will be addressed to them. We are experiencing delays on orders due to covid, and though this is a common response for almost all things furniture nowadays, it is honestly the truth. Again, I would like to apologize for the lack of communication resulting in you prematurely renting a U-haul. Our Warehouse hours differ from the store hours, and this should have been addressed upfront ahead of time. I truly feel that if things had been communicated better, a lot of these issues would have been easily resolved, and that is our fault. On behalf of the company we hope you will accept our apology, and please feel free to discuss this matter further at cescalations@ahsmal.com, and a manager will respond.  With all this said, we want to thank you for shopping with us and appreciate you being a member of our community. We are striving daily to improve our business to ensure that things like this no longer happen.

Protecting your customers should be a top concern. We immediately walked out to shop elsewhere that follows COVID guidelines.

name: Darrelle Townsend
text: Me and my fiancé drove 2.5 hours away to go to this new outlet on its Grand Opening day that we saw advertised on Facebook. We were greeted by a salesman named Alex. He seemed to be a nice guy well versed and educated in product knowledge of everything they had to showcase and sell. We instructed him that we were just looking but we'd come back if we were interested in doing business. He and his manager promised exceptional customer service. We came back about a month later ready to purchase. We spent almost $7,000 with this salesman and company and was sold several empty promises. We were told that we'd have all of our furniture at the store ready to be delivered to our brand new home that we were building by the first week of December. That didn't happen. We were promised several different customer service calls concerning our furniture. They never happened. In December we were told for 3 weeks straight that our stuff was coming and it didn't come. Finally we got some of our things only to find out that as our stuff was coming off the truck that the delivery guys forgot the mounts to put our mirror up that goes to our dresser. Also that Alex ordered 2 loveseats instead of a sofa and loveseat. When I called to make him aware of his mistake I was told immediately that it was my fault as if I made up the invoice myself. I spoke with the manager Josh he apologized and put in a new invoice for a new sofa. He said that our recliner which we are still waiting on would be here the same time the sofa would, which would be Jan. 15th. I was told that if anything changed that I would receive a call. Guess what? That didn't happen either. After the delivery guys left I noticed that they messed up my front door casing in 2 different places. I called this Thursday to inform them of the damage and check to make sure everything was still on track and yet again I was given the run around by the employees and manager Josh as to when my stuff would arrive. Finally he said that yet again its been pushed back to the first week in February. He gave me Ashley's customer service email to send proof of damage and I was told I would receive a call or email concerning the damages as you might've guessed THAT! DIDN'T! HAPPEN!  Before ending our call he said he was going to give me a call the next day at 9:30 when he starts his customer service calls and you guessed it IT NEVER HAPPENED! Mind you we placed our entire order at one time in OCTOBER!!! We were told that there was a 6-8 week wait to receive our stuff which we were fine with because our home would be finished being built by then. It's now January and still were being given the run around. I have never experienced such unprofessionalism, deplorable customer service, and lies by a company who's standards are supposed to be way above par. I am livid and hate that I ever gave this company my business. They care nothing about their customers only about the quick buck that they can get. I wouldn't advise anyone to ever do business with this establishment. Your just another sale to them and they give you nothing but empty promises. If I could've given no stars I would have! WORST EXPERIENCE EVER!!!

name: Bertha Dozier
text:
LONG POST ALERT

I ordered a king size bedroom set and was told it would be arriving in 3 1/2 weeks.   The week of delivery I received a phone call from Miguel stating the bedroom set had arrived minus the dresser and mirror.   He went on to say that another set that was similar to the one I ordered was available.   I told him I would come in the store to look at it.  I ordered a grey bedroom. The one that was available was black.   Two different colors.   Told them I would take the one that I ordered and wait for the dresser and mirror.   Day of pick up, load the headboard, footboard and chest.  They tried to get me to sign the paperwork accepting delivery.   Refused because I was missing 2 nightstands and the rails.   They found the rails but no nightstands.   Was told the missing items were in the Mobile store.   I was promised that I would receive the items early Saturday. It's now 9:45 pm and still no delivery.   I have sat at home all day waiting on a non existent delivery.  Not a good way to conduct business.

name: Josh Yates
text:
Overall, I'm satisfied with my purchase at the Montgomery, Alabama location.  Management was very good.  Prices seemed to be excellent.  Quality seemed to be excellent.  Selection was very good.  The -2 star is because of my delivery.  I paid $75 cash for delivery, which is fine.  But, after all my furniture was placed inside my apartment and the delivery men left, I failed to check to make sure everything was delivered correctly.  The next day I open the box that contained my headboard and it was the wrong size and color.  Management had a new headboard delivered to me, but the delivery man refused to take back the incorrect headboard because he said, "I don't have the paper.", so I took the headboard back to the American Freight warehouse.

Within the next few days, I opened the mirror to my dresser and it was the wrong color.  I took the mirror back to the American Freight warehouse and management swapped it out for me.  In the end, I happy with my furniture but it appears my $75 delivery cost was wasted on my end due to the driving back and forth a few times to fix a few mistakes the delivery men made with my purchase.  Before the delivery men leave your location, double check your furniture.

name: Kori Anderson
text:
DO NOT BUY FROM AMERICAN FREIGHT IN MONTGOMERY! They are very unprofessional and unorganized. We bought basically a whole house worth of furniture, when it was time for delivery they informed us that our sectional was not in stock and that it’ll be in stock in 2 weeks and that they’ll deliver it out to us with no delivery fee but we could still get our bedroom suite that we ordered.
Incident #1: On delivery day I had to call and ask what time would the furniture be in because we were out running errands. They forgot to put our furniture on the truck and the delivery people had to come back and get it🙄 (I’m sure if I had not called I would not have known)
Incident #2:Two weeks later, which was on yesterday (Sunday) at around 12pm I called and spoke with OJay and asked was our furniture in. She told me yes(why didn’t they call?) and that they can deliver it out same day. Okay cool. She then called back and said that we didn’t pay all of our delivery fee which in fact when they delivered our furniture the first time my boyfriend gave them the delivery free PLUS A TIP. She then told me that it was okay and that they would take care of it. Later that day, at 4pm, I called again just checking to see what time they would be coming. The guy I spoke with asked would I be okay with getting it delivered first thing Monday morning. Uhh no. (My problem with this was WHY DIDN’T ANYBODY CALL, I would be okay if they had the common courtesy to inform me of any issues instead of me having to call them.) The guy told me my furniture should be at my house no later than 10:45AM(I didn’t know how if they opened at 11am) I asked was he sure and he said yes.
SO THIS MORNING MY FURNITURE WAS NOT AT MY HOUSE AT 10:45! I called promptly AT 11am and spoke w/ the manger Rodney and he informed me that a driver was on the way to get my furniture to deliver it. If my furniture was not able to be at my house at 10:45AM they should have communicated that with me. I received my furniture at 12pm after all the mess I had to go through. I appreciate it if you guys would be more professional with your customers and communicated more with your drivers. I should not have to go through this hassle of getting furniture delivered and I WILL NOT shop with you guys again. Have a good day!!

name: Rachel Bu
text:
TL/DR: furniture took more than 2 months to arrive, company was no help over the phone, leather sectional arrived with corner scuffed. DO NOT RECOMMEND.

Full story: I shopped at American Freight on Black Friday 2017 with high expectations after reading these reviews. And the experience in the store was fine. No pressure to buy, but a helpful staff answering any questions my husband or I had. We bought a sectional and ottoman set we liked even though they weren't available for delivery for 2-3 weeks. We were fine with the delay and left looking forward to it arriving in a few weeks (more time to find homes for our old stuff).

That's when the trouble started. Fast forward 4 weeks, no sectional and no call/news at all. I call the store and was told that my purchase wasn't on the truck as expected, but they would be calling other stores to see of they had it and we should hear something the next week.

Life was busy so I didn't check again for another 3 weeks. This time when I called I was told they didn't know why, but it was on back order. But it would for sure be in the next week. I again expressed by hope that it would arrive as I very much looked forward to using my furniture.

2 weeks later, no furniture.  At this point, 2 months after purchasing the furniture and as my husband and I are both active duty military and didn't have the time to go to deal with it, my mother-in-law visited the store on a Friday. She made a bit of a scene stating the facts in front of other customers, and wouldn't you know it our sectional and ottoman arrived on rush order the following Monday. Corners were scuffed in some areas, and a few tears from packing staples, but at that point we were so glad to have the furniture  and tired of dealing with the company that we accepted it anyway. I will never shop there again  and highly recommend you don't either.

name: Wes Stigsell
text:
We decided to shop here due to the great reviews and the quality furniture and a great prices . However the great reviews must be only for furniture that they have in stock. The couch and love seat we really liked was not in stock and we were told it would be two weeks until our furniture would arrive This was 15th of July. It even said August 1st on the sales receipt.  Two weeks go by and we heard nothing. We called American Freight and we were told that they don't have a date that the truck will show up it will just show up one day. Three weeks out we had heard nothing and we're told it would take 2 to 4 weeks. At this point we would of asked for a refund and shopped somewhere else but their policy states you can get a refund after 4 weeks from purchase.  Now four weeks arrives still no furniture still no date a truck will arrive.  We call on Monday with all intentions to ask for a refund and were told there is a truck and the Manger will be in on Thursday for us to get a refund. Thursday comes no phone call from American Freight we call on Friday and we're told oh your couch is here. Alot of effort on our part to find the status on our order. So after 4 weeks and several days of a family of 5 sitting on the floor since we just moved to Montgomery we have our couch and love seat. When we picked them up we told them we were still in the market for furniture and we were told to come back and they will give us a good deal for being so patient  well why not give us a deal while we were there. We won't be back.
Going back to the day we purchased the furniture the couch and love seat we wanted they actually had in the back but it was already sold to a customer who was waiting for it to be delivered some sales people were telling our sales person to just give us that one but we would not do that to someone else. So it puts into question did our furniture arrive weeks ago and they sold it to someone else it's possible especially since they could never give us a date our furniture would arrive.
We do like the furniture but if you shop here and they don't have it in stock BEWARE you will never know when you will get it.

resp.text: We do apologize for the inconvenience, Wes. If there's anything we can do to rectify the situation, feel free to send us an email to social@ameircanfreight.us. Thanks!

name: Sylver Hooks
text: A few months ago, my husband and I purchased a dinette set from this location. When it was delivered, the delivery guy Preston had noticed they sent the wrong chairs but I had noticed the box with the table looked as if it had fallen off of the truck or dropped from a distance. After bringing in the table, they left and came back with the correct chairs. After putting together the chairs, I opened the box containing the table and it had indeed been dropped. It was well after store hours at this point but I still called the delivery guy with my issues. The next morning at 11 sharp, I got a call from the owner. Like he has obviously done before, apologized for it and said that he's send another out by the end of the day. TWO DAYS later, the table finally arrived. They opened the box to make sure that nothing is busted up and I was very pleased with the way it was handled. I was so pleased that we decided to order two more chairs from them. We were told that it took 2 weeks for the chairs to arrive. It was November 27th and we needed them before Christmas. Before they ordered the chairs, we had to pay and that wasn't an issue for us. We paid the full balance of nearly $180 for two Madrid. counter height chairs. Two weeks go by and no chairs. I was told that the truck hasn't come in but I'll definitely have them before Christmas. December 22nd, I gave them another call and I was told that I could pick them up the next day. I was overjoyed to hear that. On the 23rd I got a call from the manager telling me to not come because they wasn't there and he didn't want me to ride there for nothing. He said that he was just have them delivered when they came in. The delivery guy Preston brought to our home at 6pm that night. He told me that they were in a different box because they opened it to make sure that they sent the right chairs because of what happened the first time. Trusting his words, i signed for it then took them upstairs myself. I placed them in a closet, grabbed my things and left home until Saturday night. Christmas morning I pulled out the box, opened it and removed all of its contents. I then took the box to the dumpster. When I returned, I settled myself down to begin assembling the chairs only to find that the chairs HAD ONCE BEEN ASSEMBLED. There were marks on the chairs, the screws were stripped and rusty. and the floor protectors were very worn. There were also four screws missing as well. There were hand smudges all over the wood. There was nothing about those chairs that said NEW. In complete disbelief that Rodney the store manager for charge me full price for two chairs off the showroom floor then have me wait nearly a month to receive them made me a bit irate. Without thinking, I called the store on Christmas morning. After realizing, I messaged the delivery asking for the cell number of the manager and I've yet to receive an response. So as a result, I feel it's very necessary to be waiting in the parking lot with two unassemble Madrid counter height chairs and several questions that gonna require an answer as well as a solution. Until this, I thought very highly of American Freight and its coworkers. Now it's BUYERS BEWARE... there's a reason they say that all sales are finals. For me, I don't want my money back because I do want the chairs. I just want what I paid for and I DID NOT pay for recycled chairs

resp.text: We're very sorry to hear this happened to you, Sylver. If there's anything we can do for you, feel free to email us at social@americanfreight.us. Thanks!

name: Darline Jones
text: HORRIBLE FURNITURE! We got a sectional back on August 6th of 2017. As soon as we unwrapped it, one side was already broken. We called and asked for a replacement. Our replacement took almost two months to come in. Beginning of October the other side slowly started breaking apart. Springs were coming out and eventually the whole bottom fell onto the floor. We called and asked for a replacement in October. We just got the new replacement in yesterday. Which they never called my husband and told him... It is already falling apart!!!! After sitting on it two times! The expensive warranty does not cover anything other than spills and tares. It does not cover anything structural about the furniture... This furniture is only for looks not for actual use!

name: BYRDIE Yeah
text:
My eldery mother and i were just there yesterday looking at some furniture and i did
Not like our experience there at all. The salesman who served us had these real long dreadlocks and his salesmanship skills were the pits...he did not sale my mom and i what we wanted, what we liked nor did he offer to
Show us anything decent that would also fit
In our budget. Yes thats right he never showed us anything on sale nor did he bother to ask what our spending limit was so he know what to work with. Instead he just showed us around the store that highlighted
The furniture with the 699 and up prices.
We spotted a black leather sofa that had 398 price tag on it, sat on it to try it out, and as we began to show insterest in it and began discussing to each other about maybe we should get this or not. Thats when the salesman kinda brushed us away from the actual sofa set that we were sitting on that was 398 and started reverting us back toward that 699 plus tax sofa set. Smh thats not the sofa set we wanted or was discussing.we felt that the salesman wasnt offering us what we wanted but yet offer us what he wanted us to buy.....and we are the customers...its our money not his....we felt like our wants were disreguarded so we decided to check another store, told the guy we were gonna check somewhere else also before we decide. Asked him for a bussiness card and of course he didnt want to give us one and by him doing so gave us even more reason to be absolutely sure that we dont want to shop there now.
So as we started to walk out the door the guy then decided to offer us a deal on a sofa set
...A BETTER PRICE is what he said so im like oh ok he wants to work a deal on the actual leather sofa we were sitting on with the 398 price tax. So im like ok turn around and ask what are you offering...he reply...600 right now walk out..we refused and left and went somewhere else because once agin the guy was still attempting to sale us what he wanted us to buy rather than what we the customer wanted to spend our money on...

resp.text: Hi Byrdie, I am so sorry to hear that you had this experience. I'd like to help make this situation right. If you would, could you send me an email to social@americanfreight.us? Thanks!

name: Nana Cita
text:
The sales rep was very knowledgeable, patient, straightforward, and relaxed, without pushing us at all. He showed us three different mattresses that he thought would meet our needs. We decided to purchase a hybrid, and he offered us the best price he could. Delivery was to occur within 7-10 days.
We visited the store during the COVID pandemic, so we wore masks and the salesmen were wearing masks, which was important to us.
However, the bed was not delivered. We were told that there had been a hurricane that affected the foam factory, and it was unknown when the bed would be delivered. After several weeks, we opted to buy a different bed that was available in a warehouse in another city. Delivery was delayed multiple times. A date would be set, and then we would receive a call that the date had to be reset for the delivery team. It was as though the delivery staff dictated terms to the store personnel.

resp.text: We are sorry you had a poor experience with us but we would like to fix it if we can. Please contact me at: austin@bedzzz.express and I will make it right. Thanks.

text: Had a great experience here recently (Dec 2019).  Alex assisted me and was courteous and knowledgeable. text: My husband and I went in to buy a mattress and ended up buying three! Alex helped us by explaining to us all the options available. He was incredibly friendly and knowledgeable. We highly recommend this business!

name: Tiffany McNair
text:
We walked in at 5:30pm on Sunday and were the only people in the store, so obviously we got plenty of attention.  What made it 5 star worthy was the overall experience.  We came in looking for a hybrid mattress due to all the rave reviews we had seen and heard.  Alex started us off on what I would consider mid grade mattresses.  He took us over to the TempurPedics next.  I know what you're thinking because we thought the same thing.  While the TempurPedic was nice, so was it's price tag.  I compliment Alex, he definitely did his best to try and sell us on that particular mattress.  When we would try others in the store, he wouldn't talk bad about them per say, but he also wasn't singing their praises as loud.  However, once we told him our financial situation he was a complete gentleman about it and began telling us the great things about the mattresses we were testing.  When we found the one we purchased Alex was super complimentary about it and raved about our choice.

Shopping for large purchases can be so stressful and overwhelming. I kind of equate mattress stores with furniture stores and car lots.  I don't like being rushed or hassled the entire time, but I do like attention when I have questions or want opinions.  If we had to do it all over again, I can guarantee you we would return to Mattress Firm and ask for Alex.  He assisted when needed, gave exceptional customer service and made the process smooth and worry free.

If you go to this location you are in good hands and won't regret it.

resp.text:
Hey Cate, if you're bill is different than what you were quoted in-store, we'd like to help. Please email us at socialcare@mfrm.com with the Subject Line as Your Name/Google Review (city/state) the following information:

--Order number
--Name on order
--Store location of purchase
--Original quote versus actual quote
--Best phone number
--Best email address
--Preferred method of contact
--Best time frame and day of the week to be reached

We look forward to working towards a solution together,
Megan

text: PSA: If at any point in time, you want to purchase furniture...avoid Hot Buys Furniture in Decatur, AL. We have been waiting on a sectional that we purchased in full weeks ago. The delivery date will come and go and I HAVE TO CALL THEM just to be told the date has been pushed back. This has happened not once, not twice, but three damn times. If we hadn’t paid in full, I would be going somewhere else. Smh.

name: Jama Hoffman
text: I emailed the store about what I was looking for, got Reggie, who promptly emailed me back with pictures and prices of things I might like. When I came to the store, unannounced, he took his time with my husband and I, showing us what we told him we were interested in finding for our new home. I never felt pressured. I ended up buying a sectional and 4 barstools from him and he surprised me by delivering the stools a day early, with fabric samples for outdoor furniture I was wanting to purchase, but thought I would have to make the hour drive over and back to look at samples. He sent the ones I mentioned to him in an email with the delivery men so I could match them to my current color scheme and  then call and order it over the phone. They have given me exemplary customer service, the best prices of anyone I have shopped with and have earned my business for all the other needs I have for this retirement home. My daughter was the one who referred me to them, having received the same treatment when she purchased a new sofa for her home. They are the best!

text: After our home was flooded, we were in the market for a bedroom suite to replace my daughter's damaged one. We purchased beautiful, high-quality furniture for half the price of the other stores.  The young delivery men were quick & skillful in bringing in & setting up our pieces. I cannot recommend this business highly enough.  Very pleased.

name: Dustin Myhand
text: Reggie and his staff at High Point Furniture are first class all the way!  We've bought several pieces from High Point and have never had anything less than a fantastic experience.  The sales staff are knowledge and don't pressure you.  The delivery and set up has always gone off without a hitch.  The quality of the items at High Point is WAY higher than the prices!  We've shopped many places of supposedly comparable quality, here in town and elsewhere and have not found anyone who can compete with High Point from a quality, customer service, ease of doing business and price standpoint.  In today's world of online shopping and the absence of relationship building while doing business, Reggie and the folks at High Point are a breath of fresh air!

text: The best prices. I shopped around and got the best deal on my furniture.  They delivered in 7 days. I will shop again when I want something else. You can shop with confidence that they will beat anybody's prices.

name: David Allred
text:
My girlfriend and I recently moved into a new house and initially just went in hoping to add some pieces to the furniture we already had.  When we walked in, we were greeted by a very nice salesman and told he would help us if we needed it.  After seeing some amazing deals we couldn't help but look around.  The furniture in our current home is Ashley Furniture and has lasted for nearly 10 years so with the prices we figured it was time for an upgrade.  We were able to completely replace our living room furniture with a great sectional, rug and a table set, get a flip  flop (futon like convertible) and a brand new pillowtop mattress.  They even swapped out some pieces that were placed with other furniture because we liked how it looked.  We purchased the furniture and it was delivered 2 weeks later.  the delivery guys were prompt and didn't damage anything.

I wish I had more rooms to furnish because I'd definitely go back

name: Jerry Goodin
text: Very good furniture at very reasonable cost.... Staff is very helpful

text: The worker's are complete racist, who turned their backs when me and my boyfriend entered the store. The did not even greet us. I'll never step one foot back in that store!!

name: Bob Stell
text:
New store. Friendly staff. Prices are low for sales of in-store items, but be sure to check around on special orders: the claimed "retail" cost may be grossly inflated. (apparently, everybody does this...). Should be good if you buy off the floor, though. Delivery charge is lower than some.

(Update) My back-ordered item finally arrived a month late, but patience paid off - the delivery went very well and we are enjoying our new item. Add one star!

name: Lisa Brizendine
text: I initially had great sales experience (bought several pieces May 2019).  However, the frame broke on one of the sofas I purchased when I had guests sit on it in Dec..  Although they have a 1-year manufacturer's warranty (obvious defect) and was initially told they would replace it, a few months later, they tell me it's not under the 1 year warranty.  They couldn't even locate the sofa (Lane) in their catalog to replace it; so, I don't even know where it actually came from.  Seems like they bought it for cheap from somewhere and resold it.  I have emailed the store owner (manager) about it and never got a response.  Terrible business tactics. Since they refuse to back their products and policies, I will NEVER shop there again.

name: Lisa Cooper
text: I put some furniture on layaway in November and made payments until February, when I went to pay in March they were closed for Co-Vid and would open in May I return in May the store is full of furniture but still closed. I returned in June the store was empty with a note saying to call a number for Human Resources which was the phone to Hot Buys furniture in Madison. I call them they say come in and they'll help me I have been in 4 times and yesterday they said they have a set on the truck that I can come pick up the next day. Get there the next day after having my son throw his furniture away they can't help because the receipt was written on and they van only verify that I put down a deposit of $150 and the other $500 is just gone in the wind. Signature just packed and left town so I'm out of money with no bedroom set.

name: Dis' Guy
text: I had very good experience there. I purchased a mattress that I thought was the one I wanted but it ended up not being comfortable enough for my body. 3 days later, I contacted Moe, who was very understanding and helpful in working with me to find another mattress. Not only did he help me find another mattress,  he assisted with getting me approved for financing and gave me a really good deal on the mattress I now own. I also want to give appreciation to Nick, the gentleman that was very helpful in the showroom as well as helping me load and unload the mattress into my apartment. I will definitely be going back for other merchandise and highly recommend others to visit Signature Furniture on South Parkway.

name: Mary Goodwin
text: I had a very nice  experience at Signature Furniture.  Moe was very helpful  in helping  you find  what you wanted. He is a very nice person.  He knows  how to treat  people  when  you enter the store. He takes care of his customers. Job well done. Keep the good work  up Moe. I highly recommend Signature  Furniture!!!!!!!!!

name: Leah Nicole
text: I had to edit my original post because how this company started acting while I wait for my large order to arrive. So they delivered my couch it was painless, I got a loan on it and the service was good. However the bulk of my purchase almost 3,000 worth hasn't been delivered but that's not the whole issue it's the way the store has been acting. I called them 2 week before my delivery was due, they didn't answer the phone. Everyday I called and they didn't answer, stated open on business hours and I even used a different number once, nothing. See I actually wanted to purchase something else but I got suspicious. What business doesn't answer the phone this went on for a while. I finally drove there to find the door locked a new sign that said they are open but the open sign not lit so I knocked on the window because inside I could see a young guy wrapping up all the furniture. Another suspicious thing. He called some guy over and the guy opened the door and said they were remodeling. I went back the same day it just didn't feel right the guy said the last guy moved  to somewhere else he offered me to come in said most of my things already arrived but they would deliver on the due date. Which was fine I asked why they didn't answer the phone he said because they are always on the floor. The phone is cordless and both times I went there the guy was behind the desk where the phone was. Also I seen the guy who originally took my order he went to the back before I got in the store I didn't mention it. All this  would make perfect since to have everything out the store due to remodeling but they just seem fishy two!days before my purchase should arrive I go and there is a note says closed till after the 10 of April due to corona. I'll update my post if they get my furniture a week after that date like they said.  O hope it all turns out well but like I said it it don't smell right. Meanwhile me and my babies will be sleeping on mats and my new couch. Smh. Please signature furniture stick to your word. Service was so good in the beginning, stuff happens and I know it could just be my situation I wouldn't care if I had thousands to waste butI don't.

text:

Thanks signature furniture & Dave! See you again soon.

text: I do not recommend Mr. Sandman. I was promised $100 credit because they delivered the wrong box springs, one month later Mr. Sandman has still not issued the credit. I had also paid an additional $75 for mattress to be safely delivered in a van or enclosed box truck; instead, mattress and mismatched box springs were delivered squashed inside the open back of an unmarked regular size pickup truck... and delivered five hours late. Thanks for all the help.

name: Sam Cook
text:
Update: After a few days, the first nectar mattress I had purchased did not expand all the way out, so I had it replaced with another one. I had to wait a week to get it exchanged and then I received another nectar mattress. THE 2nd MATTRESS IS DOING THE EXACT SAME THING...now I'm stuck with another defective mattress, waiting to exchange this one. I am still waiting to find out when I can get my 3rd mattress, but I am very upset with the quality of nectar and bedzzz express for having faulty product. The customer service has been friendly, but I feel like I am being stringed along since they already have my money.

Previous: Went into bedzzz express with the intention of walking out with a mattress that day. I had originally tried to purchase a mattress from nectar, but the shipping was taking months to arrive, so I cancelled my order. Max was friendly and showed me my options based on my budget. Ended up going with a nectar mattress they had there because it was all ready to go in a box and it was the exact one I was looking for in the first place. Max helped me get it into my car and I was on my way. Stress free experience and not crowded at all.

resp.text: Oh no, Sam! We're terribly sorry that this is happening with your nectar mattress! Can you please call or text me at (205) 281-5524 or email me at david@bedzzzexpress.com?

text: We had a wonderful experience at this Hoover Alabama location with Max.  He was completely knowledgeable about the products he represents. Thank you again Max and Bedzzz Express.

name: Jacqueline Bryant
text: My husband and I decided to try this place out because of their big sale going on. Our shopping experience was great but as soon as we paid them it went down hill from there. We originally went to just get a new mattress set and decided to go ahead and purchase a sectional as well. They said they had to order the mattress and would deliver it all after the weekend which was no problem. Delivery day comes and I’m 100% sure 1 of the delivery drivers was on drugs as he kept making weird noises and just biting air..... They bring everything in and get it set up and I ask where the 3rd piece of my sectional was and get told oh there’s no third piece it’s a typo ect. Well a week later they call to tell me they found my 3rd piece of my sectional which I then had to drive to pickup myself and install myself once home (for the amount we paid for the sectional I wasn’t happy) Then to top it off our mattress didn’t feel right from day one. It was hard as a rock and killing my back worse than it already is. (We were purchasing a new mattress for that reason!) Well I finally get my husband to move The mattress Around and realize IT’S NOT THE RIGHT ONE. We paid A LOT for the mattress and needless to say I expected the right one to be delivered! They did get my correct mattress to me finally after almost a week and offered to give me store credit or refunded me some of my money. I tried to purchase other furniture pieces with the credit but he was pricing the items way higher then the advertised price so I finally just requested a refund which they did with a POST DATED check! So, needless to say I was worried the funds would even be in the bank. I then find out the owner not only knew that my mattress was wrong but told his employees to give me what they had in the back and not order the correct one! They did that the day I bought it bc after getting everything done my sales lady said oh it will have a different cover on it bc they changed it so don’t be alarmed 🤦🏻‍♀️ (the correct mattress they finally delivered looks exactly the same as the one in the show room. So no they didn’t change it)  So they knew before I walked out of the store the day I purchased that they weren’t going to send my correct furniture that they were going to send me what they had in the back regardless of what it paid for and hope I didn’t notice. Needless to say I will not be back PERIOD. None of my delivery was correct at all because they didn’t want to order what I needed but had no problem taking over 5k from me.

name: DoubleSword Productions
text: Holley's has nice furniture but their items are very expensive.  I've been to other places and they are anywhere from $200-$500 cheaper.  A plus is they have free delivery.  Keith greeted me right away and was very helpful.  If you can afford their furniture, I would recommend Holley's.

resp.text:
DoubleSword please tell me the items you are referring to.  I can assure you we are not expensive if you compare apples to apples.  Many items may look alike,  but are very different when you consider that in many pieces of furniture,  70% of what you're paying for you can't see. A Flexsteel sofa may cost more than other brands,  but with very good reason. Our price along with free delivery,  are competitive with anyone. We have people from out if town to shop with us because our prices are lower!  Compare apples to apples and combine that with our staff and service and you see why Holley's has been around since 1960. Thank you and please contact me with any specific pieces you feel are higher than other stores.

Ralph Holley

name: Ms. Barbara
text:
UPDATED 3/17/21

My husband and I made a purchase at this store on 2/27/21. The parking was adequate and the store was clean. The staff was not strictly adhering to covid protocols. My salesman took his mask off several times.

The salesman who assisted us was a bit pushy and distracted. My husband felt insulted by some of the salesman's comments that were intended to be funny. The salesman refused to give us clear price information even when I specifically asked him to, so the price we paid ended up being more than what the salesman quoted (which ticked me off). We almost left without buying anything. I actually regret going through with the purchase.

The items were delivered on time and in good condition on 3/5/21. The delivery guys were pleasant and professional. They set up our new bed quickly and efficiently.

After posting a negative review we were contacted by a manager outside of the Jasper store. She apologized and issued a refund for an erroneous charge. She also helped us return some items. However, it was uncomfortable returning the items to the Jasper store with our salesman present.

Overall, we might shop at Mattress Firm again, but probably not the Jasper location.

resp.text: Ms. Barbara I apologize sincerely for your negative experience. Please contact the store 205-384-4107 and leave your name and contact information and leadership will contact you back.

name: Jerica Ware
text:
I cannot say enough about the most amazing customer service we received from Jack at Matress Firm Jasper! My boyfriend and I both highly value and place much importance on6 y quality customer service. We felt our shopping experience here deserved an excellent review!

We received the BEST customer service and HIGHLY RECOMMENDED visiting Matress Firm Jasper if you are in search of a new matress!!

We were so kindly greeted as soon as we walked through the door by Jack. He was very friendly, professional yet personable and extremely knowledgeable about what the store had to offer. We had an idea of the type of mattress we wanted but it's always been, at best, a good "guess" when purchasing mattresses at other stores in the past...and this time we wanted to get it right!
Jack began by asking us a few questions, using the coolest visual to help break down the basics of where to start when looking for a new matress, and got to know a little more about us, then led us straight to the floor.

I've never had a matress shopping "experience", and Jack definitely took customer service to the next level! He didn't leave us to aimlessly wander about the store, instead he led us to the matt⁵,resses to test  based on our interests. Then after explaining  the features and benefits of each matress as well as what to look/feel for when testing them, he allowed us time to lbcomfortable and take as much time as we needed.
After testing about 3 to 4 matresses, we chose the exact one Jack knew, himself, that we would enjoy the most all along! (Best part of it all...we were definitely not planning on actually purchasing a matress that exact evening...more to just look around).

resp.text: Thank you so much Jerica!!!!!

name: Ouida Dickinson
text: Trying to return mattress but reimbursement quite a bit more than the salesman indicated when I purchased.  So be sure to get all the details on return and read the small print on your contract.  The salesman must have repeated 10 times, "you can return within a 100 days but there is a $200 fee for pickup"  My reimbursement is about $400 less than what I paid.

resp.text: Thanks for sharing your feedback, Ouida. We provide this information on our website, at the register in each of our stores, and on the receipt we ask you to review and sign once you complete your order, so this information should have been provided in your paperwork. This is why we ask our owners to sign their receipts confirming that they have read and understood all of the terms and conditions. If you have any questions we can help with, please give us a call at 1-888-411-2270 from 8AM-8PM CST M-F.

I had plans to go to a few more stores after this to look around, but I didn't! She was great to deal with and very helpful. I was in and out in around 20 minutes! Picked out my bedroom set, got approved for the great financing offer they had going on, and set up my delivery. I highly recommend asking for Veronica!

resp.text: We’re thrilled to receive such positive feedback regarding your Havertys purchase! Thank you for sharing your experience with Veronica and we hope you enjoy your new bedroom set.

text: Went in looking for a specfic cabinet but didn't find it however we did find a beautiful dining room set.  Tashayla was a big help in our decision to buy she was very helpful and informative.  We had to go home and measure our room to make sure we had enough room for dining set comfortably.  Upon reentering the store to make the purchase final Tashyla saw my husband an I and meet us and ask "is it going to work for you?"  We purchased and are excitedly awaiting our delivery on Wednesday.  It was a pleasure to do business with Havertys.

name: J Schleigh
text: Nice people. Good service. Need better pricing for a Labor Day sale.

name: Angela Weaver
text: After being charged $300 for delivery I was told that it wouldn't  be a problem to receive deliver of my furniture after 4:00 pm on Monday, after I got home from work, then found out that, that was not true when an automated system called to confirm the deliver between 9:00 am and 2:00 pm. After speaking with Darwin the salesman we had initial dealt with I was told it was because they only deliver to baldwin county on Mondays and that there was no way to say what exact time they would show up. So if you live anywhere in baldwin county or further I would definitely not suggest doing business with them. Also it seems like they will say whatever to make the sale and get you on the hook. $300 for delivery???? That's insane especially for the terrible service I have gotten with trying to nail down a time for delivery. For the price it is not worth the headache

resp.text: We are disappointed to hear that you did not have a more positive experience with us at Azalea Center. Our manager would really like to speak with you more regarding this matter. Please reach out to us at (251) 341-3349. We look forward to hearing from you.

name: Laura Stevens
text:
When spending thousands of dollars on furniture you would expect professional, reliable service. I was very disappointed with our store visit over the weekend dealing with a manager on duty who quoted us Havertys policies and procedures.
Now our delivery is 4 hours late ( past the 3 hour window) I only found this out because I called to check the status of the delivery. I will be having my furniture delivered after 9pm (3:45- 5:45  was orginal time window) which is unexceptable! While on the phone with customer service I was quoted Havertys policies around delivery and promised a delivery time of 7:40 pm.  It is now 9pm and they still have not showed up and customer service is closed. If I could do over I would have spent our money elsewhere. What should have been a fun buying experience has been a stressful one.  I do not recommend Haverty's and will not be buying from this company again.

name: Dolores Ramella
text: My elderly mother-in-law went to Sleep Outfitters in South Charleston WV on August 31. She chose a mattress, applied for credit and was told she had been approved. However, the salesperson told her they could not complete the sale and arrange delivery until she received the actual credit card in the mail. After about 2 weeks she had still not received the card so after a few calls to the store and the bank she was told they would cancel the first card and issue a new one. As of September 21 she still didn't have the card so her son-in-law went to the store with her. They then agreed to go ahead and deliver the mattress on Thursday the 24th. Well, they never showed and also didn't call her. So she called them Friday morning and canceled the order. And they didn't even offer an explanation or an apology. Terrible way to do business and to treat an 83 year old woman.

Thank you for checking out the showroom and the wonderful zero gravity recliners. I look forward to helping you with your selection.
