name: Dan Ayo
text:
The products at Relax the Back are outstanding. But the greatest thing about RTB is Bob Duncan! If you ever need a friend, visit Bob at his store in Vestavia Hills. My wife and I drove from Thibodaux, La to Birmingham to try out chairs that might help my chronic back problem. The SuperNovo Massage chair is helping me more that steroid injections, chiropractors, yoga, exercise and the many other things I’ve tried over the last 46 years of chronic back pain. It truly is a medical device. It won’t cure you, but it will make you feel a lot better...
Dan Ayo
Thibodaux, LA

resp.text: Happy New Year and thanks so much for the great review. We are pleased you are finding relief from your new massage chair. True spinal care takes a 24 hour approach, let us know when we can help with sleep needs, office chair needs and travel components for spinal support. We are here for you. Take Care

name: David M
text:
Since I started working from home full-time back in March, my existing chair was giving me back pain. I tried purchasing an office chair from Amazon and also went to Office Depot, Staples, and two other local office supply stores and none of the chairs were suitable for my back. I realized that I should invest in a solid ergonomic chair and not get something cheap because I consider my current productivity and long-term health very important.

Bob was very helpful and attentive in helping me select a chair. He knew the ins and outs of all of the products and answered my detailed questions about how they compare to other popular chairs on the market. He was also well-versed in ergonomics and spine and posture issues. I decided to go with the X-Chair. I think all of the products are thoroughly vetted by Relax The Back and ergonomists. I received my chair this week and assembled it. Bob has been very responsive in updating me on the shipping and making sure I was able to assemble everything, which was fairly simple. I highly recommend visiting this store and trying the chairs or other products out.

resp.text: David, these days the new norm is working from home! Thanks for the great review on your X Chair purchase experience. Our customers well being and spinal support are a top priority. You let me know if I can help in the future. Kind Regards Bob Duncsn

name: Danny Joiner
text: Nice location with lots of items to choose from. Sitting in a few chairs I found them to be very comfortable. After seeing the prices, they were way overpriced like any furniture store. I know you pay for quality and comfort but if you have time, you can drive to Atlanta and get the same quality products for 30% less.

resp.text:
Hi there and thank you for taking time for a review. I tried to look up your account with our store and could not seem to find your info. If there is anything I can help with please feel free to contact me directly as I would love to help you with your wellness needs.

Kind Regards,
Bob Duncan store owner
205-965-7415 cell
Birmingham@relaxtheback.com

name: Glen Duncan
text: Bob was superb in every respect. A true professional who’s first goal is to assist each customer in finding exactly the best solution!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words. With more and more people having to work from home these days we always strive to find the best home office solutions. Hope you are enjoying your new X Chair. Come see me again if I can help.

name: Jeanne and Theron Wells
text: Gerald was most helpful in explaining in detail the options for zero gravity chairs and the advantages of each chair. The chairs on the floor reflected the features of the chairs in which we were interested. Gerald patiently demonstrated every aspect of the chairs. We decided on our chair  a week later. We selected Perfect Chair PC 600-Pad 801 Omni Motion Silhouette which fit Jeanne perfectly. Within 10 days, our order was filled and our new chair was painstakingly demonstrated in our living room by Bob, the  franchise owner. We love our new chair and look forward to many years of relaxation.

resp.text:
Thank you very much Mr. and Mrs. Wells for the wonderful review. As a franchisee of Relax The Back my number one goal is total customer satisfaction with our consultative process. We never want anyone to make an uniformed purchase decision.  It was great to come to Dothan and personally deliver your Perfect Chair. Please let us know if we can help with any other wellness needs.

Kind Regards,
Bob Duncan, Store Owner

name: Daniel Cingoranelli
text: The gentleman that helped me I believe his name was Gerald. He was very helpful in assisting me into finding the correct office chair that would be most beneficial to my lower back condition. All the way from the type of chair, fabric material and stitching. Overall cost of chair was higher than I expected but definitely worth it. The way I look at it, if I’m going to spend 1/3 of my day on a chair, with chronic pain, it’s worth every penny when I head home, I don’t feel like I’m exhausted from dealing with the physical pain I deal with. The chair helps in eliminating the pain I would normally accrue during the day with other chairs. Not with this one.

resp.text:
Thank you so very much for your impression of your experience with Gerald. He is a very valuable team member and it's nice to hear your thoughts. We are very pleased that your new office chair is helping to relieve your discomfort and in turn helping to make you more productive. Please come see us again whenever we can help.

Kind Regards, Bob Duncan store owner

name: Jared Vann Chapman
text: Awesome back care products! Great prices with friendly & knowledgeable service. Dont leave without trying the massage chairs! Bob and Gerald gave me some really helpful information about proper posture and back care. Will definitely be shopping here again soon!

resp.text: Thank you for the wonderful review! We appreciate the time you took to let others know about your experience. FREE massage chair Demos are our most popular product, and all are welcome anytime. Hope to see you again soon.

name: Cody Johnson
text: Lots of cool things inside other than just chairs such as massagers, chair cushions, back rests, pillows, etc. so it's definitely worth checking out!  I have purchased several things from this store and am completely satisfied with everything I purchased.  I only had to return one item and had no issues with the return process.  The staff is very knowledgeable about their products and very friendly.  The products they sell are very much high quality and are definitely worth the money.  I work from home a few days a week and having a comfortable, ergonomic chair is a must for me.  I made the decision to spend the money and upgrade from a crappy chair I bought at an office supply store to something that was much better suited for sitting for long periods of time.  If I was going to spend the money I also wanted it to last a long time.  They had several options in store to choose from and try out.  I ended up going with a Lifeform chair and I absolutely love it.

resp.text: Thank you very much for the kind words and the view you had of your experience. The LIFEFORM ergonomic office chair is a great choice for true COMFORT and proper positioning for those long hours of work. Please let us know if there is ever anything else we can do to help increase your productivity.

name: Roy Smith
text: Gerald did an excellent job explaining the features of each and every item I was interested in.  His product knowledge is impressive.  I came in for the Lumbar Extender Plus and purchased it right away after Gerald explained the usage of the product and allowed me to try it in the store.  He also explained and demonstrated the benefits of the zero gravity chairs, mattresses, pillows, and massage chairs.  I tried several of the massage chairs during my two visits in the store and plan on purchasing one in the near future.  Excellent store and excellent service!

resp.text: Mr. Smith, Gerald is a valuable team member here at RTB Birmingham. We appreciate your review of his consultative service and hope to see you again soon.

Called my sister, told my pain doctor as well as friends about this seat.  I can sit and read and knit comfortably without any pain!   Thank you Kevin and Gary!

resp.text: Ms. McPoland, thank you for taking the time to review your experience with the Sacro-Ease support by McCartys. We value our relationships with our medical partners and try to become an extension to the care they are giving their patients. Thank you also for spreading the word about our very unique store to others. Please visit us again soon.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to review your experience. With 100 stores nationwide and 30 plus years in the wellness business, we love helping customers find true therapeutic products to give comfort and relief. Stop in again when in the area.

resp.text: Lauren, we are so sorry your experience with the pillow you decided on about a month ago after our "Try before you buy" loaner program is not helping. We take pride in the fact that we are the only retailer that allows customers to actually make their decision after taking a loaner home for a few nights. I believe you may have even tried a couple before you bought? Unfortunately for sanitary reasons our policy is to not take back any product that comes into contact with the skin after it has been unwrapped from its original packaging. If you decide to come back in for any of our many other therapeutic products, please see me and I will get you a discount that might help. Bob Duncan, owner

text:
The saleslady was friendly, very helpful and not pushy.  She facilitated a relaxed time while helping us picking out our new furniture.
The store is clean, well-ordered, and not crowded.  They set up a practical payment plan enabling us to pay off the furniture in less than a year at no interest.
Delivery was on a rainy day.  The men were very courteous, careful in narrow doorways, and cheerful .. no mud tracked in..  Assembly was fast and clean.
I have recommended this store to my friends and family.  Our daughter had a very successful and pleasant experience, too.  Why shop elsewhere?  These folks have been neighbors for many years.

Seems to me that someone in tthat store would have sacrificed one dollar to save us a long trip. I know I would certainly have done that for my good customers. We would have certainly paid them back when we had to go to town. Sigh.... just saying. 😪

While we hope you don't have to encounter this again, we want to make you aware of other payment options that might be more convenient. We recommend trying our online payment service, pay-by-phone automated line, or simply calling our credit team at 1-877-706-8959. Thank you for being our loyal customer. We appreciate YOU!

name: KRISSY HIGGINS
text: I ordered furniture at Helena store around end of April 2021. Told furniture would be in May 28. Well May 28 and no furniture. They told me truck does not even deliver until June 9. Finally got order a few days after and it was missing a dresser. I was told it is in Tuscaloosa by mistake. They will go get it. When I get home 1 dresser is damaged. I send pictures to email per Marcus requested. 2 weeks later still no missing dresser or reply about damaged dresser. They tell me that the Forest dale store location has 2 dressers I can go there and get them and bring damage dresser to them. Chasity at Forest dale store is amazing. She was a great help to get this taken care of for me. Although when I get home 1 of the 2 dressers is damaged. Now what? Guess I have to figure how to make defective dresser be ok. I'm not driving a hour back over there for more defective furniture. Never settle for the cheaper price. My granny always said you pay for what you get..

resp.text: We apologize for any inconvenience. Please reach out to the Store Manager at 205-624-4444 to discuss  your experience.

name: Gwendolyn Ivy
text: I purchased a sectional for my den and sofa and love seat for my living room. All pieces were supposed to be delivered on 6/19/2021. I was quoted a delivery fee of 175 because it was coming from Tuscaloosa. Well due to the weather, I received a call at 7pm stating my sectional would be delivered between 12-6on 6/20/2021. When I required about my sofa and loveseat...it's not on this delivery. I was informed I would have to pay another delivery fee for something I had no control over. I have been calling the Helena store since 7:02pm and the line has been busy. I am beyond upset and I am not happy.

resp.text: We apologize for any inconvenience. Please reach out to the Store Manager at 205-624-4444 to discuss your experience.

1 1/2 years later we find out that none of these things are actually covered under the plan.

We feel we were intentionally misled into paying for a useless service.

Do your business with a company of integrity, but not American Freight of Helena.

name: Vivacious Criss
text:
I been a customer every since 2019. Back when Cory and delivery man Lorenzo was there. No problems. My husband purchased the Raspberry Bedroom set. He asked Marcus for the complete set. Marcus was too busy inquiring who my husband was buying the bedroom suit for. That he didn't disclose the set only includes one nightstand. Usually a Queen size bed set has two parties. My husband spent $1,333.16, plus $200.00 for delivery. Just to find out there's only one nightstand.  I called Darnell who accuses me of yelling and I can't fix it, if you don't stop. All bets were off when he made the comment that my husband and I should have looked online.  To see what the order details. Voices on both sides got loud, and Darnell laughs and hangs up. So, if you go to a restaurant, you should already know what's on the menu.  I will not be back and I'm telling my family members who shop here too. Don't!!

Just want to inform the Regional Manager that a paid in full Bedroom Set and Set up, plus tip. A paid in full order that was supposed to be delivered all on Tuesday. The Chess part that they didn't have Tuesday 06/30/2020, and MARCUS said would come Wednesday 07/01/2020, the deliveryman told us 8:30p.m. he was still coming. Only not too show up. And my husband and I didn't get to bed until 12:00a.m., and husband had to be at work 5:00 a.m. the next morning. So, we are going on the third day 07/02/2020, waiting on our $200.00 Raspberry chest, just to call all day. The deliverymen arrived 11:20 p.m., threw the chess down, that was paid to be assembled and left. Need I say more.

name: Diana Sexton
text: They had terrible delivery service 3  yrs ago, but I gave them a 2nd chance. Nothing has changed. Still terrible. They gave me a 8am-5pm delivery window. At 10am, they called to make sure I was home for delivery. They claimed they had my furniture on the truck for days (I bought it on Friday and they don't deliver on weekends). They said they had been calling me several times. I had 2 missed calls and 1 voicemail (I called back as soon as I got the voicemail). At 1pm, I called to get a status and they said delivery between 12pm-5pm. At 4pm, they called to see if they could deliver. They said they called several times, with messages and a text. 2 calls is not several, 1 voicemail which I returned promptly and no text. Furniture is nice enough, but will never use their delivery again.

name: Courtney Harris
text: Terribly awful experience!! First off, if Marcus is your salesperson expect absolutely nothing to get done or be done right. I ordered a bedroom and living room set over a month ago to be delivered on June 26th. All of my furniture didn't arrive on time... I still haven't received my living room furniture nor an update on when it's expected to arrive. I finally cancelled the order and asked for a refund yesterday. When my bedroom furniture did arrive, the wrong chest was delivered. Also, Marcus claims he forgot to include my bedrails and I didn't have screws for my headboard. The delivery fee was $100, with no assembly. I had to drive back to the store for my bedrails. No considerations nor accommodations were made for me regarding my time or gas even though this order was paid in full and this was a mistake he made. As of yesterday, he still could not give me an update on the status of my living room furniture. I finally spoke with the manager who was unaware of this situation and told me that my complaint was one of many and that Marcus had been demoted. However, this doesn't change the fact that I've been in my house for almost a month with no living room furniture and they've had the payment in full long before I even closed on my house. DON'T ORDER ANYTHING FROM HERE!

name: Adam Huddleston
text:
We bought a new sofa/loveseat combo from them. The pricetag was certainly lower than anywhere else we looked, and it looked like OK quality furniture.
Less than 3 weeks after purchase, the sofa literally fell apart. We're pretty normal sized people and have treated it with care. I turned it over and opened up the upholstery to have a look.  The construction quality is the worst I've ever seen; low grade partical board, half-rotted knotty 1/2" thick pine, and the whole thing is held together with staples.  I identified 6 separate joints that had come apart inside the couch due to the staples simply slipping out of the wood, and many more that were halfway undone.
I ended up taking around 3 or 4 hours and meticulously replacing pieces, reinforcing joints with metal brackets and screws, and closing up places in the upholstery which were mysteriously split and leaking stuffing.

The furniture here is truly of the lowest quality, even if it appears fine on the surface.  If you buy from here, make sure you also purchase their ridiculously expensive warranty (that will tack on $100 - $200 to your purchase), because you're gonna be needing it a whole lot.  If you need cheap furniture, go to the thrift store or use Facebook marketplace. If you want new furniture, spring for something more expensive.

resp.text:
Hello Adam,

We are sorry to hear you are having troubles with your purchase and would like to help as best we can. Please call 1-866-388-6333 so we can put you in direct contact with the Regional Manager of the store location you purchased from.

text: Our family purchased a new couch and love seat over the weekend from American Freight. Love, love, love what we found, and it looks so good in our living room. It was very affordable. text: Quality furniture at a reasonable price. Mr.Martise’s customer service skills are also noteworthy. I recently had an issue and he went above and beyond to assist me. Great store, great prices and great employees; always a winning combination!

name: Trent Martin
text: Purchased a bedroom set and a sectional for my living room. Waited all day for furniture to be delivered. After I have already left my unfurnished apartment for the night because I don’t have a bed, my furniture finally arrives at 10:00pm, paid $100 (which had to be in cash) to the delivery guys... only for them to not assemble the furniture. $2,000.00 later, I am still sleeping on the couch, that I assembled myself, until my friends are available to help me assemble my furniture.

resp.text:
Hello Trent,

We are sorry about your experience with the delivery of your merchandise and would like to help as best we can. Please call 1-866-884-6178 so we can put you in direct contact with the Vice President of the store location you purchased from.

Thank you.

name: Givon Wayne Gilliam
text:
We bought a floor model and learned a valuable lesson. The couch with chase looked great on the showroom floor and we were very excited to get what we thought was a good deal.

In less than a year the cushions started to shred.  We do not have children and very few guests.  We are very gentle on our furniture.   To our dismay and surprise the couch covering started to disintegrate before our very eyes.   The middle cushion does not even get used at all and it was the first one to split and fray. See photo for what your couch will look like if you buy it from American Freight.

We took the cushions into the store thinking they would honor a 1 year warranty.  Unfortunately because the couch was a floor model it was an “as-is”purchase  and we were out of luck.  American Freight said that there was nothing that they could do.

Here is a warning for you.  If you decide to purchase a floor model, do not be surprised if it does not last one year.  You are buying disposable furniture.  Lesson learned.

name: Connor Gaston
text: Didn't have the best experience here.  Found a couch I liked and paid for it. Came to pick it up a week later on a Saturday. I was getting the fabric protection also and they told me to call a day or two before I wanted to come pick it up so they could have it all done and dried.   I called 2 days before and they told me to call on Saturday when I wanted to pick up.   So I call on Saturday morning when they opened telling them  I wanted to pick up and 1pm.  They told me to call 30minutes before I came so they could spray it.    Got there and the couch they had ready for me was not even the correct couch.  On top of that it had not been sprayed with the fabric protection.  No one there really knew what was going on or who had done what with the couch.  Thankfully the couch I did buy was still there and had not been sold to anyone else.

text: First of all my brother DARNELL is the bomb! My purchase was actually from the Trussville location, and my experience with them has been far below professional. They did not provide me with the information I needed to know for my furniture to be delivered. I paid ONE HUNDRED FREAKING DOLLARS for them to literally drop the box off at my house. That is a LOT of money for a box to be dropped off regardless of the location. So I spoke to Darnell at the Helena location who very kindly listened to me rant about this experience is resolved the matter in much less time than the Trussville location. Seriously, he's your guy. He's amazing!!! I cannot thank him enough for what he is done. While I will never go to Trussville again, should I find anything else I want from American Freight, I will most certainly do my business with the Helena location!

name: Amy Thompson
text:
Bought (and financed) two matching recliners on July 21st of 2018. The Helena store only had one so we picked up the other from the Trussville location. Get home to find the Trussville store had given us a broken chair. We return it to the Helena store a few days later and were told they would have to order it and it could take up to 3 weeks to receive the replacement.
We have been very patient, probably to patient...Because here we are 5 months later paying on a chair/recliner that we don't have!
Through these past 5 months there have been countless attempts to reach out to the Helena location, only to be blown off by staff that insist they are oblivious to what is going on and leave me with, "I will have to call you back."
Never to be heard from again until the next time I call or reach out via the American freight website.
This situation has gone on entirely long enough! I personally do not suggest doing business with this company and if you so choose to, just remember, "buyer beware!"

text: I had a really good experience today with Henry Nix at the Vestavia location. I needed mattresses for four beds. This last purchase , I utilized their 90 day comfort guarantee and selected another mattress. there were no issues and I love my new mattress.
The only reason I am not giving a 5 star rating, the delivery crew damaged my Headboard.

After my review, received a call from David at Bedzzz Express. David immediately took care of my damage to my headboard and was very apologetic. Everyone involved went out of there way to make me happy.
I will continue to be a Bedzz Express customer.

text: If I could rate no stars I would. Worst money I’ve spent on furniture. The sofa started peeling not even a yr after purchase. Communication was horrible. Although they said they were going to call me, I had to continue calling to see if my items were in. I ordered a king bed but they sent Cali king frame so they had to re-order. Which the bed was on back order and I wasn’t told until after we spend over $8000 total. I don’t know why it took so many years for them to finally close down.

name: DaBlkAristocrats Podcast
text: Horrible customer service!!! We spent over 6 grand there and it's been 5 months and we still haven't got our bed rails in... we called and called at twice a week and we keep getting the run around about the manufacturer is sending the peices.. they originally gave us the wrong one, and still installed anyway and left our home with out saying anything until we noticed a day later... and as i type this review we still haven't got our pieces in yet nor do they communicate with us about it.... sad to say I haven't enjoyed a good nights rest in my bed yet.... oh and on the sofa set we got from them, they gave us the wrong screw on leg(which they installed) and we called about that until 3 months later they sent us one..... I will never shop there again and I guarantee 4 out of 7 ppl have had complaints or problems with them.. this is not from a mad place either I'm just being COMPLETELY HONEST, DONT WASTE YOUR TIME FOLKS.... after the 30 days warranty they throw u to the wolves..... highly disappointed..... and I can verify all of this because I recorded every time my wife or I have talked to them for my records... they called us twice and we have called them 27 times in 4-5 month period... and still getting screwed over

name: Michelle Owen
text: They advertise 24 months with no interest.  My husband and I picked out furniture.  We were approved for 5000 dollars.  But only 12 months no interest. We couldn’t get the 24.   If we were approved for that much why was it only for 12 months?  Our payments were gonna be over 300 dollars a month.  When we asked how much it would be with interest it was gonna be over 200 a month for 24 months.  We figured up the stuff we wanted was 3600 dollars. After paying for 2 years we would pay over 5000 dollars. Way too much interest.  They use the 24 months no interest to get you in the door then tell you you can’t get it.  Then you have to pay a lot of interest.  I guess they think if you are already in there you will go ahead and pay with interest. False advertising.  We went somewhere else and got the same amount of furniture for 128 dollars a month.

resp.text: Hi, Michelle. We're sorry we couldn't provide you with the financing terms you had hoped for, but are delighted to hear you were able to get the furniture you needed. Thank you for taking the time to share your experience.

name: Michael Battle
text:
The service at the oxford Alabama branch sucks!!! The manager of the store is very RUDE and disrespectful to the employees. And the customers receive the same treatment.

I have never been insulted and treated so poorly. 1st....they attempted to deliver my furniture incomplete. Was going to deliver and setup the entire bedroom and make me wait 2-3 days for my mattress. Whoever heard of such a thing? If we didn’t call the day before, they would’ve done it.
2nd...the delivery was not on time and the decided to send ya a loaner mattess but instructed us to not remove the plastic and expect us to sleep on crunching plastic for 2-3 days. NOT ACCEPTABLE! 3rd....They delivered my furniture late and it was not installed and setup properly.

Their solution was a HUGE insult!!! $99 credit!!

When we called to discuss with manager, he kept passing comments and words through a sales rep and not wanting to come to phone to talk with an upset customer.

Additionally, we were told we should receive a call in a couple days from a manager that never occurred. After 3 days, we contacted corporate with same results. They told us that they will forward to a district manager and they will call us in a couple days.

This place is HORRIBLE!!! I will NEVER recommend or shop at the Oxford Alabama Branch ever again. I would pay more at another store/furniture place before going back to this store!!! If I could give negative stars, I would!!!

resp.text: Hi, Michael. We're so sorry to hear you were dissatisfied with your experience. Please know your information was shared with the District Manager as promised. We apologize for the delay in reaching out. Thank you for sharing your feedback and showing us where we have an opportunity to improve.

name: Karen Simmons
text:
UPDATE: October 1st she issued me a full refund! Thanks

Please Be Aware Of This Business😡😡 SHARE

I purchased a brand new $800 lift chair recliner from this place. I bought it on a Saturday evening and contacted them on Monday to let them know something was wrong with the chair. They would not let me return it. It was under warranty so I had them send some one out to look at it. The guy came week 2. Agreed the whole time that something was wrong with my chair but he wasn’t sure how to fix it. He sent the report to Sabrina’s Furniture Store week 3 and she said nothing was wrong with it. I hung up and called the manufacturer in Mississippi they said the brake for the footrest was not working. Therefore my footrest slowly goes down while sitting in it. They sent me a new motor for it. I contacted Sabrina back and she was gonna send someone out to put it on. So I’ve waited all week and nobody has showed up or called. I contacted Sabrina to find out why nobody has showed up to fix it and she said the system is kicking out the maintenance order. I told her I was tired of waiting because my feet were staying swollen from not staying elevated. I also told her I would bring the chair back tomorrow and swap it out for a new one. She said they were all out of stock. So I said I would bring it back and get my money back. She agreed to it but then wanted to charge me a $200 restocking fee. Mind you this is a brand new $800 chair that has been tore up since I purchased it.

When we came into the store to ask them not to call 20 times per day, we were laughed at and argued with. name: Celeste Champion
text: We choose Mattress Firm because they will Give You Your Money Back if you are unhappy with your purchase. In a land of "store credit" places, they stand out. Professional, polite and efficient staff make buying from them a pleasure.

name: Miranda Edwards
text:
I originally went in to purchase a new mattress to replace my current one with. Andrew was very knowledgeable and asked questions that helped him determine which ones best suited me. He was great and not the type of guy to push you into the most expensive one on the showroom floor. After looking at several different options, he discussed the current specials they had going on. Long story short, we got to talking about us needing another mattress set and that we would be back later because we were so please. I ended up leaving the store with two mattress sets with adjustable bases for a price no other store could even touch. If you need a new set, he is the man to make a deal with.

The only negative thing I can say is that, I was a little put off by the delivery guys. The adjustable bases we tried in the store were a decent height off the ground. When they set ours up during delivery, they were extremely low to the ground. I questioned them about this and asked does the whole bed let up, because I remember them being higher off the ground. The height was so low to the ground it left a 6 inch gap between the top of the mattress and the bottom of the headboard. Their answer was no they do not make them like that and to just go buy some taller legs at a hardware store or some bed risers from walmart. After they left, low and be hold, I look in the boxes they left and what do I fine? The extensions to the legs they could have been put on when I asked about this issue. So then, I had to go next door and ask my neighbor to help me lift the frame up to attach the extenders. Glad I went ahead and did this, because I noticed they also did not put on the seventh leg at the top. The instruction book stated that this should be put on for king size beds. So now I have one bed with the extenders on correct and one that I still have to get fixed. These frames are too heavy for just one person to do by themselves. Also, I hate that they just left trash under our beds that I had to dig out. Whenever the zip ties and twist ties landed, is where they left them. They did at least take with them the plastic and boxes that the frames and mattress came in.

Overall, I am pleased with our purchase just a little disappointed with the delivery service. Had the delivery gone better, I would have given 5/5 stars. I would definitely buy from them again and recommend them to everyone else. (Hopefully the quality of product lasts a long time though and I don't have too!)

I just wanted to say how happy my wife and I are with the sales rep Andy Dutickewicz at the Gulf Shores location. Andy spent allot of time with my wife and I picking out a mattress. He was very knowledgeable, respectable and trustworthy. Andy made sure we were very comfortable and answered all of our questions. He is isn't just a sales guy, he is a educator on mattresses and you can tell. We picked out or new mattress and can't wait for our delivery this Tuesday. We will both be sleeping like rock stars . We both want to thank Andy for his help and for really making us feel at home shopping for our new mattress.

Thank you Andy
Thank you Matress Firm

name: Tea F
text: Great store, Great selections, Great experience! We recently bought a King Beautyrest Legends at the Gulf Shores Mattress Firm. Our sales person, Artie Zumbro made the decision making and buying process painless and simple! There was never any pressure to buy anything! He simply told us about the products they have and helped us fit the right products to our needs. We left the store with a smile, a cooling pillow, a mattress protector, and promise of prompt delivery! That promise was kept even with an impending landfall of a tropical storm in our area. The delivery made it on time! We love our new mattress and pillows! Artie Zumbro gave us our Zzzzzz’s back!!! Sincerely No Longer Sleepless in South Alabama! PS We were referred to as Guests and we were treated as such! They made us feel welcomed and not uncomfortable to try out the beds in the store, which can feel a little awkward.

name: E. B. (byrdie)
text: Poor customer service is absolutely inexcusable  in a sales-driven industry.  We came into this store yesterday afternoon (door chime was functional). There were no salespeople in sight, although we could hear at least two people talking to each other in the back offices.  We had done  our research online and were ready to purchase complete living room, dining room, and mattress sets. We were in the store at least 20 minutes identifying the items we had chosen.  NOT ONE salesperson came out to greet or assist us so we left and went home to do more online research.  Corporate should definitely be made aware of this behavior. Today we went to Badcock and bought all the items on our list. Lauren and all staff members were friendly and professional. Cost more, but peace of mind is priceless.

We then bought my stepdaughter a bed that she loves, and now just waiting for my new bed and dresser that is supposed to be delivered sometime tomorrow. They always call and let you know when they are in the way with your delivery as well. Very friendly and easy to shoo with.

text: Predatory lenders...read the contracts very carefully.. predatory interest rates make it difficult to pay down balance. name: Cheryl Smith
text: My husband and I went by Furniture and Mattress warehouse at the suggestion of my parents. They had a good experience with the owner/manager Josh Johnson so we decided to check the store out. Our visit went great, we ordered a Stearns and Foster mattress, a couch, and a chair. $1500 including delivery. Josh told us he would be going out to Atlanta the following Thursday, February 2nd, to pick up our couch and chair and have it delivered Friday or Saturday. He'd call to set up the final details. The mattress, however, he could get to us by Monday the 30th. We set up a delivery time for 3:00. Josh stated he would call me the morning of the 30th as a reminder. Up to this point, everything was great. Until Monday the 30th rolls around, it's 3:00 and there's no reminder phone call or delivery person. I call Josh and he asks if the delivery could be changed to 5:00. OK. Fine. No problem. Five o'clock rolls around. Nothing. Six o'clock. Seven o'clock. Finally, after being stood up repeatedly, my husband (the second of the two men delivery...That we paid for) helped Josh load the California-king mattress into the house. My husband is a disabled veteran and large part off his disability is his back. It is now the 9th of February and we have not received a single phone call from Josh about our couch and chair. I've called him nine times. Once while standing in front of him yesterday. He informs me that their number has changed as of that morning. Mine hadn't. He never called me. Though it expressly states, via their own contract, that if there are any shipping or delivery set backs they will contact me immediately to let me know. So, on Monday, February 6th my husband goes to the store to inquire as to what is going on. Josh tells my husband that they're having some delivery issues but we'll definitely have our furniture by Friday. He'd be giving us a call to set up a time. However, by Wednesday afternoon still no call. So, I went to the store Wednesday afternoon and Mr. Johnson tells me that we 'should' have our furniture by Tuesday. When I asked him why he hadn't kept me informed he said he was busy keeping up with his other customers and if he neglected to call he was sorry. I asked him why he hadn't returned my calls when the number has only recently changed. Surely he got them. No. He says he never got a single one of the many phone calls I made. Then I ask him if he has my number. He says he wrote it down wrong. That's funny, because he knew it when he was talking to my husband, and it's clearly written in our contract/receipt. Oh. And he tells me they're getting out of the furniture business. Be WARY, folks. Be VERY wary. All I'm asking for is common courtesy. Keep me in the loop. I'm not unreasonable. At this point, however, if I do not receive my furniture by this Tuesday I will proceed to take civil action through litigation if I am not given a full refund of the cost of the delivery fees, couch, and chair that I have paid.

name: Allen Bishop
text: The worst of the worst... If you happen to be unlucky enough to work for bedzzz express in Rainbow City, they will: not properly train you on working in the warehouse. They will not take any time to explain anything. One person knows where each mattress and box springs are located and it is a guarded secret. So when you are there trying to help you have to wait to be told where things are. Then of course you are told that you are to slow by a manager who has been photographed asleep at his desk more then once. Customers who buy from this store sometimes want there old mattress and box springs hauled away for them. These mattresses are then taken to the dump. Except for the ones that the manager wants to take home. He will allow the hired help to take home one, if needed. But then he accuses you of "selling beds". Of course the generous, just above minimum wage pay makes it completely unnecessary to sell the trash collected from customers. Unless you are the manager, then its ok to sell the trash. You can also count on hearing every person that works there talk about every body else that works there behind there back, especially when it comes to talking about the manager. I don't believe I can even write some of the things that were said about this man on a daily basis. I don't believe I can write what was said about the customers behind there backs either. This was probably the most miserable place I have ever worked. Every person from the temps to management, hated having to come to work every day. For the most part I simply listened and didn't say to much. I knew if I did happen to speak about someone negatively, the other people working there would run to tell what was said. So I simply didn't join in on the behind the back talking. My honest opinion about this place is that only if you are truly desperate for a job should you work there. The entire environment there is toxic and filled with deep depression, anger, hypocritical management,  back stabbing and misery. Of course they may respond to this review and say I am simply an ex-employee who is trashing the place I worked at because I am mad about being let go so that another ex-employee who quit 4 or 5 times could come back. But no, I am not mad at all, just wanted to let people know how things really are there.

name: Timothy Townsend
text: I bought a floor model table that was on sale on a Thursday.  It was scheduled for delivery the following Saturday.  Apparently after I left, the store realized they had already sold that table.  I waited until 3pm on the day of delivery to ask where my table was.  That was when I was told that they had sold it.  They told me that they had tried to call me repeatedly.  I went to the store and showed them my phone, where I had no calls from them.  I was then told "they must have mis-dialed".  I wasted a whole day staying near my home for delivery.  It was disrespectful and shows this location is unorganized.  I will do business with the Cullman location if I ever purchase from them again.

name: Ashley Barto
text: They are so rude, tried to tell me my pay off was 1200 more than it was. They will not tell you they add 800 dollars worth of insurance to your bill either, they will do it without asking. I have had my furniture not even 3 years and it's completely broken and has holes all in it. I paid over 5 thousand dollars for bascically garbage. Don't do it. Run away from this Place, you will thank me later!

name: Brytnie Boggs
text:
If you’re looking to finance furniture or anything in that sorts go to another furniture store and do it. Some place else’s furniture will be made better and I bet their customers service is so much better also.

They have deleted my other review about things being fixed from previously. The manager at the time did fix the problem. But I made a stupid mistake by buying something else that was more exspensive thinking it would be better, now they don’t want to fix that again a few months back. On top of that I completely forgot to come in and make November’s payments (normally someone would call me between the 1st and 10th just to remind me)(I’m a mother of two and full time college student so I’m forgetful when I don’t get reminders) they called me last week while I was sitting in class so I asked them to call me back in a couple of hours to discuss why they had called. Didn’t think nothing of it. Well today I got a letter in the mail saying I was avoiding them and refusing their calls (which I have not I answer every phone calll that comes in because I never know if something might have happened to someone) then the “new manager” tried to say she delivered this letter to my house today. This letter has a stamp on it has been through the post office lines and was in my mailbox at the bottom of the box(I haven’t checked my mail in three days so it was full) but she proceeds to tell me that my account which as of today is 30days late it wasn’t 30days late when she sent this letter to me. That she would be sending it to the court house this week. And that she would not work with me because I’m 30days late as of today. That this was policy after 30 days. I worked at this store in 2017 for a while and they normally don’t send to collection until 120 days or later. She also tried to tell me they have been calling I have not received but that one call from them a little over a week ago when I asked them to call me back and they never did then my grandmother received a call from them last night and she told me today when she seen me. So hearing this plus receiving this letter today I did call them only to be told she wouldn’t work with me. I also know that when I worked there and I would help the collector there to make calls you can just click in the computer saying that you called when really you didn’t. I told her I wouldn’t be able to pay her right now Christmas is a few weeks away my sons birthday is also the week of Christmas and my car payment is due this week so I offered to pay November and December’s payment on December 28th the Friday right after the holidays she then told me I would have to pay court cost and do it that way because my account wouldn’t be there any longer.

I have been dealing with farmers for a couple of years now and I always pay my accounts off wayyy earlier than need to be.
This is also the first time I have ever been more than two days late on making a payment. I understand they want their money, but sometimes things don’t work out like that so they should really work with someone who has never been late like that. When I was employed there you still got worked with at 120 days out. It didn’t matter how late you were if they could work with you they would.

name: C11 L11
text:
There are not enough positive words I can say about this furniture store.   The furniture itself stands alone on its own merit, but it is the people here that make the experience truly enjoyable.  There is no "if" you should go here there is only "do".  They have the best furniture and the absolute best staff.  They are truly here to meet your needs and wants.  If you have ideas of design elements then share them and work with them.  If you have absolutely no idea as to what to do with either styles or furniture pieces then they will plan it for you.  Although fabrics abound in this store, it is the personal touch and customer service attitudes that flows through every staff member there that makes them the best.

A special thank you to:

Joel:   Servant leadership at the highest level.
Teresa:  Customer service to the absolute highest level.  You will be missed and we all wish you well in your move.
Suzanne:  You have made the moving experience enjoyable.   You are a treasure to work with as well as an upstanding graduate of the correct school.  :)   Thank you for holding our hands through this process.

The Touch of Wood is quite simply an outstanding customer service organization doing business as a furniture store.  Thank you for all you do.   Call them today to start your new outstanding home furnishing designs.

name: Secretary Secretary
text: One of the best places to buy furniture from! Quality and the prices are great! We loved Cheryl- you can tell she's an expert and knows her customer's style very well. If you are looking for a place to get the best of the best furniture- this is it.

name: Cynthia Elmore
text: Joel and his crew at Touch of Wood are the best. From the sale associate all the way to the owner were very helpful and custom built us exactly what we wanted.   Farm table and door were absolutely beautiful and completed our renovation to suite our style and needs....  Thanks Touch of Wood!

name: Ryne Walker
text: The Touch of Wood is a local furniture place in the city I live in. I, on numerous occasions, have went into the touch of wood with the intent to purchase furniture. I tried to buy a Norwalk sofa (~$3000) and a Kincaid dinning table (~$1400). I didn't buy either of these items from this store due to finding a better deal else where but both times I gave them the opportunity to give me a better price. I would love to buy local but I will not do so at the amount it would take. (A difference of $700 altogether) I once again went to The Touch of Wood to try an purchase a set of Kincaid dinning chairs (~$1400). I had gotten a price from a competitor and I wanted to see if they could match the price. They indeed matched the price. However, while my wife and I were discussing whether we wanted the Kincaid chairs or another brand that we saw at another local store, the owner came up and told us that we either needed to buy the chairs from him or not use his showroom to go buy them from someone else. I found this to be very rude and poor customer service. This is a tremendously poor way to treat customers. I'm not sure how you take this but I hope this will let you make an informed choice of where to purchase furniture in the future.

name: K.W. Keene
text: I have shopped in Dothan for 30+ years for furniture and have not found a better quality of merchandise or more qualified personnel anywhere in the area.  The pricing I have been given is always competitve for the quality of the product received.  Joel and his team have always been very friendly and interested in what my wife and I want and have always delivered in helping us with getting what we want and need for our home.  We will continue to shop with them as we see needs for furniture in our home.  Thank you Joel and team for everthing you have helped us with and we always recommend you to our friends.

Edited from original. I'm happy with my purchase from this business, my original post was a little harsh, I paid $ for an item I saw at Costco two days later for $10 more so when I saw this boxed item at Costco for $10 more I was slightly irritated. That being said Bargain Depot is a good place to shop and the owner seems very honest and trustworthy.

resp.text: Mr. Powell - I am sorry that you are unhappy with your purchase price.  Because retailers are always changing their prices, it is sometimes difficult for me to keep up with on each and every product.  This particular item used to be $99 at Costco but even that changes depending on which Costco you shop with or if it is online or not.  Again, I am sorry for your unhappiness and if you would like to get a refund, I will do that.

I tried without success to call and get a person to talk to and it was unsuccessful.  Because your automated system help does not give that option.  So after a day I decided it was best to talk to someone, so I called a Birmingham office and I  found Sonny.  Who resolved my problem.

text: Mattress Firm service was exceptional. The sales representative was knowledgeable and shared information that was an important factor in the purchase of the mattress.

name: M
text:
They sure wanted the money real fast from me when they told me that I must pay for the mattress within a few hours of being emailed the receipt or else my order was going to have to be rescheduled. It was already enough for them to put my delivery off for over a week to begin with. I cannot even verify if the delivery guys actually showed up to my house because they didn’t even take the effort to come up and knock on my door to deliver the mattress to me. Had they done that I would have had the mattress and Mattress Firm would have had the money.

Although the store associates Bruce and Sunny were polite and respectful over the phone, as was I, I think I should have been accommodated better in terms of having the mattress delivered to me promptly than to be informed that my mattress would not be able to be delivered for another week, which now would have put me over two (2) weeks waiting to have a mattress delivered. I just didn’t get the impression that the company cares enough to want to deliver the mattress to me so therefore I requested that my money be refunded. The way I look at it, the hell with it. I’d rather keep sleeping on a bowed out mattress rather than let this company have money it doesn’t deserve.

resp.text: I am very sorry that we were not able to meet your expectations.  Should you feel led to give us another opportunity in the future, I would like to personally work with you to assure your complete satisfaction.  Best Wishes to you during this difficult time.

name: Jeffrey Crosbie
text:
Searched every furniture store this weekend for a nice set of living room furniture (we had a very specific set of circumstances and requirements to meet our needs). We did a google search and arrived at Badcock early in the morning and did a loop of Huntsville's furniture stores. After making a decision, we chose to come back to Badcock Home Furniture & More due to a helpful and courteous staff, great prices, a military discount (it is highly appreciated!), and a delivery service that wasn't backed up for weeks.

We can't wait to get our couch and love seat and were happy to do business with this Huntsville branch!

resp.text: We're so happy to see you enjoyed your recent visit to our store. Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We hope to see you again soon Jeffrey!

name: Dasheka Miller
text:
I recently bought a livingroom set and dining room set with a buffet. The livingroom set is quality furniture. However,  some of the dinning room chairs are defective. I called several times and put a work order in but the problem is still not fixed. The dinning room table paint is coming off. I recently went into the store to complain about the same issues and was given a $50.00 gift card for the store. Also noticed the dinning room set was recalled so they no longer have that dinning set. It's truly a beautiful set but the quality is awful.

Has anyone else have issues with the grey dinning room set?

resp.text: We appreciate you taking the time to rate our store. We look forward to serving you again soon Dasheka!

text: Good place to shop plenty of inventory

resp.text: We're so happy to see you enjoyed your recent visit to our store, Les. Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We hope to see you again soon!

Customer service is incredibly important to us, and we encourage you to reach out to our Corporate Team to discuss your experience further. You can reach us at 1-800-223-2625.

name: Jennifer Davis
text: This could have been a very low rating. The reason it's not is because the staff at Badcock really took care of us. There was a mix-up with our new account, and it was holding up delivery of our furniture. Even though we missed delivery, they waived the fee and delivered our furniture anyway, because it was a mess up on their part, and they understood that. They demonstrated great customer service. I would definitely come back here to shop again!

resp.text: Thanks for being so understanding and allowing us to fix this for you, Jennifer! We're glad that you chose to shop with us and delighted to hear you will be back. Thank you for taking the time to share your experience.

text: The furniture is great.  The staff were not.  I was told three different times by three different people they would deliver my furniture on the Wednesday I wanted. When I arrived, I was told I could not pick it up.  I got my furniture but I did not have a good experience.  They kept saying "I'm sorry" but that was it.  I agree the staff are sorry.  I will not be returning.  I isn't worth the hassle.

text: Ken at Bedzzz Express in Tuscaloosa is amazing!   My husband and I purchased our new bed from him a couple of months ago. Because of the ease in working with him, I immediately went to check with him when my family had a sudden medical need for a another bed.  Ken again was amazingly helpful.  I was slightly stressed and I'm sure I showed it going in, but again Ken was very patient and helped me resolve our problem.  Our next bed purchase, which will hopefully be a while, will most definitely be bought through Ken at Bedzzz Express in Tuscaloosa!

name: Denise Plaia
text: I bought my mattress in March and BE was holding for me until I was ready to move into my new home.  I am moving Saturday May 9 and I have been unable to reach them until today.   Needless to say I  have been calling and leaving messages on VM with no return calls.  My daughter  finally reached them and my son-in-law dropped  by today.  They were caught in the fisaco of having to close their store due to Covid.  They did not receive their  stimulus, etc.  I didn't leave a very good review as I did not receive a courtesy call.  I  deleted my review as it wasn't fair.  After finding out what happened I can understand why no return calls.  The people were very courteous to my daughter and my SIL.  I appreciate the quick action taken to have my mattress delivered tomorrow. 🙂

resp.text: We are so sorry about the confusion! We are thankful that it was all worked out! We wish you the best in your new home!

My new bed is getting delivered within a week of my purchase and I am looking forward to enjoying it for many years.  I would recommend shopping at this location.

text: My husband and I were shopping for a new mattress set. Was greeted pleasantly by Cindy, she was very helpful and knowledgeable about each mattress we looked at. Later that evening we received a call from Cindy and informed the set we wanted wasn't available, we went back to the store and looked again, we chose another set. Cindy took care of us. I would highly recommend you visit our Tuscaloosa store. Delivered as promised.  Linda and Ed Clifton

When the delivery guy arrived it was just him and so I had to help him carry the stuff up the stairs. Not a huge deal cus the mattresses are pretty light. I just don’t appreciate being misled like that.

name: Wallis Higdon
text:
Intelligent sells.....strange concept that most retailers are just now realizing but one  BedzzzExpress has perfected.  I walked in a store expecting something akin to a car lot environ. Instead, I meet a polite salesperson who inquired as to my interests then allowed my wife and I to browse freely.  When the time came to ask questions that same salesperson was low key, knowledgeable and seemed to cater to our needs not just a sale.  Even his suggestions saved me money, time and frustration.  All in all a pleasant experience.
The people that came to deliver and setup were extremely polite and technically knowledgeable about the product they were assembling.  There were no delivery delays and I was kept informed of the their  proximity to my house right up to when they pulled into my driveway.
You may find a cheaper price on a Therma-Pedic mattress at other stores but you won’t have the information or selection offered by BedzzExpress. This could lead being dissatisfied later something I have so far avoided. A good mattress is a valuable investment not only financially but also to your health and well-being.

resp.text: Thank you Wallis for your AWESOME review! We work very hard to make sure all of our guests feel the same way you do, it is not always the case but we try! The most important part, to us, is making our guests feel comfortable in the store, no pressure to purchase anything but just to let us educate and help you find the best mattress FOR YOU. Thank you again Wallis, this is great!

text: My son and his wife have been kicked down in Brooklyn, NY where the virus has been and continues to be extremely contagious and deadly. They finally left the City to head South. They will quarantine in a small home on a river outside of BIRMINGHAM. I secured a mattress with another company at a ridiculously high price but it was available and delivery was essential. The company was not able to fulfill the payment and delivery without my presence with the credit card at the home an hour away from where I live. With just a few days before My family members’ arrival, I reached out Mattress Firm and was assured that they could find a mattress in stock and process my payment from a distance. Today, my brother will pick up the mattress from the distribution center. I saved half the cost of the Bedzxxx Express mattress and feel confident that the mattress will be comfortable and sanitary for my family.

resp.text: Thank you so much Sally.  I hope they are enjoying their stay in Alabama and staying healthy.  It was a pleasure working with you.

name: Harold Watters
text:
Finally heard from the manufacture with a notice that they would replace the mattress.  No personal contact.  Received an email with instruction that I must go to the local business and handle the replacement through the local representative. I went to the local store and met with a very nice gentleman named David Paffumi.  Mr. Paffumi handled the exchange and scheduled a pick-up of the damaged mattress and set a delivery date for the exchange.  The manufacturer (company headquarters/people in charge) still need to place more importance on Customer Service.  I really appreciated the concern that Mr. Paffumi demonstrated in helping us get this matter resolved.  The management of Mattress Firm would do well to take some lessons on Customer Service from Mr. Paffumi.  My original rated of one (1) star has been changed to three (3) stars.  I hope the exchange goes well.

WOULD RATE ZERO (0) IF POSSIBLE!

Extremely poor Customer Service after the sale.  We will never purchase another mattress from this company.  They are all about making the sale, but after that you will not receive any support if you have issues.

We purchased a brand new Sleepy's Hybrid Firm mattress including adjustable electric frame and more.  A little more than $2,000.00 worth of products.

The mattress started bleeding through the cover with some sort of dye.  We contacted the local sales office and they immediately told us they could not help us with a warranty item and directed us to the manufacture.  We have been unable to speak with a real person as of this writing.  We have owned the mattress for only 8 months.  We have submitted all required information including photos to the company's website and have heard nothing as of this date.

resp.text: Hello Mr Watters.  I am very sorry to hear that you are having a difficult time with your purchase.  I would love to help out in any way that I can.  Would you please ask your salesperson to have the District Manager contact you?

He was patient as Mom checked out beds in our stated budget range. When she found one she liked, Ricky went above and beyond to get her new mattress to her a few days later. She is really enjoying her new bed!

Ricky and his commitment to providing exceptional customer service is just amazing, and Mattress Firm is fortunate to have Ricky representing their store. We got a great deal on a recognized national brand mattress and a person who went beyond what was expected in his role as a Mattress Firm employee. Thank you, Ricky, for helping my mom the way you did. It means more to me than I can say!

name: S Wyatt
text: Excellent sales and service during purchase. Spoken down to and rudely by manager after what she thought was the final sale. Appalled and shamed, I felt like an old fool after my 3rd attempt to talk to Brittany who went from so agreeably accommodating to abrupt, in to much of a hurry to be bothered with me unless "I could keep my question VERY BRIEF as she was busy with the Labor day sale".  Phoned a few weeks later to add a queen mattress but was met with the same behavior before I was able to ask about adding a queen. Very ill I rarely leave home, I began to cry and said  I'd call another time about  adding to my purchases when she wasn't so busy. Told her my feelings were hurt and I felt chastised like a child. She did try to call me back 2 x's once I mentioned spending more $.  Having been treated so unkindly, decided to blocked the number. In all fairness, she was exemplary during the 1st purchase and I wrote a 5 star rating for my experience. She seemed upset at how lengthy and detailed it was but I only tried to cover all the horrible things she said she'd suffered from another customer who frightened and wrote badly about her. She was so upset about it that my adult mentally disabled daughter worried, prayed and asked me to check on her safety several times after our visit/purchase. I'm sorry if I embarrassed her. She was very direct about my lengthy rating stating she didn't have time to read it when I asked if I covered everything she asked me to. Confused and ashamed I will not go back to that store. To EVERYONE reading this: you never know when you'll be old, sick, unable to look and feel good due to illness. Try to remember that one day you'll be on the other side of the desk.

text: Very knowledgeable, friendly, no sales pressure. Glad I came here. Drove from Anniston.

name: Angela Walker
text: Worst experience ever. Brittany was extremely rude and unprofessional.  She had the door locked during normal business hours, open sign was on and all the lights were on in the store. After myself and three other customers kept knocking on the doors and windows and she would not come to the door, we became concerned for her safety. We all called the store repeatedly and no one would answer. We finally called another store to see if they could get in touch with her and she would not answer for them either. That store manager finally called their district manager who called the store and she finally answered. About 10 minutes later she finally came out of the back room appearing like she had just woken up. She immediately opened the door with an attitude and stated "someone is trying to get me in trouble calling my district manager, I was here by myself and in the back room". We attempted to tell her given the area and the fact that all the lights were on, open sign was on and that we noticed a car parked there that we were concerned for her safety. She continued with the attitude. I told her that there were 3 other customers there who had left and she replied "well that's their problem, they can go somewhere else". We told her 5 times what we were looking for and she repeatedly asked what we needed. We finally left, only to be chased out the door by her stating "ya'll see I was here....my car is parked right there. There was no reason to call my boss and tell him I wasn't here".  I again told her that we were just concerned for her safety and she continued to run her mouth at us outside the store. Well, to me if you were there then you should have had the door unlocked and certainly shouldn't have had the attitude you did with me about the other customers leaving. I personally would appreciate someone being concerned about my safety if I did not come to the door after repeated calls and knocks on the doors and windows when we clearly read that the store was supposed to be open. I  did get a call back from the District Manager, Bruce, who was very nice, and thanked us for being concerned about her safety even when she was not appreciative of that to us. I took my money elsewhere. I see other people have good reviews about the store, and maybe this was just a fluke, but it was a very odd situation to say the least.  I was also told by the District Manager that she has caller ID in the store, and that is likely why she answered his call and not anyone else's. I am only giving one star for the fact that the District Manager called me back and was very professional, apologetic and appreciative of my concerns.

name: Skyler Martinez
text: My 86 year old mother bought a mattress and paid 1400.00 she used her stimulus debit card to pay for it. Mattress Firm failed to deliver the mattress after 2 months. My mother asked John Powell to cancel the order and refund her money. John Powell said he could only put money back on her debit card. But the debit card is non reloadable and she no longer has the card. John Powell is refusing to return her money. He is saying that Mattress Firm can not issue her a refund check for the mattress they failed to deliver. I tried to contact the corporate office but no one is available to speak with you unless you want to buy a mattress. They say they have no way to pull up the invoice nor can they offer any help. One girl said she would have someone call us back and that was over a week ago. DO NOT go to this store!!!! John Powell is a thief along with the company he works for!!! I would give this business 0 stars if it were an option.

Oddly he didn’t want to protect himself or me as a customer as mine was on the entire time. I wanted to purchase some of the additional items he suggested but I didn’t feel safe in that store environment as other customers came in with no mask and they were not asked to put one on.

name: David Pace
text:
Cody was an outstanding help.  I honestly did not have the time to travel to Dothan to do business in the store as we live 60 miles away.  Cody talked me through the options, and I ended up spending a bit more than I had initially budgeted.  However, it was completely worth it.  Cody immediately showed me how to save over $500 dollars within minutes of our initial discussion.  It was my decision to upgrade to a higher quality mattress, and I am glad I did it, and we got free next-day delivery.

I have not slept well in over a decade. Since the first night this king-sized bed has been in our house, I have the best nights' sleep I can remember.  The product has been great so far.  I would recommend it to others, but it is Cody Mays who deserves the most credit.  I was tentative about buying a bed sight unseen, but his no-nonsense, professional but personal, telephone presence gave me the confidence to trust him.  I am glad that I did.  This is a young man represented himself and his company very well.

text: I purchased two twin mattress beds and mattresses at the tune of $5500 in 2013.  My grandson lost one of my remotes and when my husband went to the store to ask about a replacement, he was given a number to call--I called this number and it was the manufacture--they told me that the store had to contact their sales rep and he would give them a number to call so THEY could order me a new remote.  Why didn't they know this?  I will be contacting the store again today to give them this information--I hope their follow up customer service is better than their initial service. text:
I bought a twin size mattress for $175 on Saturday.  The service wasn't to bad and they try to work with me on the pricing.  Well the next day I was infected with ring worm.  Yes it was wrapped in plastic, but i don't own pets nor do i have a unclean environment.  Came in today Monday (2/22) telling them i would like to return the mattress.  Well they failed to address before I even got the mattress about their return policy.  You have to wait 30 days before returning it and they charge you a 150 fee for pick up and cleaning. They can't take it back unless they pick it up!!  Even thought mine was a twin size.

In the end God was good, because we ended up donating it and let the Rescue mission know to give it a good clean :)  Praise God he can make a bad situation good.

He then got an attitude when I told him the budget we were looking for and said “I don’t care what you but I get paid regardless” very contradictory. Went through the credit check process, did not get approved for what I thought we would so I declined shopping there... he still opened up and applied for me a line of credit through mattress firm for his commission.

Went to the store to dispute it and all they could tell me that their credit check is a credit application... we sign on a house Friday and may not get our house now when the bank does a soft check. Not saying don’t shop there, saying don’t use Brandon.

name: Radar ATC
text: Purchased two (2) Serta Kozma Twin XL Mattresses from MattressFirm in Dothan, AL.  During the sale the salesman said many time if we find a better price else ware, let them know and they will refund the difference.  I went home, went on the MattressFirm web site and realized I paid over $70 more than the web purchase.  The salesman said he would refund the difference (which they did 3 weeks later).  I then went to a local competitor and found the same mattresses for over $300 cheaper.  I went back to the salesman and he told me they were not the same mattresses.  He said the memory gel was "better" on his model.  A little background here, Serta make mattresses and different retailers put different names on the SAME mattress.  This is the case here.  MattressFirm named the Serta Mattress "Kozma" where other places named it "Kellerman".  It is the SAME Mattress.  I even called Serta Corporate and they confirmed.  I commented to the salesman that it would be more advantages for me to give MattressFirm the $79 to come and get their mattresses and then purchase them at the other retailer.  The sales guy called me "an extortionist" and I politely said it was about getting the best price on the SAME mattress.  Once I mentioned (in email traffic) that I would be contacting Serta Corporate to see if the were the SAME Mattress, the salesman said they would refund me $300 more on the sale (which they did 3 weeks later).  Here is what MattressFirm WON'T tell you.  They will only match ADVERTISED  prices of their competitors.  They will not honor quotes.  The ONLY advantage to purchasing a mattress from MattressFirm is that you can give them $79 to come and get the mattress if you absolutely hate it.  Here is my advice.  DO YOUR HOME WORK.  Compare the specs of the mattress you want and then shop around.  On a good note (hence the 2 Stars), we LOVE the mattress.  Very comfortable and this is a customer that was sleeping on a Tempurpedic.  4 Stars for the Mattress.  1 Star for my sales experience averages to 2 Stars.  Good Luck in your search for a comfortable night sleep.

text: We had the BEST experience at Lagniappe Furniture Store in Daphne!  Sue was a pleasure to work with. She was not pushy. She let us look and when we had questions she was there to help. name: Phil Culpepper
text: We came in for a big sale and had a pleasant buying experience. We purchased a nice sofa and was told to expect it in 10-12 weeks. So now it’s over 3 months and we are being told to expect another 3 months at least! The manager was rude and unapologetic. She became hostile when we asked who would want to wait 6 months for a sofa and still no guarantees. She offered no options like selecting something in stock.  Then she started blaming our sales person who was very nice. She also came up with a story about foam shortages. We will NEVER shop here again!
