text: Always great customer service. Wonderful home products.

name: Grayson Jones
text: Mrs. Ophie is the best she’s so amazing and helpful ❤️

name: Doris Barksdale
text: Mrs. Opie is an absolute gem and was so easy to work with! She was so welcoming and offered great help. What a great treasure you have through her!

name: Bryan Cook
text: Also waiting on multiple items that we have paid for over a month ago. Just don’t recommend buying anything from them that you have to order. One representative said the shipment was on the way when we purchased them and now after a month they still have not been received.

name: sara parker
text: If I could give 20 stars I would. I Know there are so many issues with production and shipping that i was willing to wait since every furniture store in mobile, Baldwin and the USA are dealing with the same thing. A coworker decided to get a large amount of furniture from Lagniappe back in May and i simply fell in love with it. So my friend brought me in to the store for a girls day. Number one, we were greeted asap! I am huge on customer service so from the start I was pleased. Number 2, the sales lady allowed us time to view the store ourselves and didn't hover over us. I appreciated that. Third, eventually our sales person got a little tied up and that was perfectly fine so this tiny little southern bell manager came over and quickly helped. Honestly, she was so kind, helpful, informative and extremely knowledgeable about shipping and production times. She told us up front, that special orders are running up to 20 weeks right now. Like i said, i was already aware of this and if i didnt want to wait, there was no reason to design furniture but i know what is going on right now in the usa. Plus, we already have furniture that we are using until ours comes in. The furniture selection was outstanding! best quality and best price for the money. We had went to hanks 3 weeks ago and they had zero furniture in stock and told me it would be 30 weeks for incoming freight with them. I was pleased to hear "up to 20" with Lagnaippe. This is on "special order" merch. They have plenty of other sofas, loveseats etc in stock. They just do not stock specials order things which, i dont think anyone does actually. I ended up ordering my things and i was happy to hear that i only had to put 50% down and i could pay the rest off when it comes in. That was a huge help since my husband and i just had our wedding a few weekends ago and i am strapped for cash now. The customer service, quality, the staff, even the check out counter was just the nicest people. I am not from the south so it was just the sweetest talking to these true southern bells. our sales person was great and the manager Mrs Ophelia was precious. Let me say this, if you are looking for in stock furniture "LAGNIAPPE HOME STORE": IS THE PLACE! If you want to design your furniture, please be considerate and understand that it will be a minute before it comes in. My husband just left a factory 3 months ago because the stress was too much. These factories are the ones delaying your furniture, not lagnaippe home store or any other store. thank you lagniappe home store for being so kind to me. I hope this review helps your customers understand what's going on. I have seen customers scream at retail workers over delays due to covid and its absolutely disgusting to me how anyone acts that way over furniture! Things are not back to normal at these factories. there are bigger things going on in the world and more things important.  I will forever be a customer now

name: Jack David
text: Still waiting for a sectional that we paid for in October, and was suppose to be delivered last month...when we ask they will not give us a delivery date. We did get the bedroom set we ordered...but one of the drawers was damaged, when the replacement finally showed up it was a totally different color, we reported it, weeks later when we asked about it all of a sudden they needed more info. Will never shop here again.

name: Gail Colburn
text: A whole lot of beautiful things!

name: Denise
text: I could not be happier w/ my experience @ Lagniappe Home Store Daphne. Brenda is such a sweet, patient sales lady. She helped me through all my indecision’s & my new beautiful living room sofas are gorgeous & fit my space perfectly. The delivery was prompt & the delivery men went above & beyond to tote my sofas up my steep driveway. They were gracious & had a smile the whole time.

name: Haley McGraw
text: Ordered a chair that was supposed to arrive in 6 weeks. It took 11 weeks. Never once complained because I understand things happen. When the chair finally arrived my Dad asked if he could be there right at 5:00 to pick it up. He was told oh no ! We lock the doors at exactly 5:00 working 9-5 is long day. They did stay to let him pick up the chair he paid for 11 weeks ago and was told no one would help him load it because you know we absolutely have to lock up at 5:00, god forbid we stay open an hour extra minute for a customer. We got it home and it was missing bolts. Wow ! They kindly left the bolts outside for him to pick up.We wouldn’t dare want to put out the all mighty manger at this story again. My Dad lost everything in a house fire and this chair was a huge deal to regain some sort of normalcy and rebuilding a home. We will never shop here again. I think that the manger here might need to take a class on customer service and have some integrity. Possibly a little compassion towards people. Terrible experience......

name: Kelley Douglas
text: Really nice selection of furniture.

name: Zach Rutledge
text: This used to be the J&J store until those owners retired.  It’s as good or better a place to shop than back then, thankfully.  They have a good selection of living room and bedroom furniture, mattresses and recliners.  Customer service is helpful and friendly, too.  The prices are fairly competitive, too, which is good.

resp.text: Hi Zach, we're so happy to hear that you were pleased with our product lineup.  We love customer feedback and always value what you have to say.  Please come back to see us again for your home furnishing needs.

text: My husband and I are fairly new to the area and Lagniappe's was recommended to us by a friend. We purchased a new dresser there last year and the service and assistance was attentive and friendly. text: Great customer service! She spent an HOUR AND A HALF dealing with my boyfriend and I being so indecisive. She answered all my questions, helped with measurements, decorating advice, and explained how the financing works. She explained how everything was made and let us know how important it was for the owner of Lagniappe to sell high quality furniture at a lower price and it shows! Over all AWESOME experience!!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Destinee! Ophelia is amazing and takes such great care of our customers.  We're so happy you had an excellent experience with us and hope to see you guys again soon!

name: Mark Kaelin
text: The staff was friendly and the prices were fair. However, unless you have 3 months to wait for your furniture don't bother. I ordered a bedroom suit over a month before I closed on my house and was assured there would be no problem with delivery near my closing date. After sleeping on the floor for two months my bed finally showed up yesterday. It's a shame because I was furnishing a whole house and I would've liked to support the local business. However, they made no attempt to make it right and just blamed the manufacturer (they could've at least brought my mattress). I took my business and several thousand dollars across town and I suggest you do the same.

name: Karen Sheffield
text: I have been more pleased than I was today when the recliners came.   Ken and Steve kept me posted as to their arrival and that means a lot when you are sitting and waiting.  Ken and Steve went out of their way to make the experience very pleasant.  The recliners are beautiful.  I will recommend your store to all my friends.  Thank you!!!!!

resp.text: Thank you, Karen, we are pleased to know you are happy with our recliner selections.  We hope you enjoy!

name: John Thomas
text: Friendly staff, large selection of furniture and accessories. In the words of Arnold... I'll be back.

name: cindy jackson
text: my husband and i had a wonderful experience here! I had been seeing all the info on Tv and seen a few pieces that i wanted to see in person. Mitty was very kind, just a sweet southern gal. From the time we walked in, we were greeted by anyone who seen us, that was nice. No one was pushy, they let us have our space to shop. the first thing i noticed was the prices. their prices are the best i have seen in Baldwin county. I am a budget shopper so i was happy.  Opie the manager came around and greeted us to welcome us to the store. she was such a cutie pie. We purchased a few weeks ago but i had been forgetting to give this review. I hope the owner sees this and keeps the good work up. I plan to visit the mobile store in about a month and hope to have the same exact experience. just wanted to let you guys know that i had a very nice time. see ya soon

resp.text: Thank you, Cindy, for taking time to leave such wonderful feedback!  We appreciate your review and can't wait to have you back again.

name: Catherine Goss
text: If I could give ten stars I would!!! The staff went above and beyond to help my family and I find exactly what we were looking for. Everything in the store is absolutely stunning. We will definitely be doing business with Lagniappe Home store in the future! I would recommend this store to anyone who wants affordable, great quality furniture.

resp.text: That's amazing to hear, Catherine! We are so happy that you are satisfied.  Please come back to see us soon.

name: Leigh Ann Walker
text: I couldn’t be happier with my furniture! Anytime I have a party or entertain in my home, I always receive compliments on my dining room & living room furniture. I have referred many of my neighbors to Lagniappe Home Store.  I spent a couple of hours in the store looking at fabrics and second guessing myself, and the sales rep was so patient with me & helpful as I made my final selections. I was constantly kept in the loop on delivery as I made a special order on all of my items. I will definitely go back to them as I finish furnishing and decorating my home.  I love all the unique looks they have with such a huge variety!

resp.text: Thank you for the stellar review! We're so pleased to know you're happy with your furniture selections.

name: Jennifer McRee
text: We just did a full family room renovation and Sue Cummings at this location helped us coordinate the most wonderful furniture grouping! She went beyond the 9 to 5 time clock to answer questions and send pictures from her personal cell!!! We couldn't be more pleased...

resp.text: Hi Jennifer, thank you so much for the awesome review!  We couldn’t agree more. Sue is amazing!! We’re very glad you’re happy with your selections and hope you shop with us again!

name: Cathy Caswell
text: Great inventory.  Brenda was extremely helpful

resp.text: Thank you, Cathy, for the review! Brenda is awesome.  We hope to see you again soon.

name: Steven Davidson
text: Very expensive

name: Steve Ruffin
text: We haven't bought anything here yet but the folks were super helpful! Nice medium to higher end furniture.

resp.text: Hi Steve, thank you for taking the time to leave us a review.  We're glad to hear you liked our selections and custom service.  We'd love to have you back in the store!

name: Rick Allen
text: Nice selection and reasonable prices.  However, when the piece of furniture was unboxed at home, it was the wrong piece.  We called the store to report, and it was explained to us that we must be mistaken.  We offered to bring the piece to the store to reconcile.  After determining that the floor model was mislabeled, was offered the floor model ( which had minor wear) for the original price. (The marked/original price was slightly lower than the "correct" pruce).  We stated that we desired a piece without wear.  The manager then overrode the salesman and added $30 to the price.  I did not want to negotiate so we got our money back.  Manager never apologized for their error, and treated us as though we made an error.  Salesman tried to take care or us and was apologetic throughout.

resp.text: Hi Mr. Allen, we would like to sincerely apologize for the negative experience you had in our store. We do appreciate your feedback as it will help us to do better going forward. We'd love to have the opportunity to make things right.  Please give us a call at 251-626-1210 at your earliest convenience.  Thank you!

name: Bridget Wasdin
text: Beautiful showroom, knowledgeable staff and excellent customer service. Absolutely love my custom ordered sectional sofa and master bedroom furniture.

resp.text: Thank you, Bridget, for the fantastic review!  We're so happy you are please with everything.

name: Chuck Turner
text: Great staff great selection

resp.text: Thank you, Chuck! We hope to see you again soon.

name: Leona Payne
text: Got new couch and sofa love seat for 900, and awesome bed sells. Thanks Aimee crowley for the referral.

resp.text: Thank you, Leona, for taking the time to leave us a review.  We hope to have you back one day, and are so thrilled to know you were referred to us.

name: Lynn Thompson
text: First visit.  Staff extremely helpful without bring on top of you.  Furniture above quality.

resp.text: Thank you, Lynn, for the great feedback! We hope to see you again soon.

name: Rodney Brennan
text: Worst customer service I have ever seen. I wish I would have read reviews prior to my purchase because I would have never stepped foot in their store. They lie continuously about where, when or even if the order has shipped or will be received. Each time we call (they will never call the customer) we are told a different lie. They even say they will call back with an update but of course no call back. Unbelievable since there are many furniture stores in the area. We were told 5 weeks from purchase that we would have our new bedroom furniture - 10 weeks later and still no idea. DO NOT SHOP AT THIS STORE UNLESS YOU LIKE DEALING WITH MISERY!

name: Stephanie Clark
text: I am very impressed and happy w lagniappe for days we shopped for furniture Finally lagniappe was the last place we went my sister is so happy w her furniture and the staff was all excellent Soo friendly and helpful and not pushy I remember the one young lady was so sweet and she was funny too she had a name you don't hear often that's why she sticks out it started with an o !!!and my sister didn't have to wait a week on her furniture either!!they came to deliver and were professional and nice and efficient!!ty Lagniappe!!

resp.text: That's very, very kind of you, Stephanie! We are thrilled that you had a great experience.

name: peggy shack
text: first and foremost, the store is beautiful and bright and very welcoming. I walk in and see Sue and she was so sweet,kind and not pushy at all. She also gave me my space to look around by myself. I was also greeted by Mike who was also very kind. Sue also had great style which is nice to have while needing decorating advice from such a lovely person. I knew i was in good hands. Sue also listened to me the entire time and directed me to exactly what i was looking for. The whole store was extremely positive in many ways. Mitty who is also a great sales person helped me pick out fabric for my special orders. Lagniappe home store probably has hundreds of fabrics to choose from may i add.. Sue also did a house call for me too! Lagniappe home store has free decorating services which is awesome! When i got to the customer service counter, the store manager Ophelia and the office manager Megan were two of the sweetest girls I have worked with. They made everything easy for me. I purchased a lot of furniture, some in stock items, some special order items, home decor etc..There is nothing i am not happy with. I even got the extended warranty which is something i am glad Sue and lagniappe home store offered to me. I received several courtesy calls as i was waiting on my furniture and they let me know everything.  I will continue to always buy from Lagniappe home store. I am very grateful for the excellent customer service i have been given the entire time from start to finish. To the owners 'Kevin & Tonya Booker, Sue, Megan, Ophelia, the delivery guys, all the sales people and all, thank you kindly for treating me so well. I will spread the word about how well the customer service, the prices, and the good quality furniture Lagniappe has. I also want to add, that next wed which is Sue's off day actually, she will be coming back to my home for another house call. That means she is coming to  my home on her off day. What employee that you know of does that? That means Lagniappe home store's employees care that much about their customers to make them happy. You know, it really does take everyone to make a company work and thrive together. I can see, that is exactly what goes on at Lagniappe. The whole store welcomes everyone as soon as they walk through the door. So you get amazing customer service, the top prices in Mobile and Baldwin county and furniture that will last for years. I am thrilled to leave this review, if i could leave 100 stars i would in a second. I do want to recognize miss Leighann also. Anytime i called, she went out of her way to be kind, sweet and helpful. Thank you leighann for your outstanding customer service.. I feel like everyone is family. They truly are not just your average furniture store, i have made friendships in the mist of shopping there. I wish this company years and years of success, many blessings and a stellar reputation.

resp.text: Thank you, Peggy! We are so happy you took the time to leave us such a wonderful and thorough review.  We take great pride in our employees and store and are delighted that we met your needs. We love having you as a loyal customer and can't wait to help you again.

name: Karissa Slinkard
text: We had a fabulous experience at Lagniappe Home Store!! We needed a bedroom set. We went in twice to look and even were able to take in a piece of flooring to make sure it would look nice. The staff was accommodating and knowledgable! I liked so many pieces. The people were all patient and kind! I love my new bedroom furniture! The delivery crew moved our old stuff out of the way to bring in the new and had it all put together quickly! I will definately reccommend Lagniappe to friends!

resp.text: Thank you, Karissa! We are happy to hear you had a great experience from start to finish.

name: Martha Rodgers
text: I love this store and the staff are super nice.  Mittie McCarty was my design/sales associate.

resp.text: Thank you, Martha, for the glowing review! Mittie is a wonderful designer and we're glad you enjoyed your experience with us.

name: Danielle Phillips
text: Love this furniture store!  Def have won my business for life.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Danielle! We look forward to helping you again.

name: Michael McCarthy
text: Very nice selection of furniture, Brenda was very helpful.

resp.text: Hi Michael! Thank you so much for the 5 star review.  We're so happy Brenda was a great help to you!

name: Corey Shenk
text: Great furniture, great prices and an awesome staff!

resp.text: Thank you, Corey, for the amazing review!

name: Karen Stewart
text:
If I could give zero stars I would.  I went in on August 18, 2018.  I told salesperson I needed furniture ASAP as I was currently without.  The furniture I chose had to be ordered.  I was told it would be a 4-6 week delivery time.  Six weeks being the absolute worst case...most people get it between 4 and 5 weeks I was told.  So at 5 weeks I call to check.  I was told due to Hurricane in NC it was delayed but would still be delivered within the 6th week.  6th week I was told it would ship on Oct 1.  On Oct 1 I call to verify that it did in fact ship.  I was told and I quote, yes, it is on the truck and will arrive at our store by Tuesday the 9th or Wednesday the 10th.  I was a bit shocked it would take 10 days to drive from NC to Al but whatever...
On Tuesday the 9th I call for an update.  Again, I am told it shipped on the 1st but they didn’t have an update of where the delivery truck was!  At this point, I have lost all confidence that they know anything about customer service.  My husband goes into the store on Wednesday the 10th and asked for manager.  He was directed to the lady who handles delivery, the same lady who verified not once,  but twice that my furniture had shipped on the 1st.  She asks who told me my furniture had shipped!  She begins to say my furniture had not been constructed yet because of the storm...not the one in NC last month, but the one that hit  Florida today!  So my furniture that I ordered almost 8 weeks ago, paid in full, has not been started because of a storm that comes to another state 8 weeks after you took my money?  My husband asked for a refund and was told no refunds on custom orders.  He said if it hasn’t been started yet there is nothing to cancel.  They issued a refund only to say it will take 48 to get the refund back in our account.  Withholding information from customer is nothing more than a fancy lie.  You knew each time I called that my furniture wasn’t coming but you continued to lie.  I can’t find one positive thing to say at this point.  I sincerely hope you change your policy...I will warn every person I know what you did to me.  Shame on you.

name: samantha simmons
text: Beautiful store, great selection, excellent customer service!

resp.text: Thank you, Samantha, for your kind words!

name: Morgan
text: Beautiful furniture! Not everything is on sale but what is on sale is a deal.

resp.text: Thank you, James!  We love giving our community "a little extra." Be sure to follow us on Facebook to see the upcoming sales and specials as they change very frequently.

name: Shirley Mason
text: OMG! So beautiful

resp.text: Hi Shirley, thank you for visiting our store! We're glad you enjoyed your visit and hope to have you back again soon.

name: Jason Slinkard
text: Great store, great service, great people!

resp.text: Thank you, Jason, for your kind words.

name: Mike Seiber
text: I want to share our experience at Dog Town Furniture in Huntsville with Hailey. She went above and beyond to help us with the purchase of furniture for our bedroom, dining room and living room.  She was knowledgeable and patient with us while we made our decisions. Hailey did not pressure us in any way, she made the whole buying process easy and stress free. I highly recommend Dog Town Furniture in Huntsville and definitely request Hailey for  assistance when you visit their store, she will take time for you without feeling rushed or pressured.

name: kwise1700
text: I had the most incredible customer service with Austin.  If you are going here ask for Austin!  He was very patient, kind, and knowledgeable; all the qualities that puts one at ease when making a major purchase.  He helped put my order together very efficiently for a complete new bedroom set.  I had picked the exact same set out at a different store and saved $1500 by purchasing here instead!!  A couple of days later I called him to see if I could add a mattress and box springs to the order.  Austin came to the rescue once again and over the phone helped me pick out exactly what I needed and he know what would work with my new bed.  I had been to 5 other stores before coming here and not one store had anything I liked in stock and ready to be delivered in a timely matter.  Other stores had an 8-16 week waiting time before they could get anything to me.  Austin was quickly able to tell me what was in stock and ready to deliver and I will have my complete new set up all in one delivery with 11 days of purchasing!  I live an hour away and will come here again for future purchases.  Thank you Austin for going above and beyond to make the process simple and speedy!

name: Tina Townsend
text: So we finally went in here, I must admit the outside had me a little worried about what the prices would be, but after going in I was pleasantly surprised, not only were the prices great but the quality of furniture was amazing. I will say the first guy we spoke to wasn't that great and told us it would take 21 weeks to get what we wanted, but as soon as we started to walked to away the assistant store manager came over and presented us with other options that we ended up loving even more and we purchased two full bedroom sets for our kids to include mattress, we taught our kids an important lesson that day that you never give up. Now our kids are so in love with their bedrooms and we couldn't be happier with our choice to go with Dogtown West and will definitely recommend them to others, and will be back when we replace our bedroom set.

name: Lauren Haynes
text: Great selection of furniture and very reasonable prices. All associates were helpful and friendly. There was an issue with my order but once it was identified, management was quick to make it right. I will absolutely be shopping at Dogtown again.

name: steve mayo
text: After going to about 5 other places looking for a recliner with a remote for my mom finally found it at Dogtown. Austin was really helpful in suggesting what might be best. Prices were a lot lower than lazy boy or rooms to go. Will definitely recommend and will be back. Thank you Austin hope to see you soon.

resp.text: Thank you, Steve, for your kind review! It was a pleasure helping you and your mother.

name: Linda Young
text: We recently bought livingroom furniture from Dogtown West and are very pleased! Our sales rep Hailey was very patient & kept us informed of new styles & colors as they came in, until we found just the right  one.  And the delivery team,  Shack and his partner, got all the furniture set up and in place within 15-20mins. and were gone in a flash ! I would recommend checking out Dogtown West, if your looking for great furniture and people to deal with!

name: Hannah Reed
text: They are fabulous to work with! Will be any prices I’m North Alabama. I had a piece come in damaged and didn’t realize it till about 2 weeks later . They automatically offered to order me a new one at no charge.

resp.text: Hi Hannah! Thanks for the great review! It was a pleasure doing business with you.

name: Lala Llama
text: What a wonderful group of friendly employees. They are so welcoming and kind. Hailey and Alyssa were very attentive, helpful and professional. It is really hard to get furniture right now because most deliveries are about 3 months out so I was unable to purchase anything. It is a fun place with a lot of unique items. If you are in the area, you should definitely check it out. Thank you for the outstanding customer service.

resp.text: Thank you, Lala, for your kind words. It was a pleasure working with you. We do stock many items and also sale off of the floor when necessary. Please keep checking back and we appreciate the opportunity to service your home furnishing needs!

name: Kendriand Jones
text: Hailey was amazing! such a sweet and helpful person. She provided exceptional service and I received my furniture within a week. I've been shopping there since. No point in going anywhere else every again for furnishings.

resp.text: Thank you, Kendriand, for your kind words! It was a pleasure to be able to be your home furnishings stop!

name: L res
text: Least expensive but the salesperson has little knowledge about the things the place sells. He's nice though

name: Kevin Pylant
text: Very nice store and great selection of nice furniture. We purchased a dining room table and our dog chewed up one of our chairs. Went back to buy a replacement chair and the manager exchanged it for free with no questions asked.

name: Meriah Morgan
text: Prices are good but takes MONTHS to get your furniture and even when one piece came in they forgot to give us the other piece that went with it. We are still waiting for side tables its been 4 months.  Won't be shopping here again.

name: Eric Rowland
text: My wife and I had a great experience at Dogtown West today. We found a beautiful living room set and bedroom set that is going to work great for our remodel.  Austin was very friendly, answered all our questions,  and helped us find some quality furniture. Thanks for great customer service and great prices.

resp.text: Thank you, Eric for the kind words! It was a pleasure being able to help you guys out! Thank you for choosing us! We can’t wait to see how everything turns out!

name: Sarah Roth
text: UNMATCHED CUSTOMER SERVICE! It will be difficult for you to find a place more friendly, with better prices or better customer service than this little furniture outlet. I worked with Jayla and Mary and also both managers here while I was going through the process of furnishing my new home. They were all amazing! I actually had to return a piece because it wasn't working in our home and they were all so incredibly accommodating and kind. For as long as I'm in this area, they will have my business. Can't thank them enough for the quality of customer service I received - so far above and beyond! Now go see em!

resp.text: We greatly appreciate your kind words, Sarah. We are so thankful you chose us to meet your home furnishings needs! It was an absolute pleasure working with you!!

name: Meagan Peck
text: Love DTW! We found the most gorgeous bedroom suite and a mattress for an unbelievable deal, and we dont have to wait 32 million years for our furniture to be ready. The best part is that they are willing to hold product until we move in January, which, to me, was above and beyond expectation. Also, make sure you find Hailey (probably the most precious thing to ever walk this Earth) if you have any questions! She was so super helpful, knowledgeable, and friendly! I will absolutely buy again from DTW!

name: Laura Taylor
text: Low quality furniture. Walked in...looked at the offerings...walked out.

name: Kelly Holbrook
text: Rude YOUNG sales girl that thought she knew it all and didn’t! A manager that offered no solution to problem just basically said since she wasn’t there it’s all she said she said. In the end, the rude sales girl didn’t order all we asked for.  I definitely won’t be back!!!!

resp.text: Hi Kelly. Thank you for your review. We apologize you feel this way.  We are an equal opportunity employer and give our sales people the knowledge needed in order to perform their job exceptionally. There were two solutions offered: a discount of $50 off of the delivery fee or a full refund. We were not aware of any other additional issues which were not settled as the final sale was complete. We greatly appreciate your business and we will contact you when your order is fulfilled.

name: Mike G
text: I came to this store through referrals from some locals as we are recent transplants and needed to furnish our new home. The level of customer service, selection and price was absolutely unparalleled and has honestly set such a high standard, I am ruined and will never be able to purchase furniture elsewhere, seriously, we tried! We were looking for something very specific a chain furniture store in town had and went over there to purchase and were quickly greeted by a dismissive salesperson, convoluted pricing schemes and utter Insouciance. I drove straight back to Dogtown West afterwards and was greeted once again by Austin with a smile on his face, eager to help. He quickly assisted us in furnishing our home, most of our furniture in the house has now been acquired from Dogtown and I don't see that changing. Save your time, money and sanity and just come here first!

resp.text: Thank you, Mike, for choosing us! We are grateful for your family and your kind words! It is a pleasure to be able to accommodate your home furnishing needs!

name: Brooke Post
text: Fast and efficient! Hassle free process (especially during COVID times) and we love our new furniture.

resp.text: Thank you, Brooke, for your kind words! We are so grateful you chose us for your home furnishing needs!

name: Cara Garnick
text: We searched several other stores for a specific bed but no one had it in stock. When I walked in, I was greeted with Austin who was super friendly and helpful. He was able to search for items in stock and provide pricing on the spot. He was also able to help us determine which bed foundation was best for our bed, which was a tremendous help! Not only was it cheaper at this store than the others I visited, but the bed arrived super fast. Jayla called (and texted when I didn't get the call) to let me know our items had arrived in plenty of time to be able to pick it up before closing. The customer service Austin, Jayla and everyone involved was amazing and made this a wonderful buying experience. This is our second experience with Dogtown West. They are just above and beyond.

resp.text: Thank you, Cara, for your kind words! We are so grateful you chose us for your home furnishing needs!

name: RAVEN Pinchon
text: My husband and I recently discovered Dogtown through an FB post, we are so happy that we came upon this place. Dogtown has Ashley furniture without Ashley's high prices. I recommend that anybody who is shopping for furniture, home decor, mattress, etc check this place out before you go anywhere else. I also received great customer service from Austin and Jayla, they worked closely with us to make sure that we were pleased with everything that we purchased.

name: Pamela Hendon
text: Great place to shop with great prices and people.  My sister in law and brother had great customer service from Hailey

name: remy cotton
text: We went there to look at sectionals. The prices are incredibly low for the quality. We recieve exceptional service by the sales person named Jayla. She was patient and took the time to find us the perfect sectional for us that was in our budget. We ended up buying a mattress for our little girl, after saving so much money. I totally recommend Dogtown Furniture Outlet, and Jayla for the best furniture buying experience

name: T
text: Friendly and no pressure staff. They have low prices and convenient quick delivery! Perfect place for all of your furniture needs!!

resp.text: Thanks for the great review, T! We are so happy that you had such a wonderful experience with our store and associates. We hope you choose us again in the future for your furniture needs!

name: Paul Etheredge
text: Ordered a piece of furniture from showroom, couldn’t get same piece so they ordered something completely different and expected me to accept it.  Not only was it cheaper, wouldn’t give me a refund only store credit.  Inconvenience and poor customer service.  Suggest going with a more established place, 2 star customer service.  Did get the refund but only after very difficult communications.

name: Gabe Goggans
text: Staff is friendly and helpful.  Prices are great with a lot to choose from.  I will definitely be back for more.

resp.text: Thanks for the great review, Gabe! We are so happy that you had such a wonderful experience with our store and associates. We hope you choose us again in the future for your furniture needs!

name: John Valenzuela
text: Friendly helpful good prices

name: Yvonne Lueders
text: Horrible. It’s not even dog furniture!

name: Skairipa 90
text: I recently furnished my entire home from scratch, so I’ve been to every furniture outlet in this city- these guys are by far the best! I bought a tufted queen sleigh bed, a dresser and some gorgeous and soft fur throw pillows and blanket. Mesha was a big help without hovering or trailing after me. As I moved thru the store I was given cold water, an info card and my personal space so there was no sales pressure. Overall a very relaxing experience! I bought&ordered the items and they were ready to be picked up the following day! While setting up the sleigh bed I ran into a few missing pieces (!!) I called the store fairly frantic and they were able to tell me exactly where the feet of the bed were calming me down in about 2 seconds lol. I’ll definitely go back, I’m still thinking about a couple items I probably should have grabbed while I was there!

resp.text: Thanks for the great review, Megan! We are so happy that you had such a wonderful experience with our store and associates. We hope you choose us again in the future for your furniture needs!

name: Kathy E
text: Clean, organized & friendly staff that does not hover. Reasonably priced.

name: Juan Maldonado
text: Every one was nice great staff

name: Stacey G
text: meh x5

name: Curtis Haynes
text: Associate Tyler Savage provided exceptional service. We needed some last minute things for a long trip and he went out of his way at closing at the next day to accommodate our trip. We are pleased w the purchase and recommend to others. They actually deliver items that are assembled and provide same day delivery in the area if needed.

name: Tameron Williams
text: Justin was absolutely amazing! He helped us find everything we needed and the customer service was great. They had great prices you won’t find anywhere else in town. Definitely recommend stopping by!

name: Steve Clark
text:
If you want the absolute best mattress, you must really lay on beds to determine which bed you body likes.  When I went to BoxDrop Mobile, Krystinee was very helpful and understanding of my needs.

My wife and I just had our first child and our bed was really needing to be replaced. My wife loves a harder bed and I like a less firm bed.  We laid on the mattresses and found the perfect fit for both of us.  Best sleep we’ve had in years. 30 nights so far and very satisfied.

Customer service: 6 out of 5 stars  they made us feel like family.

Price: Great products for great prices we couldn’t find a better price for a bed.

Mattress:  sleep2win copper cooling mattress with adjustable base.  It even makes me stop snoring.....wife approved.

I highly recommend going to visit this store.  A very welcoming mom and pop feel!

**Live local.....shop local!**

text: Very nice, helpful staff. Quality products. However, they did tell me I'd get it with in a week. They just didn't mention it'd be a week three weeks later than they originally told me.

resp.text: Thanks for the feedback! We apologize for the unforeseen delay in your estimated date of arrival. With the national foam shortage and the lack of returning workers to the factories as well as Covid shipping delays, we do our best to give our best estimate for delivery from our manufacturer. Unfortunately, freight logistics are beyond our control and we try our best to give you the most accurate shipment date. We still appreciate you shopping with our small owned family business and hopefully production times can start getting more accurate with the return of workers and supply chain issues will help to get the manufacturers up to speed! 😊

name: Nene Marie
text: If I could give 0 stars I would. I would not recommend this place to anyone waited almost a month for a mattress and they gave me the run around mattress is not comfortable as it is from how it felt in the store waited all this time just for the box spring to tear when laying down!

resp.text:
After looking at the order, Deniscia came in on March 4th, 2021 and chose a twin mattress set that was not in stock. Ms. Pettaway chose to do an in-house lay-a-way payment option and put half of the total purchase amount down. We typically do not process in house lay-a-way orders until its paid in full, but we went ahead and ordered the set to try and help her out. Deniscia called to check the status of her order on Saturday March 13th , I, Krystine told the customer we had not received the order yet, that due to COVID, manufacturing has slowed down, which prolonged our delivery on inventory. This is actually an issue we've been patiently having to deal with, as a vendor during the pandemic. It typically takes about 2 weeks from when you pay it off in full, and we would get in contact with her once we received the order from the manufacturer. Ms. Pettaway then called back 20 minutes later with a third party on the phone, at which time both parties proceeded to yell at me using profane language. I explained the situation again being as polite as one can be when faced with someone yelling and screaming on the phone.

I, Krystine, spoke with Deniscia again on the 17th, 19th, 22nd, and again on the 26th when the order had been delivered from the manufacturer. I , Krystine offered the Denescia free delivery for the inconvenience of having to wait on the order despite only putting down half. When the customer came in to make the final payment, I said "Hello, How can we help you?" She told me she was here to pay the final payment on the order. I then asked if she wanted a refund because after speaking previously Ms. Pettaway said that she wished to cancel the order and get a refund. Upon making the final payment we arranged for our delivery driver to deliver the products to the customer free of charge.

Deniscia called us Saturday March 26th saying the boxspring was broken. After speaking to Ms. Pettaway, her mother called us yelling, calling us names etc. We asked Deniscia to submit photos to us so we could file a claim with the manufacturer so they could warrant the workmanship of the product. Upon reviewing the photos, Josh noticed the boxspring was upside down and called Deniscia Monday March 29th to let her know the issue was an upside down boxspring and that the manufacturer warranty would not cover damages that the customer caused by putting the foundation upside down. Despite knowing that, Josh offered to come over and fix the boxspring for Ms. Pettaway on his free time to rectify the situation. In response, he was told, there was nothing we could do to make the situation any better and that the customer would leave constant bad reviews.

We kept in constant contact with Deniscia, speaking to her 5 times in the course of 3 weeks. We worked with her by splitting up the payments and even ordering the set despite not having received full payment. We also provided free delivery for the inconvenience of having to wait. A full refund was also offered to Deniscia who refused it, finally we offered to come over and repair the boxspring for Ms. Pettaway on our free time.

Once the customer and third party became combative with the use of profanity on the phone with us, the phone call was terminated. Our policy when a hostile work environment arises, is to remove ourselves from the situation. We have offered Deniscia Pettaway several different solutions in order to solve the problem and move forward successfully.

We have exhausted every option in order to appease Ms. Pettaway in an attempt to rectify the situation. There is nothing further we can do to make Deniscia satisfied despite the countless options given to her.

Furthermore, we stand behind our process and our policies and are confident we did everything in our power to have a successful outcome.

resp.text:
Thanks for your feedback Jamie,
You are correct in that an appointment is required in order to shop with us. When you communicated to us that you were earlier than your scheduled appointment time, we told you we would arrive shortly. Only after you told us you would like to go shop other places, we safely assumed you did not want to shop with us. We travel from over an hour away also, so we understand your commute time. However, we arrived at our site and you were not there to meet with us.  We have appointments set up until 7pm this evening and were with other customers who had set up a time. We also, chose not to do business with you once you used profane language towards one of our team members. We appreciate your feedback and hope you find what you are looking for. 🙂

text:

name: Linda Gravois aka tattfae
text:
Yes they are friendly but forget it if they sell you the wrong mattress!!! We told them we needed a mattress that was 5x6 ft. for a camper. We brought it home and less than an hour later we were calling them back telling them that they sold us the wrong mattress!!! Didn't know we had to do their job for them as far as knowing the measurements!!!! Well they are telling us we can't get our money back or exchange it or anything because of ms. state law because of contamination issues. We had it less than an hour and never unwrapped it!! and now we are stuck with a mattress we can't use!!!😠😠😠 Will never shop there again!!!!!!!! Way to keep a customer happy!!!

My husband told your husband that he needed a mattress FOR A CAMPER and he also told him 5 x 6 ft.  If you're husband knew anything about measurements and the mattress business he should have known that your mattresses wouldn't work! We didn't know there was a difference but then we are not in the MATTRESS BUSINESS! As for the contamination issue those mattresses are hauled over the road and god knows where else before they even get to your store!! We never even unwrapped it so there is no way we contaminated any more than it already probably was. Also you nor your husband made us aware that once we bought it we were stuck with it! I nor my husband remember seeing any signage stating that policy all we saw on the walls was sport memorabilia! As for what I signed on your husband's phone that was nothing but a white screen with a line through it for the signature. Oh and by the way if you're that worried about contamination maybe you ought to keep your kids from jumping and crawling on the mattresses!!!!

resp.text: Hey Mrs. Linda, You guys came In today looking for a queen mattress, we sold you a queen mattress. You specifically told Josh you needed a mattress that was 60x80 (which is a standard queen mattress).  Josh asked you multiple times if you were sure it would fit your space, you were very adamant about getting a queen mattress today and reassured him a queen size mattress is what you needed. We did not have any measurements other than those that you gave us, as a we did not measure your space, you did. Our return policy complies with Mississippi state laws, in that we cannot accept returns because of a contamination policy they have in place. Also, we explained this to you on the phone and you asked us to do something unethical and take back your mattress, that had been inside your home. Once you became combative with the use of profanity on the phone with us, the phone call was terminated, because our policy is when a hostile work environment arises we remove ourselves from the situation. We are sorry the measurements you took weren’t accurate and the space doesn’t fit a standard queen size mattress. Thanks for your feedback.

Not only do we a bathroom available to customers, but we have TWO available to use when we do open that you are welcome to come in and test out!! 😁 We offer two different types of toilet paper, hand soap, warm water and fresh paper towels to use when you do come visit us! The sales lady was real sweet and kind. And times have been tough business wise on everyone, prices were a little higher. Tan most places but she worked on price with us a bit. Supply and demand was evident throughout the store.
I didnt however like the fact, the finance part of it was a surprise. And i will pay off early due to it being on a card and not really thru shumake or a local finance company. And my downpayment ended up being more than i wanted to place down, that should of factored in during financing.

name: Emily Hanson
text: If I could give this place a zero I would! I have never even done reviews because it really depends on the day and person every where but this place is HORRIBLE!! First me and my husband bought an entertainment center and had to send it back 3 times for being damaged. The last time there was damage but you couldn’t see it that bad so we just kept it. We should have learned our lesson then!! The next time we bought our daughter a new bedroom suit and we bought a new kitchen table. We knew it was on back order for the bedroom suit but the table would be in sooner. We were called when the table came in set up the delivery time. On the day of Delivery for the table our time was 2-5, at 5 when we had not heard anything I called the store. They gave me a number to call the delivery guys because they said they couldn’t get ahold of their delivery guys. I’m not sure how a customer was supposed to get ahold of the delivery guys before the actually store but I called anyways. Of course no answer. Called the store again and the manager just kept telling me he didn’t know and to have my husband call him. Why do you need to speak with my husband when I’m the one calling?? My husband called and we were finally told they found the truck but we need to reschedule the drop off! Nope we will not we need it today! Me and my husband went to the store and picked it up. We chalked it up to understaffed due to covid and left it at that although still upset the manager will not talk to me only my husband. Now for TODAY! Manger called my husband (although he has my number) told him all the furniture would be in on Tuesday. Rather then wait around on another pointless delivery fail we said we would go in today on Thursday to pick up the furniture. My husband goes in and…. The manager said the furniture is not there and they can’t find it….. WHAT?!?!? Are you kidding me?!?!? My husband calls me at work at this point I’m done I’m furious I call up there to see what’s going on and the manager says YOUR TO UPSET I CANT TALK TO YOU! I WILL ONLY SPEAK WITH YOUR HUSBAND!!!  I have to call my husband (because I’m at work and can’t go up there and deal with it in person like I would like to) he has to call the store. Blah blah they offered him the furniture on the floor but the dresser is cracked! Are you kidding me no I’m not taking a cracked dresser after all this nor would I take it before all of this.He tells my husband he can come get the bed and nightstand we will have to wait on the dresser of course . We said since that is our only option it will have to do but we will NEVER AND I MEAN NEVER buy from this store and I’m going to corporate about all that has happened and how the manager here has a problem with speaking to woman!!

resp.text: We'd like to take a closer look at this with you and see what we can do to help. When you have a chance just give us a call at 1-888-411-2270 (8AM-8PM CST M-F, 8:30AM-5PM CST Saturday).

text: My husband and I had a great experience at the Birmingham Hwy 280 store.  Johnathan was great and very helpful.  We can't wait for our bed to be delivered.

text: Jonathan offered exemplary customer service!  All the staff were very friendly and welcoming.

name: Anthony Busby
text: Product seems to be to be great won’t receive it for a few weeks. After what I experienced in the store I’m confident it will be worth it but this review is solely on the store. Never thought I would enjoy shopping for a mattress and certainly never dreamed I would spend th money we spent but the staff never once made me feel pressured. Tika was our tour guide and I use that term because that’s what it was a guided interactive tour. There was another gentleman working with her who was very friendly but I don’t recall his name but from the sounds of it his customers were enjoying the experience as well. There’s eight different models with various thickness and materials and they let you try out every single on of them but the first setup was our ultimate choice. It was really amazing to watch the screen above your head. You see your pressure points in real time and can see literally see your optimum sleep number. If your considering a new mattress don’t let the prices scare you away from Atleast experiencing it first hand. I never dreamed I would spend more on a bed than I did my last used car but as a sufferer from chronic back pain I was willing to make the investment after visiting this store but again never felt pressured by the staff. I can’t shut up about this place to my friends

name: Jennifer Calfee
text: My husband and I had a great experience at the sleep number store at Hwy 280, Birmingham, Al. The salesperson was extraordinarily helpful and knowledgeable about all of the beds.

name: Tyler Hayes
text: The sales associate that helped us (Grant) did a wonderful job showing us our options and explaining the products to us. He was very informative and answered all our questions. He’s a great salesman who really cares about his customers. 10/10 would recommend him to anyone interested in a Sleep Number bed.

name: Cathy Peoples
text: I had the most amazing experience at my local Sleep Number Store. I only went in to find out more about the mattresses and how they work. I had done my internet research but was ready for the touch test. Grant was my salesperson and he was very pleasant and informative. After about an hour in the store needless to say we were sold and purchased our first Sleep Number bed!! So excited waiting on my delivery!!

name: Beverly Moore
text: We had a great experience at the sleep number store in Birmingham. The salesman was so helpful and answered all our questions completely. I would recommend this store to anyone who is considering a sleep number bed.

name: Susan Slaney
text: Jonathan and Raul were extremely helpful and pleasant. They made our shopping experience enjoyable and comfortable. They were very knowledgeable and answered our many questions with ease. We were able to use the information they provided to make the best decision for our needs.

name: B J
text:
I had a wonderful experience purchasing my sleep number 360 and accessories at the Birmingham Home Show.  It was extremely busy. I tested beds while waiting.  Johnathan, the store manager for HWY 280, was great.  He was very accommodating.  He brought my paperwork to the bedside.  What he didn’t know was that I suffer with my lower back and sciatic nerve area.  I was hurtin. The mattress felt so good, I didn’t want to get up and start feeling yucky again which is the reason I asked him to bring the paperwork over to me.  My cousin and my friend with me tested a mattress too. I think my friend who has trouble sleeping will buy a mattress soon.  I purchased her a curved pillow and a wedge.
I am also grateful for the patience and kindness shown to me.  Saturday was my first day out of the house.  Johnathan did not know this, but my older brother died January 24, 2020 of metastatic cancer. I took leave from my job to take care of him. I am still in shock. He died three months after his diagnosis. Johnathan made me laugh.  I didn’t panic or experience any anxiety.   I highly encourage people to visit the HWY 280 store and check out Sleep Number beds.  I switched from a Tempur Pedic to a Sleep Number bed.  One mission accomplished.

name: James Davis
text: The staff at the store were welcoming and attentive. They were willing to answer questions and helped us in every step of the purchase!

name: Eric Tipton
text: Brenda and Shawn at the Hwy 280 store have been the most helpful sales associates I've encountered during any bedding purchase. They were very knowledgeable about the Sleep Number product and helpful in choosing a model to suit our needs. No attempt to oversell whatsoever....just honest caring individuals. I highly recommend this store and these two associates. Thank you both.

resp.text: We appreciate you sharing your wonderful experience and are so glad you found some great options to help you get your best night's sleep!

name: D O
text: Great experience! No pressure to buy... but we did. Can't wait to have the new i8 delivered next week.

name: Eric Kelly
text: DO NOT PURCHASE THIS BED! Extremely uncomfortable for the cost & TERRIBLE customer service.  Was in a rush when purchasing and was 'told' the bed could be returned, so we bought the top of the line bed** ONLY THE MATTRESS CAN BE RETURNED. Paid over $11,000 for the bed initially and was told we would have to keep the base, which costs over $4,000.  Initially the wrong bed delivered, which was like a brick, and the foot warmer was missing. Two weeks later, got the correct mattress and foot warmer.  Would have been better off buying an air mattress and placing it on box springs. HORRIBLE EXPERIENCE to say the least.

We called Sears Hometown Repair in Foley and they quickly sent out Daniel who opened the washing machine and said it was a simple fix with the hose!! I told him about the other repair company and he was gracious enough to track down the part we needed and come out the following day and fix it!!! He only charged us $100 for the part AND labor for both days!!! Can’t brag on him enough as well as this store. They are honest, efficient and very professional. Thank y’all again!

name: Kristin Willis
text: I ordered a washer online and picked it up on a Thursday. Once we got it home and took it out of the box we noticed that the front of it was caved in. We called Sears and they told us to bring it back up there. They wouldn't do any kind of scratch and dent discount or I would have took it right back home. Instead they ordered another one and said it would be there the following Tuesday & that they would deliver it for free. Come Tuesday still no washer in and they said they would call me back to let me know when it was supposed to be in and I never received a call. That next Monday I finally received a call that my washer was in but couldn't be delivered until the following day. I ended up going and picking it up bc I was tired of having to wash my clothes in the sink. I will never get anything from there again!!!

text: I highly recommend Brad Gillham as a sales representative. Many sales representatives just hope to say the right thing in order for their customer to purchase the products. name: Josh Baker
text:
Update:  Austin is a tremendous business owner that honestly cares about customer satisfaction.  We discussed the issues I originally posted below.  He listened intently and worked to rectify the situation to retain our business.  As such he took action to truly "make it right" per his reply.  Unfortunate that the situation occurred however we are now in a much better place.  Thanks to Austin for following through on his word.

Bad experience.  We recently purchased a Tempurpedic set and was originally told it would be delivered within 10 days.  We were also told that the store would keep us apprised of the status.  Well, no calls were received after a few days so I called.  I was told by a "floating" manager it would actually be 4 to 8 weeks.  At that point we perceived that we recieved bad information from the salesman who sold us the set. Frankly, I feel as if he told us 10 days to prevent us from taking our business elsewhere.  I informed the "floating" manager to call by 1000 the next day and if they weren't going to honor their original timeline to refund our money.  Note that they cashed and deposited our check for the full amount.  I never recieved a call the next day.  So I called the store and spoke to Brad- our original salesman.  He then stated that mattress would be at the warehouse on the 10th day but deliver later in the week.  Unacceptable.  I was going to be ok with it until Brad spoke to me very aggressively during our conversation. Even at one point trying to use "I am a Christian angle..." which had nothing to do with thr situation.   I had enough and told him to refund me.  He was supposed to call back and let me know when the full refund would be returned- never did.  Moral of the story is buyer beware.  Also, if you decide to go in and Brad is there be prepared for him to talk your ear off about random matters that have nothing to do with your reason to be there.  Recommend taking your business elsewhere where you have a better chance of not dealing with a used car salesman.

resp.text:
Hi Josh, we are sorry you had a poor experience with us but we would like to fix it if we can. Please contact me at: austin@bedzzz.express and I will make it right. Thanks.

So glad that we could make it right for you!

name: Robert Coleman
text:
I've bought two mattresses and box springs and an adjustable bed frame all at different times. I was a customer at both the Whitesburg Drive Store and at the South Memorial Parkway Store. All occasions they delivered my purchases.
My Customer Experience was very positive at both locations. In one instance I had taken my 87 year old mother to buy a mattress and box springs at the Whitesburg Drive store. The staff was very helpful even to the point of when  we arrived one of their employees came out to help her climb up the stairs. At that time the employee didn't even know if she would be a customer at their store. They just came out to be helpful and offer assistance. Once in the store they were very helpful, knowledgeable, and took a lot of time with her. After her purchase the delivery crew was very professional as well.
I bought my adjustable bed frame from the South Parkway Store. My in-store experience was mush the same as I described. The delivery crew was also friendly both times...the first time they came they didn't have the hardware to attach my headboard. They returned the following Saturday and attached the headboard and made sure that I was pleased with the installation.
When the time comes again to get another mattress my first stop will again be Bedzzz Express.

name: Joanna Knight
text: I visited the store in Troy, AL   I specifically told the sales clerk that I wanted to purchase a living room suit on the no interest plan.  This was on a Saturday and she gathered my information.  She sent it in and told me initially that I was denied.  After review, she indicated that the denial was on an old address.  Once she entered my correct address she told me I was approved.  She asked me did I want to make a down payment but did not indicate that the interest free was subject to a down payment.  So, I declined to make a down payment.  Upon receiving my first statement it indicated I was charged interest.  When I talked to the same lady she indicated that approved the account that charged interest.  No, I did not.  She neglected to give me the full details.

resp.text:
Customer service is incredibly important to us, and we regret we didn't provide you with the
experience you expected, Joanna. If there is anything we can do differently that might better serve you as
our valued customer, please reach out to a member of our corporate team by calling 1-800-223-
2625 or email customer.service@badcock.com

name: Valerie Edelmann
text:
Needed to purchase a lift chair that can also be laid back far enough to sleep in it for my husband. Due to my own health issues,  I  needed to call prior to going into the store to get as much information as possible about the choices. A wonderful young lady named "Turtle" helped me on the phone.But she wouldn't be there when I could be there. She told me her sister would be there and Mechel would make sure Turtle got credit for the sale. (I had wanted Turtle to get the credit since she took so much time helping me.) When we got there to the store, Mechel was so sweet and ready to help. We ended up purchasing 2 matching chairs to be delivered on Friday! (He has impending hip surgery and I need knee surgery.)

In a time when customer service has decreased and prices have increased, the quality customer service at our Badcock's is greatly appreciated!

resp.text: It was a pleasure to have you shop with us, Valerie! Thank you for taking the time to rate our store and share your feedback.

name: millie cp
text: My husband and I just bought our sleep number bed and pillows with salesman Benji's help. He was professional, patient, knowledgeable, and brilliant. He was super friendly and helpful, never pushed anything on us, made sure all our needs were meet; he didn't just sell us a bed, he helped give us back our restful nights. After having been injured in a bad car wreck last year, my husband had already bought me a new adjustable bed with every pillow you can imagine for help with my neck pain since the surgery to correct the injury. Nothing helped. With Benji's guidance, I now feel like one day I'll wake up and not even realize i slept through the night, something I now believe I took for granted in my youth. I would recommend these beds to anyone, and suggest Benji get a raise and a promotion for his excellent service.

resp.text: Thanks for sharing your review with us, Millie. We love hearing when our Sales Professionals have provided wonderful service and we'll make sure your kind words are shared with Benji's supervisor :-)

name: Katie Yang Sloan
text: GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE!! We had been on the market for a new mattress and had visited multiple other mattress stores in the Huntsville area, but didn't find what we were looking for, at the price we wanted. Upon walking into this store, I was warmly greeted by Debbie who was very helpful and gave a great price quote for a mattress I loved. I brought my husband back with me the next day and worked with Sunny, and she was just as pleasant, extremely knowledgeable, and patient with us. She did a "sleep test" with us and educated us on the differences, pressure point relief, and pros/cons of a plush vs medium mattress.  We ended up deciding on a mattress and got an adjustable base and all the extras for a great price (they are currently running a free adjustable base!!)! I would definitely recommend this location and their sales people to anyone looking for a new mattress!!

text: Great customer service, product, and pricing!

name: Ashley Baldwin
text: So I ordered a bed back in March, was given a delivery date to be delivered no later than May 23rd... still haven’t received it. I called numerous times, and finally spoke to a guy named Dustin that went above and beyond to figure out the issue. Turns out it wasn’t mattress firms issue, it was the manufacture. Long story short, Dustin went out of his way to get me a box spring and frame ordered so I could get my new mattress off of the floor. So thank you Dustin!! I definitely recommend anyone going to see him at the Bridge Street location!

name: Joel Baldridge
text: Sunny was such a pleasure to work with!  We came in more than once, lingered past store hours, and never once felt pressured.  She was delightful and incredibly knowledgeable!  Thank you for helping us pick out the right mattress for *us*!! One that we can feel great about purchasing!!

text: Julian was a huge help in purchasing our new mattress! We initially visited the Whitsburg location where Julian helped us pick a mattress that we both loved. Julian was so helpful that we decided to go back the very next day and purchase it. He was at the Bridgestreet location the next day so we went there. He was able to add the military discount on top of the quote from the previous day which helped lower the cost even more. He was a huge help from beginning to end and we would definitely recommend him to everyone!!

text: My Husband and I have been really wanting to upgrade our mattress and decided to stop in to mattress firm to get some prices. We came back today together so my husband could try the mattress and wound up buying it on the spot. Debbie is the kind of representative every company needs! I am so glad that we decided to go somewhere other than Ashley Furniture (we have had some problems with their service in the past)  Thank you so much Ms Debbie! If you ever feel like a space is missing something, come back and see what we've got to fill it! -Auburn Furniture

name: Chrissy Reed
text: Owner took advantage of my elderly mother after purchasing a subquality mattress. Beware of shady business practices.

resp.text: It would never be our intention to take advantage of any of our customers here, Chrissy. We always do our best to make the right recommendations, but we apologize if the mattress we sold your mother was not what was expected. If you would like to discuss any concerns further, please feel free to call us, and we would be happy to answer any questions you might have. The last thing we want is to make our guests upset, and if we've done that we would love the opportunity to make things right. Hope to hear from you soon. -Auburn Furniture

name: Jonathan Carpenter
text: Barry is wonderful! Got a great price on high quality bedroom suits. Always friendly and helpful, never pushy. We showed him pictures and prices we had elsewhere and he got us better quality products for a lower price.

name: Daryl Bledsoe
text: Was not impressed with the owner are the sales person or whoever he was decided I would go elsewhere and spend approximately $1,700 on the bedroom mattress found a place right down the road from there about a half mile on the same side of the road and he was more than happy to help me

resp.text: We're so sorry that you felt we didn't want to help you, Daryl. It would never be our intention to come off like that, so it's unfortunate that there was some misunderstanding here. We always do our best to find the perfect pieces of furniture for each of our customer's, so to hear that you did not find us eager to help is extremely disappointing. I can assure you that we meant no harm at all, and if you'd ever like to come back and give us another try, we would be more than happy to help in any way we can. -Auburn Furniture

name: Paul_Melvin _
text:
Not much I can say about this furniture store except it is typical furniture store pushing high-priced items that are lower quality.
I need to shop around and compare prices to other stores and do some more homework.  But I didn't have a good gut feeling about this place.

resp.text: We're sorry to see that you weren't a fan of our shop, Paul. We like to think we provide high-quality furniture without the high-quality price. We hope you'll give us another shot to show you what we're really about. -Auburn Furniture

name: Oliver Sanchez
text: Great inventory and family friendly atmosphere.

name: g gibsoc
text:
Purchased a King Koil bed that is defective. Have used King Koil before with good results, this particular mattress is obviously defective. The rep could only say that unless a spring was protruding there was nothing covered.

After some research it turns out that there is no one King Koil factory that makes these beds under quality control. Rather factories all over the world make mattresses under the King Koil label. The factory that made this mattress is in Georgia and the phone number is not in service.

After spending $1000.00 for a bed a store should be able to offer some assistance to a customer.
Shame on you

text:
Not fully transparent on delivery charges and they put mattress and box at front door. It would have required an additional $10.00 to bring inside. Buyer beware of their unethical practices plus rude delivery driver to top it off. They will not get any more business from me. Pray manufacturers warranty endures. All it would have taken is the store manager reiterating delivery policy at time of purchase rather than saying signs posted at front desk.
Additionally,  I forgot to mention that this was delivered in the county and city taxes should not apply.  Please update your practices and stay informed on this matter.

text: In preparation for unexpected visitors escaping hurricane Florence, I needed to find a bed for my family. Enter Darrell, from Mattress Warehouse. text: Had issues with the $2,500 worth of furniture I purchased, but store manager is working hard to get us satisfied

name: Tamaka Wright
text: Delivery service is slow. I ordered a sectional and was given a delivery date. I've waited all day. They finally call at1:24pm saying they would be here in an hour or so. It is now 5:56 pm and still no delivery or update. I have pretty much wasted my day when I could have been doing other things. I will call the office on the next business day to let them know about this.

name: Brenda Johnson Lawrence
text:
Update on my previous review: Management finally returned my call. She was out sick since New Year's. She made our purchase good and replaced the damaged furniture. However, I am going to leave the initial review below this update, and raise the stars to a 3 instead of 1. This store really needs to evaluate their customer service skills and improve by taking care of issues in a timely manner.
Initial Review:
Horrible experience! Do not shop here! They sold us defective furniture that damaged our hardwood floors and no-one returns the calls. The delivery men were still at my house when I showed them the sofa was reclining and digging into the floors! The sofa reclined and left a deep two-foot-long scratch in our new hardwood floors. They replaced the sofa on Dec 31 and I showed them the loveseat is lopsided. They tried to fix it but couldn't. It has been over three weeks and these people do not return your calls nor stand behind their products! Don't shop here! I wish I had read these reviews before we shopped with Farmers! We are going to buy new bedroom furniture and a new refrigerator, but not from farmers!

name: Peggy Walden
text: The people was very helpful & friendly. The store has a warm atmosphere to it. When you buy from them & something happens, they are prompt in repairing the item or replacing if it warrants being replaced. I recommend them to anyone.

name: Ray Ray
text: I was in a hurry to find a bedroom suit. Was going to pay cash if they had a discount for a cash purchase. They did not so I did a 90 day same as cash. The problem is the delivery, they dented and scratched the dresser. Also put dens and scratches in the wall. I took pics and showed the delivery people. Called the Manger she a asked for pics. I sent them to her cell phone. After repeated attempts I could not get her on the phone. I went to the store several times. I was told she was not in. NO one else would help me. Due to she was the contact and it was her investigation. They won I gave up, it was cheaper for me to fix the walls. And cover up the dented and scratched dresser. Then it was than continue to try and chase them down. It's a shame they could have had a long term customer. If they would have been fair. Rather than dishonest.

text: Good selection of furniture and good sales staff

name: Michael Mitchell
text: Wanted to purchase a vase with cash and the amount of paper work to fill out seemed like it for a credit check. Meh. Learn that cash is public tender for private and public debts, just like it's printed with.

text: Absolutely the worst store to buy furniture, I bought a dinette set from them  and the next day I found that the chairs was loose and so was the table. There too high to sell such lousy furniture they tell you their Living room furniture is real leather but it's not, I will never ever buy anything from them.

name: Susie Jackson
text: Worst mistake ever getting involved with this place. No return policy..constant harassing calls at ALL hours of day or night. They try to make you feel bad..even when you tell them you don't have it and are trying to give them whatever you have. They just suck. Would/will NEVER recommend this place to anyone!

text: Very good customer service, great delivery service, bought a whole bedroom suite, kids bed and mattress, living room furniture. Had nothing but great service. Office people were friendly, nice as could be, Sharon was the nicest salesperson!

text: Great place.They provide great service supplied alot of my home furniture

name: Bill Brooks
text: Wouldn't stand behind the mattress that I bought about 2 years ago. The pillowtop rolled up under where I was sleeping and because it had a stain on the other end where I had accidentally spilled some chocolate milk on it they wouldn't warranty it because of stain. The stain was on the other end and had nothing to do with the pillowtop rolling up. They used the 10 years warranty as a selling point(this is a$1500.00 mattress) and never mentioned about the warranty being voided if it had a stain on it. Just a way of not standing behind there product.

name: Rhonda wilson
text: Love this store great customer service and very thorough and helpful ! They will help with whatever you need if they dont have exactly what you are looking for or if they dont have a color of something you want furniture's ect they will look it up for you , i have bought twice from the Gadsden Al store and once from Anniston Al store i have never had any issues with either store and also helped my credit !
